en_text:
[click]: Shuffle 15 Minutes into R&D. The Corp can trigger this ability while 15 Minutes is in the Runner's score area.
Limit 1 per deck.
cn_text:
[click]: 将15分钟洗入研发中心。当15分钟在潜袭者的分数区时，公司能触发本能力。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: click: Shuffle 15 Minutes into R&D. The Corp can trigger this ability while 15 Minutes is in the Runner's score area. Limit 1 per deck.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play 24/7 News Cycle, forfeit an agenda.
Resolve the "when scored" ability on an agenda in your score area.
cn_text:
作为打出24/7新闻循环的额外费用，废除一个议案。
结算你分数区中一个议案的“计分时”能力。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play 24/7 News Cycle, forfeit an agenda. Resolve the "when scored" ability on an agenda in your score area.

en_text: The first time the Corp installs a card each turn, you may expose that card unless the Corp pays 1[credit].
stripped_text: The first time the Corp installs a card each turn, you may expose that card unless the Corp pays 1 credit.

cn_title: 密网: 知识产权回收
en_text:
Limit 2 remote servers.
The first time each turn you install a card in the root of or protecting a remote server, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of or protecting another remote server, ignoring all costs. You cannot score the second card this turn.
cn_text:
限制2台远程服务器。
每回合你第一次安装一张卡牌到一台远程服务器的根目录或保护一台远程服务器时，你可以从总部安装1张卡牌到另一台远程服务器的根目录或保护另一台远程服务器，忽略所有的费用。你本回合不能将后者计分。
stripped_text: Limit 2 remote servers. The first time each turn you install a card in the root of or protecting a remote server, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of or protecting another remote server, ignoring all costs. You cannot score the second card this turn.

en_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, place 2 power counters on Aaron Marrón. Hosted power counter: Remove 1 tag and draw 1 card.
cn_text: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，放置2枚能量指示物到亚伦·马伦上。 所附载的能量指示物: 移除1枚锁定标记并补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, place 2 power counters on Aaron Marron. Hosted power counter: Remove 1 tag and draw 1 card.

en_text: The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, you may trash 1 card from your grip to draw 1 card. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
cn_text: 每回合你第一次仅使用本程序破解所遭遇防火墙上的所有子进程时，你可以从你的操控器销毁1张卡牌，以抽1张卡牌。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+2。
stripped_text: The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, you may trash 1 card from your grip to draw 1 card. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. [trash]: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
cn_text: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+2。 [trash]: 略过你当前正在遭遇的门禁。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength. trash: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.

en_text: Threat 3 → When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ or Archives in the root of or protecting another server. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) [subroutine] End the run.
cn_text: 威胁3 → 在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以从总部或档案库安装1张非议案卡牌到另一台服务器的根目录或保护另一台服务器。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。） [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Threat 3 -> When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ or Archives in the root of or protecting another server. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) Subroutine End the run.

en_text:
When you score this agenda, you may trash 1 installed resource.
Limit 1 per deck.
cn_text:
当你将本议案计分时，你可以销毁1个已安装的资源。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may trash 1 installed resource. Limit 1 per deck.

en_text: Whenever the Corp purges virus counters, you may gain 1[credit] for each virus counter removed and trash Acacia.
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp purges virus counters, you may gain 1 credit for each virus counter removed and trash Acacia.

en_text: When you score Accelerated Beta Test, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are ice, you may install and rez them, ignoring all costs. Trash the rest of the cards you looked at.
cn_text: 当你用加速版本测试计分时，你可以查看研发中心顶端的三张卡牌。如果其中有任何防火墙，你可以安装并激活它们，忽略所有的费用。销毁余下你所查看的卡牌。
stripped_text: When you score Accelerated Beta Test, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are ice, you may install and rez them, ignoring all costs. Trash the rest of the cards you looked at.

en_text: Look at the top 3 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are operations, you may play them (paying their play cost), ignoring any additional costs. Trash the rest of the unplayed cards you looked at.
cn_text: 查看研发中心顶端的三张卡牌。如果其中有任何事务，你可以打出它们（支付它们的打出费用），忽略任何额外的费用。销毁余下你所查看的未打出的卡牌。
stripped_text: Look at the top 3 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are operations, you may play them (paying their play cost), ignoring any additional costs. Trash the rest of the unplayed cards you looked at.

en_text: +1[link]
cn_text: +1[link]
stripped_text: +1 link

en_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may force the Corp to lose up to 5[credit], then you gain 2[credit] for each credit lost and take 2 tags.
cn_text: 对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以迫使公司失去最多5[credit]，代替读取卡牌，然后拿取2枚锁定标记，并且公司每失去1信用点你获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may force the Corp to lose up to 5 credits, then you gain 2 credits for each credit lost and take 2 tags.

en_title: Acme Consulting: The Truth You Need
stripped_title: Acme Consulting: The Truth You Need
en_text: The Runner is considered to have 1 additional tag (even if they have 0) during encounters with the outermost piece of ice protecting any server.
stripped_text: The Runner is considered to have 1 additional tag (even if they have 0) during encounters with the outermost piece of ice protecting any server.

en_text: Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. You may install 1 card from HQ. The Runner gets −1 allotted [click] for their next turn. Threat 3 → You may pay 2[credit]. If you do, the Runner gets −1 allotted [click] for their next turn. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
cn_text: 只有潜袭者在其上回合窃取或销毁过公司卡牌时，才能打出。 在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。 你可以从总部安装1张卡牌。潜袭者在其下回合获得的[click]数量-1。 威胁3 → 你可以支付2[credit]。如果你如此做，潜袭者在其下回合获得的[click]数量-1。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. You may install 1 card from HQ. The Runner gets -1 allotted click for their next turn. Threat 3 -> You may pay 2 credits. If you do, the Runner gets -1 allotted click for their next turn. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)

en_text:
When the Corp's turn begins, take 1 tag if you have no tags.
When your turn begins, give the Corp 1 bad publicity if they have no bad publicity.
cn_text:
当公司的回合开始时，如果你没有锁定标记，拿取1枚锁定标记。
当你的回合开始时，如果公司没有负面声誉标记，给予公司1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When the Corp's turn begins, take 1 tag if you have no tags. When your turn begins, give the Corp 1 bad publicity if they have no bad publicity.

en_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Install and rez (paying all costs) X advertisements from Archives and/or HQ, if able.
cn_text: 作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。 如可能，从档案库和/或总部安装并激活（支付所有的费用）X个广告。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install and rez (paying all costs) X advertisements from Archives and/or HQ, if able.

en_text: You start the game with 3 different directive cards installed (these cards are not considered part of your deck).
cn_text: 你游戏开始时具有三张已安装的不同的指令卡牌（这些卡牌不视为你牌组的一部分）。
stripped_text: You start the game with 3 different directive cards installed (these cards are not considered part of your deck).

en_text: This program gets +1 strength for each unused MU. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 sentry or barrier subroutine.
stripped_text: This program gets +1 strength for each unused MU. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 sentry or barrier subroutine.

en_text: The first time each turn you lose [click] except by paying the trigger cost of a paid ability, gain [click].
cn_text: 每回合你第一次失去[click]时，获得[click]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you lose click except by paying the trigger cost of a paid ability, gain click.

en_text: Install only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker gains AI and "Interface → Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine."
cn_text: 将调整矩阵安装到一个破解器上。被附载的破解器获得智能模块和“[click]: 破解防火墙子进程。”
stripped_text: Install only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker gains AI and "Interface -> Lose click: Break 1 subroutine."

en_text:
Put 12[credit] from the bank on Adonis Campaign when rezzed. When there are no credits left on Adonis Campaign, trash it.
Take 3[credit] from Adonis Campaign when your turn begins.
stripped_text: Put 12 credits from the bank on Adonis Campaign when rezzed. When there are no credits left on Adonis Campaign, trash it. Take 3 credits from Adonis Campaign when your turn begins.

en_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, the Runner cannot access cards other than this upgrade for the remainder of that run. If the bids match, the Runner cannot access this upgrade for the remainder of that run. When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
cn_text: 每当潜袭者对本服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果二者数值不同，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，潜袭者不能读取除本升级以外的卡牌。如果二者数值相同，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，潜袭者不能读取本升级。 当你的回合结束时，你可以将本升级转移到另一台服务器的根目录。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2 credits. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, the Runner cannot access cards other than this upgrade for the remainder of that run. If the bids match, the Runner cannot access this upgrade for the remainder of that run. When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.

en_text:
When you rez Advanced Assembly Lines, gain 3[credit].
[trash]: Install a non-agenda card from HQ (paying the install cost). You cannot use this ability during a run.
cn_text:
当你激活高级装配线时，获得3[credit]。
[trash]: 从总部安装一张非议案卡牌（支付安装费用）。你不能在一次潜袭中使用本能力。
stripped_text: When you rez Advanced Assembly Lines, gain 3 credits. trash: Install a non-agenda card from HQ (paying the install cost). You cannot use this ability during a run.

en_text: The first time the Runner initiates a run each turn, you may draw 1 card or gain 1[credit].
cn_text: 每回合潜袭者第一次发起潜袭时，你可以补一张卡牌或获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time the Runner initiates a run each turn, you may draw 1 card or gain 1 credit.

en_text: Whenever you access a card with a trash cost not in Archives and do not trash it, you may reveal it and gain 1[credit].
stripped_text: Whenever you access a card with a trash cost not in Archives and do not trash it, you may reveal it and gain 1 credit.

en_text: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3[credit].
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3 credits.

en_text:
While this ice is protecting HQ, the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines during each encounter.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
只要本防火墙保护总部，潜袭者每次遭遇中便不能破解超过1条本防火墙上的印刷子进程。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: While this ice is protecting HQ, the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines during each encounter. Subroutine The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: Whenever you encounter a sentry, you may pay 2[credit] to bypass it. Use this ability only once per turn and only by spending credits from stealth cards. Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 1[credit]: +2 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
cn_text: 每当你遭遇一层警报时，你可以支付2[credit]以略过之。本能力每回合仅限使用一次，且仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解最多2条警报子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+2。本能力仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a sentry, you may pay 2 credits to bypass it. Use this ability only once per turn and only by spending credits from stealth cards. Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 1 credit: +2 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.

en_text:
Play only if you scored an agenda this turn.
Search R&D for 1 card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
cn_text:
如果你本回合已用过一个议案计分，才能打出。
在研发中心搜寻一张卡牌并将其加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: Play only if you scored an agenda this turn. Search R&D for 1 card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

Aggressive Secretary can be advanced.
If you pay 2[credit] when the Runner accesses Aggressive Secretary, trash 1 program for each advancement token on Aggressive Secretary.
stripped_text: Aggressive Secretary can be advanced. If you pay 2 credits when the Runner accesses Aggressive Secretary, trash 1 program for each advancement token on Aggressive Secretary.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has a rez cost of 5 or greater. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
cn_text: 1[credit]: 破解激活费用等于或大于5的一层防火墙上的子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。 2[credit]: 将无惧与你操控器中的一个提婆程序互换。

en_text: [click], [trash]: Gain [click][click].
stripped_text: click, trash: Gain click click.

en_text:
Allele Repression can be advanced.
[trash]: Swap 1 card in HQ with 1 card in Archives for each advancement token on Allele Repression.
cn_text:
等位基因抑制能被推进。
[trash]: 等位基因抑制上每有1枚推进标记，将总部中的一张卡牌与档案库中的一张卡牌互换。
stripped_text: Allele Repression can be advanced. trash: Swap 1 card in HQ with 1 card in Archives for each advancement token on Allele Repression.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. This program can only interface with the outermost piece of ice protecting a server.
cn_text:
1[credit]: 破解防火墙子进程。
1[credit]: 强度+1。
阿尔法仅能对保护服务器的最外层防火墙使用。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. This program can only interface with the outermost piece of ice protecting a server.

en_text: The first [click] you spend each turn must be spent to play a run event or take the basic action to run a server. Lose [click][click]: Break 1 subroutine. Use this ability only once per turn.
cn_text: 你每回合的第一个[click]必须用于进行一次潜袭或打出一个潜袭事件。 每回合一次，你能花费[click][click]，以破解当前遭遇的一层防火墙上的一个子进程。
stripped_text: The first click you spend each turn must be spent to play a run event or take the basic action to run a server. Lose click click: Break 1 subroutine. Use this ability only once per turn.

en_text: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was unsuccessful, you may run the attacked server again, ignoring any additional costs to run. During the second run, whenever you encounter the last piece of ice you encountered during the first run, bypass it.
cn_text: 潜袭任意一台服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭失败，你可以再次潜袭该服务器，忽略所有的额外费用。在第二次潜袭中，每当你遭遇在第一次潜袭中遭遇的最后一层防火墙时，略过之。
stripped_text: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was unsuccessful, you may run the attacked server again, ignoring any additional costs to run. During the second run, whenever you encounter the last piece of ice you encountered during the first run, bypass it.

en_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may trace[X]. If successful, add an installed Runner card to the grip. X is the advancement requirement of the scored or stolen agenda.
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may trace[X]. If successful, add an installed Runner card to the grip. X is the advancement requirement of the scored or stolen agenda.

en_text: +1[mu] When your turn ends, place 1 power counter on this hardware if you are tagged. Whenever you remove 1 or more tags, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 2 cards. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +1[mu] 当你的回合结束时，如果你被锁定，放置1枚能量指示物到本硬件上。 每当你移除1枚或更多锁定标记时，你可以移除1枚所附载的能量指示物，以抽2张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu When your turn ends, place 1 power counter on this hardware if you are tagged. Whenever you remove 1 or more tags, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 2 cards. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: Persistent → Whenever a run on this server ends, if the Runner stole any agendas during that run, give the Runner 2 tags. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
cn_text: 持久 → 每当对本服务器的一次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭者在本次潜袭中窃取过议案，给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。（如果潜袭者读取本卡牌时将其销毁，本能力在本次潜袭的剩余时间内依然有效。）
stripped_text: Persistent -> Whenever a run on this server ends, if the Runner stole any agendas during that run, give the Runner 2 tags. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)

en_text: Whenever you install a piece of ice protecting this server, you may immediately rez it, lowering its rez cost by 3. Limit 1 region per server.
cn_text: 每当你安装一层保护本服务器的防火墙时，你可以立即激活它，其激活费用减3。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a piece of ice protecting this server, you may immediately rez it, lowering its rez cost by 3. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text:
Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, if you accessed 3 or more cards during that run, place 1 power counter on this resource.
When your turn begins, you may remove 3 hosted power counters and trash this resource. If you do, the Corp loses 10[credit].
cn_text:
每当对总部或研发中心的一次潜袭结束时，如果你在本次潜袭中读取过3张或更多卡牌，放置1枚能量指示物到本资源上。
当你的回合开始时，你可以移除3枚所附载的能量指示物并销毁本资源。如果你如此做，公司失去10[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, if you accessed 3 or more cards during that run, place 1 power counter on this resource. When your turn begins, you may remove 3 hosted power counters and trash this resource. If you do, the Corp loses 10 credits.
attribution: Designed by 2021 American Continental Champion Jonas Wilson

en_text: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, the Corp loses 1[credit].
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, the Corp loses 1 credit.

en_text: Gain [click][click][click] and suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented.
cn_text: 获得[click][click][click]并受到1点脑部伤害（不能被防止）。
stripped_text: Gain click click click and suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented.

en_text:
Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of any card.
Your deck may include up to 2 different agenda cards from each Corp faction.
cn_text:
你的牌组中每种同名卡牌限1张。
你的牌组中可以包含来自每个公司派系的最多2张不同议案。
stripped_text: Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of any card. Your deck may include up to 2 different agenda cards from each Corp faction.

en_text: Choose a central server. The Runner may run that server. They cannot jack out during that run. If no run is made this way, add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
cn_text: 选择一台中央服务器。潜袭者可以对该服务器发起一次潜袭，本次潜袭中他/她不能退出。否则，将难拒之邀加入你的分数区，作为一个价值1点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text: Choose a central server. The Runner may run that server. They cannot jack out during that run. If no run is made this way, add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

en_text: [click]: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 unrezzed non-ice card with no advancement counters on it. The Corp shuffles that card into R&D.
cn_text: [click]: 对研发中心进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以选择一台服务器内一张未激活的并且不具有推进标记的非防火墙卡牌，代替读取卡牌。公司将该卡牌洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: click: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 unrezzed non-ice card with no advancement counters on it. The Corp shuffles that card into R&D.

en_text:
Whenever an encounter with this ice ends, if the Runner did not fully break it, do 3 net damage.
[subroutine] Look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
[subroutine] You may draw 1 card. The Runner may pay 2[credit] to draw 1 card.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
stripped_text: Whenever an encounter with this ice ends, if the Runner did not fully break it, do 3 net damage. Subroutine Look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Subroutine You may draw 1 card. The Runner may pay 2 credits to draw 1 card. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.

en_text: Whenever the Runner jacks out, do 1 net damage.
cn_text: 每当潜袭者退出时，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner jacks out, do 1 net damage.

cn_title: 安德洛墨达: 无产贵族
en_text: You draw a starting hand of 9 cards.
cn_text: 你补九张初始手牌。
stripped_text: You draw a starting hand of 9 cards.

en_text:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ to do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
cn_text:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以从总部销毁1张卡牌，以造成2点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ to do 2 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.

en_text: Place X power counters on Angel Arena when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Angel Arena, trash it. Hosted power counter: Reveal the top card of your stack. You may add that card to the bottom of your stack.
cn_text: 当天使竞技场被安装时，放置X枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。当天使竞技场上没有能量指示物时，销毁本卡牌。 所附载的能量指示物: 展示你存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。你可以将该卡牌加入你的存储栈底端。
stripped_text: Place X power counters on Angel Arena when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Angel Arena, trash it. Hosted power counter: Reveal the top card of your stack. You may add that card to the bottom of your stack.

cn_title: 安吉丽克·加尔萨·科雷亚
en_text: Threat 3 → [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this upgrade from HQ: Do 1 meat damage. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is rezzed, you may pay 2[credit] to do 2 meat damage.
cn_text: 威胁3 → [click]，1[credit]，从总部展示并销毁本升级: 造成1点肢体伤害。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。） 当潜袭者读取已激活的本升级时，你可以花费2[credit]以造成2点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Threat 3 -> click, 1 credit, reveal and trash this upgrade from HQ: Do 1 meat damage. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is rezzed, you may pay 2 credits to do 2 meat damage.

en_text: +1[mu] The first time each turn an event is trashed (from any location), draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +1[mu] 每回合第一次一个事件被销毁时(无论从什么位置)，抽1张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu The first time each turn an event is trashed (from any location), draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a barrier, add that barrier to HQ. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
cn_text: 在一次遭遇中，如果你使用金刚钩破解一个屏障上的所有子进程，将该屏障加入总部。 2[credit]: 破解屏障子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
stripped_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a barrier, add that barrier to HQ. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

en_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may pay 2[credit] and trash 2 cards from HQ. If you do, end the run.
cn_text: 每当潜袭者接驳本服务器时，你可以支付2[credit]并从总部销毁2张卡牌。如果你如此做，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may pay 2 credits and trash 2 cards from HQ. If you do, end the run.

en_text: Draw 3 cards.
stripped_text: Draw 3 cards.

en_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever you steal an agenda, force the Corp to "Trace[0]. If unsuccessful, the Runner gains credits equal to the number of agenda points in both players' score areas."
cn_text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每当你窃取一个议案时，迫使公司“追踪 0 如果失败，潜袭者获得与双方玩家分数区中的议案分数相等的信用点。”
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever you steal an agenda, force the Corp to "Trace[0]. If unsuccessful, the Runner gains credits equal to the number of agenda points in both players' score areas."

en_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card. [subroutine] You may install 1 card from HQ or Archives. [subroutine] The Runner cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run.
cn_text: 失去[click]: 破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。 [subroutine] 你可以从总部或档案库安装1张卡牌。 [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，潜袭者不能窃取或销毁公司卡牌。

attribution: Designed by 2018 European Champion Patrick Gower

en_text:
When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on Anson Rose.
Whenever you rez a piece of ice, you may move any number of advancement tokens from Anson Rose to that ice.
cn_text:
当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进标记到安森·罗斯上。
每当你激活一层防火墙时，你可以从安森·罗斯上转移任意数量的推进标记到该防火墙上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on Anson Rose. Whenever you rez a piece of ice, you may move any number of advancement tokens from Anson Rose to that ice.

en_text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, the Runner cannot break this iceʼs printed subroutines for the remainder of this encounter.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. The Runner loses 1[credit].
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
cn_text:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，潜袭者在本次遭遇的剩余时间内不能破解本防火墙上的印刷子进程。
[subroutine] 获得1[credit]。潜袭者失去1[credit]。
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁1张其已安装的卡牌。

If you do, the Runner cannot break this ice's printed subroutines for the remainder of this encounter. Subroutine Gain 1 credit. The Runner loses 1 credit. en_text: You cannot install non-virtual resources. When your turn begins, you may install 1 card from your grip facedown.
cn_text: 你不能安装非虚拟资源。 当你的回合开始时，你可以从你的操控器面朝下安装一张卡牌。
stripped_text: You cannot install non-virtual resources. When your turn begins, you may install 1 card from your grip facedown.

en_text: When your turn begins, you may remove an advancement token from an installed card to gain 3[credit].
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may remove an advancement token from an installed card to gain 3 credits.

en_text:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D and Archives this turn.
Trash all installed Corp cards. Turn all installed Runner cards facedown.
cn_text:
如果你本回合已对研发中心、总部和档案库均进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
销毁所有已安装的公司卡牌。将所有已安装的潜袭者卡牌翻转至面朝下。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D and Archives this turn. Trash all installed Corp cards. Turn all installed Runner cards facedown.

en_text: The first time each turn the Runner trashes a Corp card, give them 1 tag.
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner trashes a Corp card, give them 1 tag.

en_text:
While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 3[credit]. If you do, they encounter it.
[subroutine] Trace[6]. If successful, add 1 installed Runner card to the grip.
cn_text:
如果大天使从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取大天使时，如果你支付3[credit]，他/她立即遭遇它。如果潜袭者从档案库读取大天使，则忽略本能力。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 6</trace> 如果成功，将一张已安装的潜袭者卡牌加入他/她的操控器。

en_text:
As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
作为激活本防火墙的额外费用，废除1个议案。
[subroutine] 获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。

[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。

Players cannot trash this ice.
[subroutine] Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. You may install 1 of those cards, ignoring the install cost.
[subroutine] You may install 1 card from Archives or HQ.
cn_text:
当建筑师已安装时，其不能被销毁。
[subroutine] 公司查看研发中心顶端的五张卡牌并可以安装其中一张卡牌，忽略所有的安装费用。
[subroutine] 公司可以从档案库或总部安装一张卡牌（支付所有的费用）。

en_text: When you score this agenda, look at the top 5 cards of R&D. You may install and rez 1 of those cards, ignoring all costs.
cn_text: 当你将本议案计分时，查看研发中心顶端的5张卡牌。你可以安装并激活其中的1张，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, look at the top 5 cards of R&D. You may install and rez 1 of those cards, ignoring all costs.

cn_text: 将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

en_text: [interrupt] → Whenever you would access a card in Archives, you may instead remove it from the game. Use this ability only once each time you breach Archives.
cn_text: 每当你读取档案库中的卡牌时，你可以将档案库中的一张卡牌移出游戏，代替读取该卡牌。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Whenever you would access a card in Archives, you may instead remove it from the game. Use this ability only once each time you breach Archives.

en_text: Whenever an agenda is scored from this server, you may install a card from HQ, ignoring all costs, and place 1 advancement token on it.
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored from this server, you may install a card from HQ, ignoring all costs, and place 1 advancement token on it.

en_text: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on a server protected by ice, do 2 meat damage.

stripped_text: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on a server protected by ice, do 2 meat damage.

en_text: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, they must take 1 tag or suffer 2 meat damage.

Place 12[credit] from the bank on Armitage Codebusting when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Armitage Codebusting, trash it.
[click]: Take 2[credit] from Armitage Codebusting.

en_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: For the remainder of this run, the Runner must trash 1 card from the grip as an additional cost to jack out or break a subroutine. Use this ability only during a run.
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: For the remainder of this run, the Runner must trash 1 card from the grip as an additional cost to jack out or break a subroutine. Use this ability only during a run.

en_text: Take 1 tag: The ice you are encountering gets −2 strength for the remainder of this encounter. Use this ability only once per turn. [trash], 2[credit]: Trash the ice you are encountering if its strength is 0 or less.
cn_text: 本次遭遇的剩余时间内，当前正在遭遇的防火墙的强度-2。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。 [trash]，2[credit]: 如果当前正在遭遇的防火墙的强度等于或小于0，销毁该防火墙。
stripped_text: Take 1 tag: The ice you are encountering gets -2 strength for the remainder of this encounter. Use this ability only once per turn. trash, 2 credits: Trash the ice you are encountering if its strength is 0 or less.

en_text: When you score this agenda, the Runner loses 7[credit].
cn_text: 当你将本议案计分时，潜袭者失去7[credit]。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, the Runner loses 7 credits.

en_text: Forfeit 1 agenda: Search your stack for 1 program, resource, or piece of hardware. Install that card.
cn_text: 废除一个议案: 在你的存储栈搜寻一张卡牌并安装它（支付安装费用）。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: Forfeit 1 agenda: Search your stack for 1 program, resource, or piece of hardware. Install that card.

en_text: Whenever there is a successful trace, gain 1[credit] and the Runner loses 1[credit].
cn_text: 每当有一次成功的追踪时，获得1[credit]并且潜袭者失去1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful trace, gain 1 credit and the Runner loses 1 credit.

en_text: The first time each turn you install a card, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ in the root of or protecting the same server.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you install a card, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ in the root of or protecting the same server.

en_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner cannot access any cards other than Ash 2X3ZB9CY for the remainder of this run.
stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner cannot access any cards other than Ash 2X3ZB9CY for the remainder of this run.

en_text:
Shuffle your grip and heap into your stack, then remove the top 5 cards of your stack from the game. Draw 5 cards.
Remove this event from the game.
cn_text:
将你的操控器与堆阵洗入你的存储栈，然后将你的存储栈顶端的5张卡牌移出游戏。抽5张卡牌。
将本事件移出游戏。
stripped_text: Shuffle your grip and heap into your stack, then remove the top 5 cards of your stack from the game. Draw 5 cards. Remove this event from the game.

en_text: Ashigaru gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each card in HQ.
cn_text: 总部中每有一张卡牌，足轻获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Ashigaru gains "Subroutine End the run." for each card in HQ.

en_text: When you install this resource, search your stack for up to 2 virus or weapon cards with different names. Host those cards faceup on this resource. (They are not installed.) When your turn begins, you may add 1 hosted card to your grip. If there are no more hosted cards, trash this resource.
cn_text: 当你安装本资源时，从你的存储栈搜寻最多2张名称不同的病毒或武器卡牌。将这些卡牌牌面朝上附载到本资源上。（它们没有被安装。） 当你的回合开始时，你可以将1张所附载的卡牌加入你的操控器。如果已经没有所附载的卡牌，销毁本资源。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, search your stack for up to 2 virus or weapon cards with different names. Host those cards faceup on this resource. (They are not installed.) When your turn begins, you may add 1 hosted card to your grip. If there are no more hosted cards, trash this resource.

en_text:
[subroutine] Trace[5]. If successful, do 3 net damage.
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 program.
cn_text:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 5</trace> 如果成功，造成3点网域伤害。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，销毁一个程序。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[5]. If successful, do 3 net damage. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 program.

en_text: [click],[click]: Turn one of your facedown installed cards faceup. If that card is an event, trash it.
stripped_text: click,click: Turn one of your facedown installed cards faceup. If that card is an event, trash it.

en_text:
Asteroid Belt can be advanced and its rez cost is lowered by 3 for each advancement token on it.
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
小行星带能被推进，并且其上每有1枚推进标记，其激活费用减3。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Asteroid Belt can be advanced and its rez cost is lowered by 3 for each advancement token on it. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: +1[mu] Draw 1 card whenever the Corp creates a server. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +1[mu] 每当公司建立一台服务器时，补一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Draw 1 card whenever the Corp creates a server. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance. Limit 1 per deck.
cn_text: 当你用神符实验项目计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的议案指示物: 放置1枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。 每套牌组限制1张。 勘误自FAQ 3.1
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance. Limit 1 per deck.

en_text: When you install this program, you may pay X[credit] to place X power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
cn_text: 当你安装本程序时，你可以支付X[credit]，以放置X枚能量指示物到本程序上。 每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，本程序的强度+1，且本程序只能与强度与其相等的防火墙对接。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条子进程。
stripped_text: When you install this program, you may pay X credits to place X power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine.

en_text: Threat 3 → The Runner cannot spend credits while subroutines on this ice are resolving. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) [subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2[credit]. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2[credit]. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2[credit].
cn_text: 威胁3 → 在结算本防火墙上的子进程期间，潜袭者不能花费信用点。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。） [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害，除非潜袭者支付2[credit]。 [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害，除非潜袭者支付2[credit]。 [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害，除非潜袭者支付2[credit]。
stripped_text: Threat 3 -> The Runner cannot spend credits while subroutines on this ice are resolving. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2 credits.

en_text: Draw 2 cards. Reveal up to 2 agendas in HQ and/or Archives. Gain 2[credit] for each agenda revealed, then shuffle those agendas into R&D.
stripped_text: Draw 2 cards. Reveal up to 2 agendas in HQ and/or Archives. Gain 2 credits for each agenda revealed, then shuffle those agendas into R&D.

en_text: Gain 1[credit] whenever you jack out.
cn_text: 每当你退出时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit whenever you jack out.

en_text:
Play only if there are at least 2 other cards in HQ.
Trash all cards from HQ. Place a total of 2 advancement counters on installed cards you can advance.
stripped_text: Play only if there are at least 2 other cards in HQ. Trash all cards from HQ. Place a total of 2 advancement counters on installed cards you can advance.

en_text: Whenever you trash a card you are accessing, place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface → Hosted virus counter: Break up to 2 subroutines. Trash 1 card from your grip: +3 strength.
cn_text: 每当你销毁一张你正在读取的卡牌时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 对接 → 所附载的病毒指示物: 破解最多2条子进程。 从你的操控器销毁1张卡牌: 强度+3。
stripped_text: Whenever you trash a card you are accessing, place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface -> Hosted virus counter: Break up to 2 subroutines. Trash 1 card from your grip: +3 strength.

en_text: This program gets +1 strength for each hosted virus counter. Whenever you expose a card, place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever you finish breaching a server, if you did not steal or trash any accessed cards, place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
stripped_text: This program gets +1 strength for each hosted virus counter. Whenever you expose a card, place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever you finish breaching a server, if you did not steal or trash any accessed cards, place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine.

en_text: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.

en_text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they may take 1 tag to bypass it.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they may take 1 tag to bypass it. Subroutine The Corp gains 2 credits. Subroutine End the run.

en_text:
The first time you install a program from your grip during your turn, gain [click].
Trash Autoscripter if you make an unsuccessful run.
cn_text:
在你的回合中，你第一次从你的操控器安装一个程序时，获得[click]。
如果你进行了失败的潜袭，销毁自动脚本仪。
stripped_text: The first time you install a program from your grip during your turn, gain click. Trash Autoscripter if you make an unsuccessful run.

cn_title: 奥古斯蒂娜·伊万诺夫斯卡娅
en_text: The first time each turn you install a virus program, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.)
cn_text: 每回合你第次安装一个病毒程序时，破坏1。（公司选择从总部或研发中心顶端销毁1张卡牌。）
stripped_text: The first time each turn you install a virus program, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.)

en_text: Awakening Center can host bioroid ice (each piece is installed facedown, ignoring all install costs). Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you may rez a piece of ice on Awakening Center, lowering the rez cost by 7[credit], to force the Runner to encounter it. Trash that ice after the run is completed.
cn_text: 觉醒的中枢能被附载生化人防火墙（每层防火墙牌面朝下安装，忽略所有的安装费用）。 每当潜袭者通过保护本服务器的所有防火墙时，你可以激活觉醒的中枢上的一层防火墙，其激活费用减7[credit]，以迫使潜袭者遭遇它。在本次潜袭完成后，销毁该防火墙。
stripped_text: Awakening Center can host bioroid ice (each piece is installed facedown, ignoring all install costs). Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you may rez a piece of ice on Awakening Center, lowering the rez cost by 7 credits, to force the Runner to encounter it. Trash that ice after the run is completed.

en_text:
While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this agenda, you may place up to 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
cn_text:
如果冲奖作品从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取冲奖作品时，你可以放置最多2枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this agenda, you may place up to 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.

cn_title: 艾拉·“生命”·拉辛: 拟态专家
en_text: Before drawing your starting hand, set aside the top 6 cards of your stack facedown. (You may look at those cards at any time.) Shuffle 2 of those cards into your stack. [click]: Add 1 card set aside with this identity to your grip.
cn_text: 在你抽初始手牌前，将你的存储栈顶端6张卡牌面朝下置于一旁。（你可以随时查看这些卡牌。） 将其中2张卡牌洗入你的存储栈。 [click]: 将1张由本特性置于一旁的卡牌加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Before drawing your starting hand, set aside the top 6 cards of your stack facedown. (You may look at those cards at any time.) Shuffle 2 of those cards into your stack. click: Add 1 card set aside with this identity to your grip.

cn_title: 阿兹·麦卡弗瑞: 机械奇才
en_text: The first job resource, connection resource, or piece of hardware you install each turn costs 1[credit] less to install.
cn_text: 每回合你安装的第一个工作资源、人脉资源或硬件的安装费用减1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first job resource, connection resource, or piece of hardware you install each turn costs 1 credit less to install.

en_text:
As an additional cost to score this agenda, trash 1 of your other installed cards.
When you score this agenda, do 2 meat damage.
cn_text:
作为将本议案计分的额外费用，销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。
当你将本议案计分时，造成2点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to score this agenda, trash 1 of your other installed cards. When you score this agenda, do 2 meat damage.

en_text: When your turn ends, you may name a card type. Gain 2[credit] the first time each turn the Runner plays or installs a card that has the type you last named this way.
stripped_text: When your turn ends, you may name a card type. Gain 2 credits the first time each turn the Runner plays or installs a card that has the type you last named this way.

en_text: Remove 1 tag: End the run. You cannot use this ability during a run on this server.
cn_text: 移除1枚锁定标记: 终止本次潜袭。在对本服务器的潜袭中，你不能使用本能力。
stripped_text: Remove 1 tag: End the run. You cannot use this ability during a run on this server.

en_text: You may host any number of non-AI icebreaker programs on this program. This program gains the paid abilities of all hosted icebreaker programs.
cn_text: 你可以附载任意数量的非智能模块破解器到雅加婆婆上。 雅加婆婆获得所有所附载的破解器的付费能力。
stripped_text: You may host any number of non-AI icebreaker programs on this program. This program gains the paid abilities of all hosted icebreaker programs.

en_text: Choose 1 card in the root of a remote server. Gain 3[credit] for each advancement counter on that card, then trash it.
cn_text: 销毁安装在一台服务器内的一张卡牌，并且该卡牌上每有1枚推进标记，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: Choose 1 card in the root of a remote server. Gain 3 credits for each advancement counter on that card, then trash it.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag.
Add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
cn_text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，移除1枚锁定标记。
将本事务加入你的分数区，作为一个价值1点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag. Add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

en_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don’t have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Whenever you encounter a piece of ice during a run on your mark, you may trash this resource to bypass that ice.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，发现你的目标。（如果你没有目标，一台随机的中央服务器成为你本回合的目标。） 在对你目标的潜袭中，每当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以销毁本资源以略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Whenever you encounter a piece of ice during a run on your mark, you may trash this resource to bypass that ice.

en_text: When Bacterial Programming is scored or stolen, you may look at the top 7 cards of R&D, add any number of them to HQ, trash any number of them, and arrange the rest in any order.
stripped_text: When Bacterial Programming is scored or stolen, you may look at the top 7 cards of R&D, add any number of them to HQ, trash any number of them, and arrange the rest in any order.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
The Runner's memory limit is reduced by 2 until the end of the turn.
cn_text:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
潜袭者的内存上限减2，直到本回合结束。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. The Runner's memory limit is reduced by 2 until the end of the turn.

en_text:
Run any server. If successful, resolve 2 of the following in any order:
  • Draw 2 cards.
  • Install 1 card from your grip, paying 1[credit] less.
  • Remove 1 tag.
  • Place 4[credit] on this event. You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs for the remainder of this run.
cn_text:
潜袭任意一台服务器。如果成功，按任意顺序结算下列中的2项:
  • 抽2张卡牌。
  • 从你的操控器安装1张卡牌，其安装费用减1[credit]。
  • 移除1枚锁定标记。
  • 放置4[credit]到本事件上。在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付销毁费用。
stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, resolve 2 of the following in any order: * Draw 2 cards. * Install 1 card from your grip, paying 1 credit less. * Remove 1 tag. * Place 4 credits on this event. You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs for the remainder of this run.

en_text:
Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Bailiff, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
每当潜袭者破解执达吏上的一个子进程时，获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Bailiff, gain 1 credit. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: The first time you encounter a piece of ice during each run, place 1 power counter on this resource. [trash], X hosted power counters: Derez the ice you are encountering if its strength is X or less. Take 1 tag.
cn_text: 每次潜袭你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，放置1枚能量指示物到本资源上。 [trash]，X枚所附载的能量指示物: 如果当前遭遇的防火墙的强度小于或等于X，关闭该防火墙。拿取1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: The first time you encounter a piece of ice during each run, place 1 power counter on this resource. trash, X hosted power counters: Derez the ice you are encountering if its strength is X or less. Take 1 tag.

en_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a card type to look at the top card of R&D. If that card has the chosen type, you may reveal it and gain 2[credit].
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，你可以选择一种卡牌类型，以查看研发中心顶端的卡牌。如果该卡牌具有所选择的类型，你可以展示之并获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a card type to look at the top card of R&D. If that card has the chosen type, you may reveal it and gain 2 credits.

en_text: [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program or end the run.
cn_text: [subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序或终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trash 1 installed program or end the run.

en_text: Install only in the root of R&D. [click]: Reveal the top 3 cards of R&D. Secretly choose 1 to add to HQ. Return the others to the top of R&D, in any order. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_text: Install only in the root of R&D. click: Reveal the top 3 cards of R&D. Secretly choose 1 to add to HQ. Return the others to the top of R&D, in any order. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text: [subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. If this run is successful, the Runner removes 1 tag.
cn_text: [subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。如果本次潜袭成功，潜袭者移除1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. If this run is successful, the Runner removes 1 tag.

en_text:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] on it. When it is empty, trash it.
Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 8 credits on it. When it is empty, trash it. Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.

Whenever you make a successful run, you may place 1[credit] from the bank on Bankroll.
[trash]: Take all credits from Bankroll.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run, you may place 1 credit from the bank on Bankroll. trash: Take all credits from Bankroll.

en_text: Interface → 2[credit]: Subroutines on the barrier you are encountering cannot end the run for the remainder of this encounter.
cn_text: 对接 → 2[credit]: 本次遭遇的剩余时间内，当前正在遭遇的屏障上的子进程不能终止本次潜袭。

When you install this hardware, suffer 2 core damage.

当你安装本硬件时，受到2点核心伤害。
每回合你获得的[click]数量+1。

While this ice is protecting Archives, it gets +3 strength.
[subroutine] Do 3 net damage.

只要本防火墙保护档案库，其强度便+3。

[subroutine]End the run.

cn_text: 每当你从你的操控器安装一个硬件时，你可以从你的操控器安装另一个相同的硬件（支付所有的费用）。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware from your grip, you may install another copy of that hardware from your grip (paying all costs).

When your turn begins, lose [click].
Your maximum hand size is increased by 5.

当你的回合开始时，失去[click]。
你的手牌上限+5。

stripped_text: Gain 3 credits.

cn_title: 碧翠丝·弗里尔·冈萨雷斯
en_text: [click][click]: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, breach R&D. When you do, access 1 additional card.
cn_text: [click][click]: 潜袭总部。如果成功，侵入研发中心，代替侵入总部。当你如此做时，额外读取1张卡牌。
stripped_text: click click: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, breach R&D. When you do, access 1 additional card.

en_text: Run a remote server. If successful, instead of breaching that server, you may force the Corp to shuffle all cards in the root of that server into R&D.
stripped_text: Run a remote server. If successful, instead of breaching that server, you may force the Corp to shuffle all cards in the root of that server into R&D.

en_text: When you install this program, suffer 1 core damage. This program gets +1 strength for each core damage you have taken this game. Interface → 1[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
cn_text: 当你安装本程序时，受到1点核心伤害。 你本局游戏中每受到过1点核心伤害，本程序的强度+1。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解任意数量的屏障子进程。
stripped_text: When you install this program, suffer 1 core damage. This program gets +1 strength for each core damage you have taken this game. Interface -> 1 credit: Break any number of barrier subroutines.

en_text:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4[credit] to give them 2 tags.
cn_text:
在潜袭者从研发中心读取本资产的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者从档案库以外其他区域读取本资产时，你可以支付4[credit]，以给予其2枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4 credits to give them 2 tags.

en_text:
As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 5[credit].
When you score this agenda, gain 5[credit].
cn_text:
作为窃取本议案的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付5[credit]。
当你将本议案计分时，获得5[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 5 credits. When you score this agenda, gain 5 credits.

en_text: Persistent → As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must suffer 2 net damage. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
cn_text: 每次潜袭者从本服务器读取一个议案时，他/她必须受到2点网域伤害作为额外的费用才能窃取。即使潜袭者在本次潜袭中销毁武藏弁，本能力依然有效。
stripped_text: Persistent -> As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must suffer 2 net damage. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)

en_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If unsuccessful, trash Bernice Mai.
stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If unsuccessful, trash Bernice Mai.

en_text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, for the remainder of that encounter this program gets +1 strength for each subroutine on that barrier. Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines.
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, for the remainder of that encounter this program gets +1 strength for each subroutine on that barrier. Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines.

en_text: Trash 1 installed card with an install cost equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.
cn_text: 销毁一张已安装的卡牌，该卡牌的安装费用等于或小于潜袭者所具有的锁定标记数量。
stripped_text: Trash 1 installed card with an install cost equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.

en_text:
If the Corp has 5-9[credit] when your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
If the Corp has 10-14[credit] when your turn begins, draw 1 card.
If the Corp has at least 15[credit] when your turn begins, gain [click].
cn_text:
如果当你的回合开始时，公司具有5-9[credit]，获得1[credit]。
如果当你的回合开始时，公司具有10-14[credit]，补一张卡牌。
如果当你的回合开始时，公司具有至少15[credit]，获得[click]。
stripped_text: If the Corp has 5-9 credits when your turn begins, gain 1 credit. If the Corp has 10-14 credits when your turn begins, draw 1 card. If the Corp has at least 15 credits when your turn begins, gain click.

en_text: The first time the Runner plays a run event or installs an icebreaker program each turn, you may give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_text: The first time the Runner plays a run event or installs an icebreaker program each turn, you may give the Runner 1 tag.

en_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D.
cn_text: 每回合你第一次对总部进行成功的潜袭时，迫使公司销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D.

en_text: Choose resource, hardware, or program. The Runner may trash any of their installed cards of the chosen type and gain 1[credit] for each card trashed this way. Gain 2[credit] for each card of the chosen type that is still installed.
stripped_text: Choose resource, hardware, or program. The Runner may trash any of their installed cards of the chosen type and gain 1 credit for each card trashed this way. Gain 2 credits for each card of the chosen type that is still installed.

en_text: When you score Bifrost Array, you may trigger the "when scored" ability of another agenda that is not a copy of Bifrost Array in your score area.
cn_text: 当你用彩虹桥阵列计分时，你可以触发你分数区中另一个除彩虹桥阵列以外的议案的“计分时”能力。
stripped_text: When you score Bifrost Array, you may trigger the "when scored" ability of another agenda that is not a copy of Bifrost Array in your score area.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Give the Runner 2 tags.
cn_text:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Give the Runner 2 tags.

en_text:
After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.
Place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card. You may score that card, if able.
Remove this operation from the game.
cn_text:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
放置4枚推进指示物到1张已安装的卡牌上。如可能，你可以将该卡牌计分。
将本事务移出游戏。
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card. You may score that card, if able. Remove this operation from the game.
attribution: Designed by 2018 North American Champion Sam Suied

en_text: When your turn begins, do 1 net damage if there is no ice protecting this server.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, do 1 net damage if there is no ice protecting this server.

en_text: [trash]: Prevent all but 1 net damage.
cn_text: [trash]: 防止除1点以外的其余所有网域伤害。
stripped_text: trash: Prevent all but 1 net damage.

en_text: Install only in a remote server. Bio Vault can be advanced. [trash], 2 hosted advancement tokens: End the run.
stripped_text: Install only in a remote server. Bio Vault can be advanced. trash, 2 hosted advancement tokens: End the run.

en_text: [trash]: Prevent 2 damage.
stripped_text: trash: Prevent 2 damage.

en_text: Rez a piece of bioroid ice, ignoring all costs, and install Bioroid Efficiency Research on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash Bioroid Efficiency Research and derez host ice if all of its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."
cn_text: 激活一层生化人防火墙，忽略所有的费用，并将生化人效率研究安装到该防火墙上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“在一次遭遇中，如果被附载的防火墙上的所有子进程被破解，销毁生化人效率研究并关闭被附载的防火墙。”
stripped_text: Rez a piece of bioroid ice, ignoring all costs, and install Bioroid Efficiency Research on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash Bioroid Efficiency Research and derez host ice if all of its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."

en_text: [trash]: Install 1 card from HQ. Use this ability only during the next paid ability window after playing and resolving an operation.
stripped_text: trash: Install 1 card from HQ. Use this ability only during the next paid ability window after playing and resolving an operation.

en_text: Gain [click][click].
cn_text: 获得[click][click]。
stripped_text: Gain click click.

en_text: Host ice gets -2 strength. [click]: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caïssa program. If this program is hosted on ice protecting a central server, its [click] ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting a remote server. If this program is hosted on ice protecting a remote server, its [click] ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting a central server.
cn_text: [click]: 将象附载到一层未被西洋棋附载的防火墙上。如果象已附载，并且象在保护远程服务器的防火墙上，则仅能再附载到保护中央服务器的防火墙上；如果象在保护中央服务器的防火墙上，则仅能再附载到保护远程服务器的防火墙上。 被附载的防火墙的强度减2。
stripped_text: Host ice gets -2 strength. click: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caissa program. If this program is hosted on ice protecting a central server, its click ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting a remote server. If this program is hosted on ice protecting a remote server, its click ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting a central server.

en_text: The Corp must trace[4]. If unsuccessful, for the remainder of the turn, access 2 additional cards whenever you breach HQ or R&D.
stripped_text: The Corp must trace[4]. If unsuccessful, for the remainder of the turn, access 2 additional cards whenever you breach HQ or R&D.

en_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, they must either suffer 1 core damage or jack out. If the Runner jacks out this way, gain 5[credit], draw 1 card, and trash this upgrade.
cn_text: 每当本服务器进行了成功的潜袭时，潜袭者必须承受1点脑部伤害或退出。如果潜袭者退出，获得5[credit]，补一张卡牌并销毁黑色许可。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, they must either suffer 1 core damage or jack out. If the Runner jacks out this way, gain 5 credits, draw 1 card, and trash this upgrade.

en_text: Whenever you encounter a code gate, you may install this program from your heap. 3[credit]: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the code gate you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.
cn_text: 每当你遭遇一个门禁时，你可以从你的堆阵安装黑色乐团（支付其安装费用）。 3[credit]: 强度+2。如可能，破解最多2个门禁子进程。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a code gate, you may install this program from your heap. 3 credits: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the code gate you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. If you spent a credit from a stealth card to use this ability, instead break up to 3 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +1 strength. If you spent at least 1 credit from a stealth card to use this ability, instead +2 strength.
cn_text: 1[credit]: 破解1个屏障子进程（或如果你花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点，则破解最多3个子进程）。 2[credit]: 强度+1（或如果你花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1信用点，则强度+2）。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. If you spent a credit from a stealth card to use this ability, instead break up to 3 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +1 strength. If you spent at least 1 credit from a stealth card to use this ability, instead +2 strength.

en_text: +2[mu] Whenever you expose a card, the Corp must rez it by paying its rez cost, if able. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +2[mu] 每当你揭示一张卡牌时，如可能，公司必须支付其激活费用来激活它。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu Whenever you expose a card, the Corp must rez it by paying its rez cost, if able. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: Cards cannot leave the Runner's heap for any reason.
cn_text: 卡牌不能因任何原因离开潜袭者的堆阵。
stripped_text: Cards cannot leave the Runner's heap for any reason.

en_text:
Play only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity.
Make a run. The Corp cannot rez ice for the duration of this run.
cn_text:
如果公司具有至少1枚负面声誉标记，才能打出。
进行一次潜袭。在本次潜袭中公司不能激活防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity. Make a run. The Corp cannot rez ice for the duration of this run.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 3[credit]: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1[credit] from a stealth card.
cn_text: 1[credit]: 破解屏障子进程。 3[credit]: 本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+4。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1信用点来使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 3 credits: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.

en_text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit]. Then, if you have 4[credit] or less, do 1 net damage.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。然后，如果你具有4[credit]或更少，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit. Then, if you have 4 credits or less, do 1 net damage.

en_text: [click],[click]: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 1 card from your grip into your stack.
cn_text: [click], [click]: 补三张卡牌。将一张卡牌从你的操控器洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: click,click: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 1 card from your grip into your stack.

en_text: Blockchain gains "[subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] and the Runner loses 1[credit]." before all its other subroutines for every 2 faceup transaction operations in Archives. [subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] and the Runner loses 1[credit]. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Blockchain gains "Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit and the Runner loses 1 credit." before all its other subroutines for every 2 faceup transaction operations in Archives. Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit and the Runner loses 1 credit. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: When your turn begins, you may remove 1 card in the heap from the game. If you do, gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may remove 1 card in the heap from the game. If you do, gain 2 credits.

en_text: X is equal to the number of cards in the Runner's grip.
cn_text: X等于潜袭者操控器中的卡牌数量。
stripped_text: X is equal to the number of cards in the Runner's grip.

en_text: [subroutine] The Runner must trash either 1 installed program or the top 2 cards of the stack.
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner must trash either 1 installed program or the top 2 cards of the stack.

en_text:
[subroutine] You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ protecting another server, ignoring all costs.
[subroutine] You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ directly inward from this ice, ignoring all costs.
stripped_text: Subroutine You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ protecting another server, ignoring all costs. Subroutine You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ directly inward from this ice, ignoring all costs.

stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this ice, derez another piece of harmonic ice. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program.

As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Gain 5[credit] and draw 2 cards.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Gain 5 credits and draw 2 cards.

stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 rezzed card to HQ and gain credits equal to its rez cost.

en_text: Look at the top 2 cards of your stack. You may add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. Draw 2 cards.
cn_text: 查看你的存储栈顶端的2张卡牌。你可以将其中的1张加入你的存储栈底端。抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Look at the top 2 cards of your stack. You may add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. Draw 2 cards.

Whenever a program is trashed from your grip, host it on BMI Buffer instead of adding it to your heap.
[click][click]: Install 1 hosted program (paying all costs).
stripped_text: Whenever a program is trashed from your grip, host it on BMI Buffer instead of adding it to your heap. click click: Install 1 hosted program (paying all costs).

Whenever a program is trashed from your grip, host it on BMI Buffer instead of adding it to your heap.
[click][click]: Install 1 hosted program, ignoring all costs.

cn_text: 如果你本回合已销毁过你已安装的卡牌，本程序上的付费能力的费用减1[credit]。 对接 → 2[credit]: 破解最多2条警报子进程。 3[credit]: 强度+3。
stripped_text: If you trashed any of your installed cards this turn, paid abilities on this program cost 1 credit less to use. Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 3 credits: +3 strength.

[click]: 从你的操控器面朝下附载最多三张卡牌到书签上（你可以在任意时刻查看这些卡牌）。
[click]或[trash]: 将书签上的所有卡牌加入你的操控器。

Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Do 7 meat damage.

如果潜袭者具有至少2枚锁定标记，才能打出。

造成7点肢体伤害。

cn_text: 当你安装本硬件时，选择1层已安装的防火墙。本硬件仅能在遭遇该防火墙期间使用。 [trash]: 破解至多2条防火墙子进程。当本次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭成功，你可以将1张名称为回力镖的卡牌从你的堆阵洗入你的存储栈。

[trash]: End the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

Draft format only.
If you have more [criminal] cards installed than any other faction, when your turn begins, remove 1 tag.

轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已安装的[criminal]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当你的回合开始时，移除1枚锁定标记。

+1[link]

en_text: Install only on a piece of ice. (If the host ice is uninstalled, this program is trashed.) When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: Break 1 subroutine on host ice.
cn_text: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。（如果被附载的防火墙被卸载，销毁本程序。） 当你安装本程序时及你的回合开始时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 所附载的病毒指示物: 破解被附载的防火墙上的1条子进程。

cn_text: 1[credit]: 破解最多2个子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+1。 每当一层你使用梵天破解其子进程的防火墙遭遇结束时，将一个已安装的非病毒程序加入你的存储栈顶端。
