stripped_text: You get +3 maximum hand size. When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage.

en_text: +X[mu] Your maximum hand size is increased by X. X is equal to the number of agenda points you have. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +X[mu] 你的手牌上限+X。 X等于你具有的议案分数。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +X mu Your maximum hand size is increased by X. X is equal to the number of agenda points you have. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: When you score this agenda, you may pay X[credit]. If you do, the Runner adds X cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack, then draws 1 card.
cn_text: 当你用脑部重塑计分时，你可以支付X[credit]，以迫使潜袭者随机将X张卡牌从他/她的操控器加入他/她的存储栈底端然后补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may pay X credits. If you do, the Runner adds X cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack, then draws 1 card.

en_text: The rez cost of bioroid ice is lowered by 1 for each unspent click the Runner has.
cn_text: 潜袭者每有一个未使用的时点，生化人防火墙的激活费用减1。
stripped_text: The rez cost of bioroid ice is lowered by 1 for each unspent click the Runner has.

en_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "[subroutine] Do 1 core damage." subroutines for the remainder of this run. X is equal to the number of cards in the grip.
cn_text: 当潜袭者遭遇头脑风暴时，本次潜袭的剩余时间内潜袭者的操控器中每有一张卡牌，其获得“[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。”
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "Subroutine Do 1 core damage." subroutines for the remainder of this run. X is equal to the number of cards in the grip.

en_text:
When you score Braintrust, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 advancement tokens on it over 3.
The rez cost of all ice is lowered by 1 for each agenda counter on Braintrust.
stripped_text: When you score Braintrust, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 advancement tokens on it over 3. The rez cost of all ice is lowered by 1 for each agenda counter on Braintrust.

en_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives directly inward from this ice, ignoring all costs. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
cn_text: 失去[click]: 破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 你可以从总部或档案库安装1层防火墙，将其直接放置在本防火墙的内侧，忽略所有的费用。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives directly inward from this ice, ignoring all costs. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed piece of ice. If you do, the rezzed ice gets +3 strength for the remainder of that run. Use this ability only once per turn. Limit 1 region per server.
cn_text: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，每当你激活一层防火墙时，你可以关闭另一层已安装的防火墙。如果你如此做，被激活的防火墙在本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+3。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed piece of ice. If you do, the rezzed ice gets +3 strength for the remainder of that run. Use this ability only once per turn. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text: Run a server protected by ice. When that run ends, gain 6[credit] plus 1[credit] for each piece of ice you passed during that run.
cn_text: 潜袭一台有防火墙保护的服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，获得等同于本次潜袭中通过防火墙数量加6的[credit]。
stripped_text: Run a server protected by ice. When that run ends, gain 6 credits plus 1 credit for each piece of ice you passed during that run.

en_text: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 3 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +4 strength. This program cannot interface with ice protecting a remote server.
cn_text: 2[credit]: 破解最多3个屏障子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+4。 裂口不能对保护远程服务器的防火墙使用。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 3 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +4 strength. This program cannot interface with ice protecting a remote server.

en_text:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset, do 1 meat damage and trash the top card of the stack.
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset, do 1 meat damage and trash the top card of the stack.

en_text: The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 5. Limit 1 region per server.
cn_text: 本服务器内的卡牌的激活费用减5。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 5. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text:
When you score Breaking News, give the Runner 2 tags.
When the turn on which you scored Breaking News ends, the Runner loses 2 tags.
cn_text:
当你用突发新闻计分时，给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。
当你用突发新闻计分的回合结束时，潜袭者失去2枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: When you score Breaking News, give the Runner 2 tags. When the turn on which you scored Breaking News ends, the Runner loses 2 tags.

en_text: Make a run. During this run, the Corp must pay X[credit] as an additional cost to rez the first unrezzed piece of ice approached.
cn_text: 进行一次潜袭。在本次潜袭中，公司必须支付X[credit]，作为激活所接驳的第一层未激活防火墙的额外费用。
stripped_text: Make a run. During this run, the Corp must pay X credits as an additional cost to rez the first unrezzed piece of ice approached.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn.
After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.
Reveal and add 2 cards at random from the grip to the top of the stack.
Threat 3 → You may pay 2[credit] to reveal 1 card in the grip at random. The Runner shuffles it into the stack.
cn_text:
只有潜袭者在其上回合窃取或销毁过公司卡牌时，才能打出。
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
从操控器随机展示2张卡牌，并将其依次加入存储栈顶端。
威胁3 → 你可以支付2[credit]，以随机展示操控器中的1张卡牌。潜袭者将其洗入存储栈。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Reveal and add 2 cards at random from the grip to the top of the stack. Threat 3 -> You may pay 2 credits to reveal 1 card in the grip at random. The Runner shuffles it into the stack.

en_text: When you score Broad Daylight, you may take 1 bad publicity. Place 1 agenda counter on Broad Daylight for each bad publicity you have. [click], hosted agenda counter: Do 2 meat damage. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_text: When you score Broad Daylight, you may take 1 bad publicity. Place 1 agenda counter on Broad Daylight for each bad publicity you have. click, hosted agenda counter: Do 2 meat damage. Use this ability only once per turn.

en_text: Whenever you are about to take at least 1 bad publicity, Trace[3]. If successful, avoid taking the bad publicity.
cn_text: 每当你将要拿取至少1枚负面声誉标记时，<trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，避免拿取该负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: Whenever you are about to take at least 1 bad publicity, Trace[3]. If successful, avoid taking the bad publicity.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Derez a piece of ice that has a rez cost of X or lower.
cn_text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
关闭激活费用等于或小于X的一层防火墙。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Derez a piece of ice that has a rez cost of X or lower.

en_text: While the Runner has fewer than 6[credit], Bryan Stinson gains "[click]: Play a transaction operation from Archives, ignoring all costs. Remove that transaction from the game instead of trashing it."
cn_text: 当潜袭者具有少于6[credit]时，布莱恩·斯廷森获得“[click]: 从档案库打出一个交易事务，忽略所有的费用。将该交易移出游戏，代替销毁它。”
stripped_text: While the Runner has fewer than 6 credits, Bryan Stinson gains "click: Play a transaction operation from Archives, ignoring all costs. Remove that transaction from the game instead of trashing it."

en_text: The first time each turn 1 or more cards are trashed from your grip or stack, you may add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. Remove this hardware from the game: Add 1 card from your heap to the top of your stack.
cn_text: 每回合第一次1张或更多的卡牌从你的操控器或存储栈被销毁时，你可以将其中的1张卡牌加入你的存储栈底端。 将本硬件移出游戏: 将1张卡牌从你的堆阵加入你的存储栈顶端。
stripped_text: The first time each turn 1 or more cards are trashed from your grip or stack, you may add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. Remove this hardware from the game: Add 1 card from your heap to the top of your stack.

en_text:
Install only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Whenever the Corp draws a card, you may pay 2[credit] to reveal that card.
cn_text:
如果你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭，才能安装。
每当公司补一张卡牌时，你可以支付2[credit]，以展示该卡牌。
stripped_text: Install only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Whenever the Corp draws a card, you may pay 2 credits to reveal that card.

en_text:
When you install this resource, place X power counters on it.
When your turn ends, if you have no cards in your grip, draw 1 card for each hosted power counter, then trash this resource.
stripped_text: When you install this resource, place X power counters on it. When your turn ends, if you have no cards in your grip, draw 1 card for each hosted power counter, then trash this resource.

en_text: Gain 1[credit] and draw 2 cards.
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit and draw 2 cards.

en_text:
[click]: Move this piece of ice to the outermost position protecting any server.
[subroutine] Place 1 advancement token on a piece of ice protecting this server that can be advanced.
[subroutine] Place 1 advancement token on a piece of ice protecting this server that can be advanced.
cn_text:
[click]: 将本防火墙转移到保护任意服务器的最外层位置。
[subroutine] 放置1枚推进标记到一层保护本服务器的能被推进的防火墙上。
[subroutine] 放置1枚推进标记到一层保护本服务器的能被推进的防火墙上。
stripped_text: click: Move this piece of ice to the outermost position protecting any server. Subroutine Place 1 advancement token on a piece of ice protecting this server that can be advanced. Subroutine Place 1 advancement token on a piece of ice protecting this server that can be advanced.

en_text: Reveal a barrier from HQ. Install and rez it, ignoring all costs.
stripped_text: Reveal a barrier from HQ. Install and rez it, ignoring all costs.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, gain 2[credit].
cn_text: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。 每回合你第一次仅使用本程序破解所遭遇防火墙上的所有子进程时，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, gain 2 credits.

en_text: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit] or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits and this ice is installed, move this ice to the outermost position protecting another server. (The run continues from this new position.)
cn_text: [subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，转移牛蛙，使其成为保护另一台服务器的最外层防火墙（现在，潜袭者从这个新位置并对这台新服务器继续进行潜袭）。
stripped_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits and this ice is installed, move this ice to the outermost position protecting another server. (The run continues from this new position.)

en_text: When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity. When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 2[credit] if there is an installed AI program. [subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 installed program. [subroutine] Gain 2[credit]. End the run. [subroutine] Gain 2[credit]. End the run.
cn_text: 当你激活壁垒时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。 当潜袭者遭遇壁垒时，如果有一个已安装的智能模块，获得2[credit]。 [subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一个程序。 [subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity. When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 2 credits if there is an installed AI program. Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 installed program. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. End the run. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. End the run.

en_text: [subroutine] Trace[0]. If successful, the Runner trashes 1 program.
cn_text: [subroutine] <trace>追踪 0</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者销毁一个程序。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[0]. If successful, the Runner trashes 1 program.

en_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal 3 cards in HQ at random. Add 2 of the revealed cards to the top and/or bottom of R&D.
cn_text: 潜袭总部。如果成功，随机展示总部中的3张卡牌，代替侵入总部。将所展示卡牌中的2张加入研发中心顶端和/或底端。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal 3 cards in HQ at random. Add 2 of the revealed cards to the top and/or bottom of R&D.

en_text:
Resolve 1 of the following:
  • Place 1 advancement counter on each of up to 2 installed cards you can advance.
  • Remove all virus counters from 1 installed card.
Threat 3 → You may also resolve the other mode. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
cn_text:
结算下列中的1项:
  • 在最多2张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上各放置1枚推进指示物。
  • 从1张已安装的卡牌上移除所有病毒指示物。
威胁3 → 你还可以结算另一项。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following: * Place 1 advancement counter on each of up to 2 installed cards you can advance. * Remove all virus counters from 1 installed card. Threat 3 -> You may also resolve the other mode. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 3[credit]: +1 strength.
cn_text: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解最多2条门禁子进程。 3[credit]: 强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 3 credits: +1 strength.

en_text:
Play only as your first [click].
For the remainder of the turn, whenever you access a card not in Archives, trash it and suffer 1 meat damage.
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. For the remainder of the turn, whenever you access a card not in Archives, trash it and suffer 1 meat damage.

en_text:
When your turn begins, you may move up to 3[credit] from your credit pool to C.I. Fund.
When your turn begins, place 2[credit] on C.I. Fund from the bank if there are at least 6[credit] on it.
2[credit],[trash]: Take all credits from C.I. Fund.
cn_text:
当你的回合开始时，你可以从你的信用池中转移最多3[credit]到资本投资基金上。
当你的回合开始时，如果资本投资基金具有至少6[credit]，从银行中放置2[credit]到本卡牌上。
2[credit], [trash]: 从资本投资基金上拿取所有的信用点。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may move up to 3 credits from your credit pool to C.I. Fund. When your turn begins, place 2 credits on C.I. Fund from the bank if there are at least 6 credits on it. 2 credits,trash: Take all credits from C.I. Fund.

en_text: Place 3 virus counters on Cache when it is installed. Hosted virus counter: Gain 1[credit].
stripped_text: Place 3 virus counters on Cache when it is installed. Hosted virus counter: Gain 1 credit.

en_text:
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, the Corp gains 3[credit].
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, end the run.
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, the Corp gains 3 credits. Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, end the run.

en_text: [interrupt] → 3[credit]: Prevent 1 core damage or 1 net damage.
stripped_text: Interrupt -> 3 credits: Prevent 1 core damage or 1 net damage.

en_text: Remote server only. [trash]: Place 1 advancement counter on a card installed in the root of this server.
stripped_text: Remote server only. trash: Place 1 advancement counter on a card installed in the root of this server.

en_text: Gain 1[credit] for each installed connection resource.
cn_text: 每有一个已安装的人脉资源，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit for each installed connection resource.

en_text: [click]: Draw 2 cards. Use this ability only once per turn. When the Runner trashes this asset, you may draw 2 cards.
cn_text: [click]: 抽2张卡牌。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。 当潜袭者销毁本资产时，你可以抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: click: Draw 2 cards. Use this ability only once per turn. When the Runner trashes this asset, you may draw 2 cards.

en_text:
While the Runner is tagged, this ice gets +2 strength.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit] for each tag the Runner has.
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
只要潜袭者被锁定，本防火墙的强度便+2。
[subroutine] 潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: While the Runner is tagged, this ice gets +2 strength. Subroutine Gain 1 credit for each tag the Runner has. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: [click]: Gain 2[credit].
cn_text: [click]: 获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: click: Gain 2 credits.

en_text: Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, end the run.
cn_text: 每当潜袭者通过保护本服务器的所有防火墙时，你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, end the run.

en_text: [click]: Trash any number of cards from your grip. For each trashed card of which you have another copy installed, draw 1 card.
cn_text: [click]: 从你的操控器销毁任意数量的卡牌。每销毁一张与你已安装卡牌相同的卡牌，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: click: Trash any number of cards from your grip. For each trashed card of which you have another copy installed, draw 1 card.

cn_title: 帕德玛·伊斯比斯特船长: 无畏探索者
en_text: The first time each turn a run on R&D begins, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
cn_text: 每回合第一次对研发中心的潜袭开始时，你可以对1张你已安装的卡牌充能。（在一张已经有能量指示物的卡牌上再放置1枚。）
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run on R&D begins, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)

en_text: Whenever you bypass a piece of ice, you may remove this hardware from the game to derez that ice.
cn_text: 每当你略过一层防火墙时，你可以将本硬件移出游戏，以关闭该防火墙。
stripped_text: Whenever you bypass a piece of ice, you may remove this hardware from the game to derez that ice.

en_text: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3[credit] less.
cn_text: 从你的操控器安装1个资源，其安装费用减3[credit]。
stripped_text: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3 credits less.

en_text:
Play only as your first [click].
Choose 1 card installed in the root of or protecting a remote server. That card cannot be rezzed this turn.
cn_text:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
选择一张远程服务器内或保护远程服务器的卡牌。本回合该卡牌不能被激活。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. Choose 1 card installed in the root of or protecting a remote server. That card cannot be rezzed this turn.

en_text: If you made a successful run this turn, this program costs 2[credit] less to install. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
cn_text: 如果你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭，本程序的安装费用减2[credit]。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+3。
stripped_text: If you made a successful run this turn, this program costs 2 credits less to install. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.

en_text: +1[mu] Access → Trash 2 cards from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing. Use this ability only once per turn. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +1[mu] 读取 → 从你的操控器销毁2张卡牌: 销毁你正在读取的卡牌。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Access -> Trash 2 cards from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing. Use this ability only once per turn. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: Identify your mark. (If you don’t have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Gain 4[credit]. You may run your mark.
cn_text: 发现你的目标。（如果你没有目标，一台随机的中央服务器成为你本回合的目标。） 获得4[credit]。你可以潜袭你的目标。
stripped_text: Identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Gain 4 credits. You may run your mark.

en_text: Install 1 agenda from HQ faceup and host this operation on that agenda as a condition counter with "Whenever the Runner accesses host agenda, they take 2 tags."
cn_text: 从总部面朝上安装一个议案，并将试镜选角安装到该议案上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“每当潜袭者读取该议案时，他/她拿取2枚锁定标记。”
stripped_text: Install 1 agenda from HQ faceup and host this operation on that agenda as a condition counter with "Whenever the Runner accesses host agenda, they take 2 tags."

en_text: When you install this hardware, load 2 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to look at the top 4 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. [click], hosted power counter: Breach R&D. Use this ability only if you made a successful run on R&D this turn.
cn_text: 当你安装本硬件时，填装2枚能量指示物到本硬件上。当其清空时，销毁之。 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以移除1枚所附载的能量指示物，以查看研发中心顶端的4张卡牌并按任意顺序排列它们，代替侵入研发中心。 [click]，所附载的能量指示物: 侵入研发中心。只有你本回合已对研发中进行过成功的潜袭时，才能使用本能力。

Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to look at the top 4 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. click, hosted power counter: Breach R&D. Use this ability only if you made a successful run on R&D this turn.

en_text: The rez cost of each piece of code gate ice is increased by 1[credit]. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
cn_text: 每层门禁防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of code gate ice is increased by 1 credit. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

en_text: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting this server. Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they pay 2[credit] for each advanced piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进指示物到1层保护本服务器的防火墙上。 每当潜袭者接驳本服务器时，终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付等同于保护本服务器的已推进的防火墙二倍数量的信用点。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting this server. Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they pay 2 credits for each advanced piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, the Corp adds all cards in HQ to the top of R&D in the order of their choice.
cn_text: 对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，公司将总部中的所有卡牌按他/她所选择的顺序加入研发中心顶端，代替读取卡牌。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, the Corp adds all cards in HQ to the top of R&D in the order of their choice.
attribution: Designed by 2013 World Champion Jens Erickson

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Reveal up to 5 cards in HQ. Gain 2[credit] for each card you revealed this way.

作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
展示总部中的最多5张卡牌。你每以此法展示1张卡牌，获得2[credit]。

en_text: [subroutine] The Runner moves to the outermost position of the attacked server. They may jack out. Derez this ice.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, they must suffer 1 core damage or take 1 tag.
cn_text:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，他/她选择受到1点脑部伤害或拿取1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, they must suffer 1 core damage or take 1 tag.

en_text: Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.
cn_text: 你的手牌上限等于你信用池中信用点的数量。
stripped_text: Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.

en_text:
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, you may pay 3[credit] to do X core damage. X is equal to the number of hosted advancement counters.

你可以推进本资产。
当潜袭者读取已安装的本资产时，你可以花费3[credit]，以造成X点核心伤害。X等于所附载的推进指示物的数量。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, you may pay 3 credits to do X core damage. X is equal to the number of hosted advancement counters.

en_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner's identity loses its printed abilities.
cn_text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 潜袭者的特性规则文字成为空白。

en_text: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits during runs on central servers.

The Runner gets -2 maximum hand size.

潜袭者的手牌上限减2。
如果宏社长在读取时被销毁，将他加入潜袭者的分数区，作为一个价值2点议案分数的议案。

Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Chakana.

stripped_text: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.

[subroutine] Each player gains 2[credit].

en_text: Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice ends, place 1 power counter on Chief Slee for each unbroken subroutine on the encountered piece of ice. [click], 5 hosted power counters: Do 5 meat damage.
cn_text: 每当一层防火墙遭遇结束时，被遭遇的防火墙上每有一个未破解的子进程，放置1枚能量指示物到斯丽队长上。 [click], 5枚所附载的能量指示物: 造成5点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice ends, place 1 power counter on Chief Slee for each unbroken subroutine on the encountered piece of ice. click, 5 hosted power counters: Do 5 meat damage.

cn_text: 每当在对本服务器的潜袭中有一次成功的追踪时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful trace during a run on this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 region per server.

Host ice gets −1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
Whenever you encounter host ice, if its strength is 0 or less, trash it. Otherwise, place 1 virus counter on this program.

仅能安装在一层防火墙上。
本程序上每有1枚病毒指示物，被附载的防火墙的强度-1。
每当你遭遇被附载的防火墙时，如果其强度等于或小于0，销毁之。否则，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。

stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +1 strength.

en_text: When your turn begins, remove this resource from the game. Choose a server protected by ice. The Corp may trash 1 piece of ice protecting that server. If they do not, the first time this turn you breach either R&D or HQ, access 2 additional cards.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，将本资源移出游戏。选择一台有防火墙保护的服务器。公司可以销毁1层保护该服务器的防火墙。如果其未如此做，本回合你第一次侵入总部或研发中心时，额外读取2张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, remove this resource from the game. Choose a server protected by ice. The Corp may trash 1 piece of ice protecting that server. If they do not, the first time this turn you breach either R&D or HQ, access 2 additional cards.

en_text: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.
cn_text: 1[recurring-credit] 本信用点用于支付使用破解器。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.

en_text: [trash]: Install a program from your heap (paying the install cost).
cn_text: [trash]: 从你的堆阵安装一个程序（支付安装费用）。
stripped_text: trash: Install a program from your heap (paying the install cost).

en_text:
When you score Clone Retirement, you may remove 1 bad publicity.
When the Runner steals Clone Retirement, the Corp takes 1 bad publicity.
cn_text:
当你用克隆体退役计分时，你可以移除1枚负面声誉标记。
当潜袭者窃取克隆体退役时，公司拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When you score Clone Retirement, you may remove 1 bad publicity. When the Runner steals Clone Retirement, the Corp takes 1 bad publicity.

en_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 operation from Archives to HQ if there is no ice protecting this server.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，你可以将一个事务从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 operation from Archives to HQ if there is no ice protecting this server.

en_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When you score an agenda, add "Clones are not People" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
cn_text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 当你用一个议案计分时，将“克隆体不是人类”加入你的分数区，作为一个价值1点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When you score an agenda, add "Clones are not People" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
The Runner loses all credits in their credit pool.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. The Runner loses all credits in their credit pool.

en_text:
The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda.
When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
cn_text:
公司不能在其安装议案的同一回合将该议案计分。
当公司清除病毒指示物时，销毁本程序。
stripped_text: The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.

en_text:
Whenever an encounter with this ice ends, if it was rezzed this turn, trash 1 installed Runner card unless the Runner takes 2 tags or suffers 3 net damage.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 2 tags.
[subroutine] Do 3 net damage.
cn_text:
每当对本防火墙的遭遇结束时，如果本防火墙是在本回合中被激活的，销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌，除非潜袭者拿取2枚锁定标记或受到3点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 造成3点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever an encounter with this ice ends, if it was rezzed this turn, trash 1 installed Runner card unless the Runner takes 2 tags or suffers 3 net damage. Subroutine Trash 1 installed Runner card. Subroutine Give the Runner 2 tags. Subroutine Do 3 net damage.

en_text: When your turn begins, the Runner must pay 1[credit] or trash the top card of the stack.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，潜袭者必须支付1[credit]或销毁存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, the Runner must pay 1 credit or trash the top card of the stack.

en_text: When you install this program, place 2 power counters on it. Hosted power counter: Gain 2[credit]. Use this ability only during your turn.
cn_text: 当你安装本程序时，放置2枚能量指示物到本程序上。 所附载的能量指示物: 获得2[credit]。本能力仅能在你的回合中使用。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 2 power counters on it. Hosted power counter: Gain 2 credits. Use this ability only during your turn.

en_text:
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
cn_text:
[subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trash 1 program. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.

en_text: Whenever the Runner passes a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, the Runner must approach that ice again. They may jack out.
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner passes a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, the Runner must approach that ice again. They may jack out.

en_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may search your stack for 1 program. Install it, paying 3[credit] less for each piece of ice protecting R&D, and then take 1 tag.
cn_text: 对研发中心进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以在你的存储栈搜寻一个程序并安装它，代替读取卡牌。每有一层保护研发中心的防火墙，其安装费用减3，然后拿取1枚锁定标记。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may search your stack for 1 program. Install it, paying 3 credits less for each piece of ice protecting R&D, and then take 1 tag.

en_text:
When your turn begins, you may resolve 1 of the following:
  • Trash 1 card from HQ. If you do, gain 2[credit] and draw 1 card.
  • Turn 1 facedown card in Archives faceup. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
cn_text:
当你的回合开始时，你可以结算下列中的1项:
  • 从总部销毁1张卡牌。如果你如此做，获得2[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
  • 将档案库中1张牌面朝下的卡牌翻至牌面朝上。如果你如此做，放置1枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may resolve 1 of the following: * Trash 1 card from HQ. If you do, gain 2 credits and draw 1 card. * Turn 1 facedown card in Archives faceup. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.

en_text: Place 4[credit] on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run. When that run ends, trash 1 installed program you used during that run. Trashing a program this way cannot be prevented.
cn_text: 进行一次潜袭，并放置4[credit]到本卡牌上，你仅可以在本次潜袭中使用。当本次潜袭结束时，销毁一个你在本次潜袭中使用过的程序（不能被防止）。
stripped_text: Place 4 credits on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run. When that run ends, trash 1 installed program you used during that run. Trashing a program this way cannot be prevented.

en_text: [click]: Place 1 power counter on this upgrade. As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must spend [click] and 1[credit] for each hosted power counter. When your turn begins, remove all hosted power counters.
cn_text: [click]: 放置1枚能量指示物到本升级上。 作为潜袭本服务器的额外费用，每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，潜袭者必须花费[click]与1[credit]。 当你的回合开始时，移除所附载的所有能量指示物。
stripped_text: click: Place 1 power counter on this upgrade. As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must spend click and 1 credit for each hosted power counter. When your turn begins, remove all hosted power counters.

en_text: Draw 1 card whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.
cn_text: 每当公司激活一层防火墙时，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Draw 1 card whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.

en_text:
You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead give the Runner 2 tags.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead trash 1 installed program and 1 installed resource.
cn_text:
你可以推进本防火墙。每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，本防火墙的强度+1。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，改为给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，改为销毁1个已安装的程序与1个已安装的资源。
stripped_text: You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead give the Runner 2 tags. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead trash 1 installed program and 1 installed resource.

en_text: +1[mu] The first time you play an event each turn, you may play another event (without spending a click) after the first one resolves. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +1[mu] 每回合你第一次打出一个事件时，你可以在其结算完后打出另一个事件（无须花费一个时点）。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu The first time you play an event each turn, you may play another event (without spending a click) after the first one resolves. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: When your turn begins, gain 3[credit] if there is no ice protecting this server.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 3 credits if there is no ice protecting this server.

en_text: Choose a piece of ice. Gain 1[credit] for each advancement token on that ice.
cn_text: 选择一层防火墙。该防火墙上每有1枚推进标记，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Choose a piece of ice. Gain 1 credit for each advancement token on that ice.

en_text: Make a run. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during this run, you may search your stack or heap for a program and install it, ignoring all costs. When the run ends, add that program to the bottom of your stack if it is still installed.
stripped_text: Make a run. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during this run, you may search your stack or heap for a program and install it, ignoring all costs. When the run ends, add that program to the bottom of your stack if it is still installed.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner has 3 or more agenda points and they made a successful run during their last turn.
After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.
Choose a card name, then do 1 net damage. If you trash a card with the chosen name this way, repeat this process.
cn_text:
只有潜袭者拥有3点或更多议案分数且在其上回合进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
选择一个卡牌名称，然后造成1点网域伤害。如果你销毁了一张具有所选名称的卡牌，则重复本进程。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner has 3 or more agenda points and they made a successful run during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Choose a card name, then do 1 net damage. If you trash a card with the chosen name this way, repeat this process.

en_text:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit during traces.
Gain 1[credit] whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.
cn_text:
1[recurring-credit]
本信用点用于追踪。
每当公司激活一层防火墙时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit during traces. Gain 1 credit whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.

en_text:
Reveal the top card of your stack and place credits equal to its printed play or install cost on this event. Add the revealed card to your grip.
Run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
cn_text:
展示你的存储栈顶端的卡牌，并放置等于其印刷打出费用或安装费用的信用点到本事件上。将被展示的卡牌加入你的操控器。
潜袭任意一台服务器。你可以在本次潜袭中花费所附载的信用点。
stripped_text: Reveal the top card of your stack and place credits equal to its printed play or install cost on this event. Add the revealed card to your grip. Run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.

en_text: Whenever a successful run on R&D ends, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. [click]: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
cn_text: 每当对研发中心的一次成功的潜袭结束时，你可以放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 [click]: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取X张卡牌。X等于所附载的病毒指示物数量。
stripped_text: Whenever a successful run on R&D ends, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. click: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.

en_text:
When the Runner passes this ice, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit]. The Runner gains 1[credit].
cn_text:
当潜袭者通过本防火墙时，你获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 获得2[credit]。潜袭者获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When the Runner passes this ice, gain 1 credit. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. The Runner gains 1 credit.

en_text: When your turn begins, you may move an advancement token from a piece of ice to an installed piece of ice that can be advanced.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，你可以从一层防火墙上转移1枚推进标记到一层已安装并且能被推进的防火墙上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may move an advancement token from a piece of ice to an installed piece of ice that can be advanced.

en_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [weyland-consortium] cards in your deck. As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Search R&D for an operation and play it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.
cn_text: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[weyland-consortium]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。 在研发中心搜寻一个事务并打出它（支付所有的费用）。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance weyland-consortium cards in your deck. As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Search R&D for an operation and play it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.

en_text:
Whenever you trash a Corp card, you may place 1 virus counter on Consume.
[click]: Gain 2[credit] for each hosted virus counter, then remove all virus counters from Consume.
stripped_text: Whenever you trash a Corp card, you may place 1 virus counter on Consume. click: Gain 2 credits for each hosted virus counter, then remove all virus counters from Consume.

en_text: Place 3 virus counters on an installed Runner card with no hosted virus counters.
stripped_text: Place 3 virus counters on an installed Runner card with no hosted virus counters.

en_text: Contract Killer can be advanced. If there are at least 2 advancement tokens on Contract Killer, it gains: "[click], [trash]: Trash a connection or do 2 meat damage."
stripped_text: Contract Killer can be advanced. If there are at least 2 advancement tokens on Contract Killer, it gains: "click, trash: Trash a connection or do 2 meat damage."

en_text: Conundrum has +3 strength if there is an installed AI. [subroutine] The Runner trashes an installed program. [subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Conundrum has +3 strength if there is an installed AI. Subroutine The Runner trashes an installed program. Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: Whenever you install a virus program, you may place 1 virus counter on it.
cn_text: 每当你安装一个病毒程序时，你可以放置1枚病毒指示物到该程序上。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a virus program, you may place 1 virus counter on it.

en_text: Whenever you pass a piece of ice, you may trash Copycat. If you do, choose another rezzed copy of that piece of ice protecting any server. The run continues as if you had just passed the chosen piece of ice (you are now running from the new position).
cn_text: 每当你通过一层防火墙时，你可以销毁拷贝者。如果你如此做，选择保护任意服务器的另一层已激活的相同的防火墙。潜袭继续进行，如同你刚通过所选择的防火墙（现在，你从这个新位置继续潜袭）。
stripped_text: Whenever you pass a piece of ice, you may trash Copycat. If you do, choose another rezzed copy of that piece of ice protecting any server. The run continues as if you had just passed the chosen piece of ice (you are now running from the new position).

en_text:
When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it.
Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, you may remove 1 hosted virus counter to swap 1 piece of ice protecting that server with another installed piece of ice. Use this ability only once per turn.
cn_text:
当你安装本程序时，放置2枚病毒指示物到本程序上。
每当你对中央服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以移除1枚所附载的病毒指示物，以将1层保护该服务器的防火墙与另一层已安装的防火墙互换。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, you may remove 1 hosted virus counter to swap 1 piece of ice protecting that server with another installed piece of ice. Use this ability only once per turn.

en_text: Whenever the Corp draws a card with the basic action, reveal that card.
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp draws a card with the basic action, reveal that card.

en_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The first time you install a card each turn, the Corp loses 1[credit].
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The first time you install a card each turn, the Corp loses 1 credit.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Gain 6[credit] and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
cn_text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
获得6[credit]并抽2张卡牌。将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Gain 6 credits and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

en_text:
When you score Corporate Oversight, you may search R&D for a piece of ice. Install and rez it protecting a remote server, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.
If you win a game with Corporate Oversight in your score area, destroy it.
stripped_text: When you score Corporate Oversight, you may search R&D for a piece of ice. Install and rez it protecting a remote server, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D. If you win a game with Corporate Oversight in your score area, destroy it.

en_text:
When you score Corporate Oversight, you may search R&D for a piece of ice. Install and rez it protecting a central server, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.
If you win a game with Corporate Oversight in your score area, destroy it.
stripped_text: When you score Corporate Oversight, you may search R&D for a piece of ice. Install and rez it protecting a central server, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D. If you win a game with Corporate Oversight in your score area, destroy it.

en_text:
When you score Corporate Sales Team, place 10[credit] on it.
When each player's turn begins, take 1[credit] from Corporate Sales Team.
cn_text:
当你用公司销售组计分时，放置10[credit]到本卡牌上。
当每位玩家的回合开始时，从公司销售组上拿取1[credit]。
stripped_text: When you score Corporate Sales Team, place 10 credits on it. When each player's turn begins, take 1 credit from Corporate Sales Team.

en_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp has 1 additional bad publicity (even if they have 0).
cn_text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 公司具有1枚额外的负面声誉标记（即使其具有0枚）。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp has 1 additional bad publicity (even if they have 0).

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. Draw 5 cards.
cn_text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
将总部中的所有卡牌洗入研发中心。补五张卡牌。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. Draw 5 cards.

en_text:
As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda.
When your turn begins, you may trash 1 installed resource. Trashing a resource this way cannot be prevented.
cn_text:
作为激活本资产的额外费用，废除1个议案。
当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁1个已安装的资源。以此法销毁资源不能被防止。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda. When your turn begins, you may trash 1 installed resource. Trashing a resource this way cannot be prevented.

cn_text: X[credit]，[trash]: 选择1层已激活的保护本服务器的防火墙。该防火墙在本回合剩余时间内强度+X。
stripped_text: X credits, trash: Choose 1 rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. That ice gets +X strength for the remainder of the turn.

en_text: If you have at least 7[credit] when you score Corporate War, gain 7[credit]; otherwise, lose all credits in your credit pool.
cn_text: 如果当你用公司大战计分时，你具有至少7[credit]，获得7[credit]；否则，失去你信用池中所有的信用点。
stripped_text: If you have at least 7 credits when you score Corporate War, gain 7 credits; otherwise, lose all credits in your credit pool.

cn_text: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条屏障子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

stripped_text: trash: Choose a piece of ice. The Corp must pay 2 credits as an additional cost to rez that ice until the end of the turn.

en_text: Whenever the Corp rezzes an asset or upgrade, you may pay credits equal to its rez cost and trash Councilman. If you do, derez that asset or upgrade. The Corp cannot rez it for the remainder of this turn.
cn_text: 每当公司激活一个资产或升级时，你可以支付与其激活费用相等的信用点并销毁地方议员。如果你如此做，关闭该资产或升级。本回合的剩余时间内公司不能激活它。
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp rezzes an asset or upgrade, you may pay credits equal to its rez cost and trash Councilman. If you do, derez that asset or upgrade. The Corp cannot rez it for the remainder of this turn.

en_text: [click], [trash]: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching the attacked server, pay X[credit] if able, where X is equal to the number of tags you have. If you do, choose a number less than or equal to X. Access that many cards in and/or in the root of the attacked server. (If you cannot pay, you will not access anything.)

When you install this resource, load 3[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it and draw 1 card.
When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from this resource.
When your turn ends, if you made at least 3 successful runs this turn and this card is in your heap, you may install it, ignoring all costs.

当你的回合结束时，如果你在本回合内进行过至少3次成功的潜袭并且本卡牌在你的堆阵，你可以安装之，忽略所有的费用。

en_text: Interface → Trash a card from your grip: Break 1 subroutine. Trash a card from your grip: +2 strength.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. X[credit]: +X strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
cn_text: 1[credit]: 破解警报子进程。 X[credit]: 本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+X。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1信用点来使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. X credits: +X strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.

en_text:
Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal any number of copies of Fear the Masses from your grip. The Corp trashes X cards from the top of R&D, where X is equal to 1 plus the number of cards you revealed.
Limit 6 per deck.
cn_text:
对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，迫使公司销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌，代替读取卡牌。你可以从你的操控器展示X张群众可畏，以迫使公司额外销毁X张卡牌。
每套牌组限制6张。

en_text: When your turn begins, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Then, if this server is not protected by ice, you may draw 1 card.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，你可以查看研发中心顶端的3张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列它们。然后，如果如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，你可以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Then, if this server is not protected by ice, you may draw 1 card.

3[credit]: 防止1点网域伤害。
[trash]: 防止最多2点脑部伤害。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> 3 credits: Prevent 1 net damage. Interrupt -> trash: Prevent up to 2 core damage.

stripped_text: Run HQ. The first 2 times this run you encounter a piece of ice, bypass that ice. If successful, you cannot breach HQ.

cn_text: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+1。 当你安装本程序时，选择1层已安装的防火墙。 每当你遭遇所选择的防火墙时，你可以支付与该防火墙上子进程数量相等的[credit]。如果你如此做，略过该防火墙。

en_text:
When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
Whenever you make a successful run, you can spend hosted credits for the remainder of that run.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must pay 1[credit] or trash this resource.

当你的回合开始及你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以在本次潜袭的剩余时间内花费所附载的信用点。
当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，你必须支付1[credit]或者销毁本资源。
stripped_text: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1 credit on this resource. Whenever you make a successful run, you can spend hosted credits for the remainder of that run. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must pay 1 credit or trash this resource.

When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity.

[subroutine] End the run.

[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。

While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.

As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 2[credit].

Film Critic can host a single agenda.
Whenever you access an agenda, you may host that agenda on Film Critic (the agenda is no longer being accessed and is uninstalled).
[click],[click]: Add an agenda hosted on Film Critic to your score area.

影评家能被附载一个议案。
每当你读取一个议案时，你可以将该议案附载到影评家上（该议案不再视为被读取并且被卸载）。
[click], [click]: 将附载在影评家上的一个议案加入你的分数区。

As an additional cost to play this event, suffer 1 core damage.
Run R&D. If successful, access 3 additional cards when you breach R&D.

Play only if the Runner has at least 6[credit].

如果潜袭者具有至少6[credit]，才能打出。

只有潜袭者在其上回合进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。

Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash up to 2 resources.

如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
销毁最多两个资源。

en_text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Install up to 2 cards from Archives (paying all install costs).

在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。

cn_title: 边缘应用: 明日今天
en_text:
Draft format only.
If you have more [weyland-consortium] cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn begins, place an advancement token on a piece of ice.
cn_text:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已激活的[weyland-consortium]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当潜袭者的回合开始时，放置1枚推进标记到一层防火墙上。
stripped_text: Draft format only. If you have more weyland-consortium cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn begins, place an advancement token on a piece of ice.

en_text:
Rez only during your turn.
The first run each turn cannot be made against a remote server.
The first time each turn a run on Archives begins, if this server is not protected by ice, do 2 net damage.
cn_text:
仅能在你的回合中激活。
每回合的第一次潜袭不能对远程服务器进行。
每回合第一次对档案库的潜袭开始时，如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，造成2点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Rez only during your turn. The first run each turn cannot be made against a remote server. The first time each turn a run on Archives begins, if this server is not protected by ice, do 2 net damage.

en_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, do 2 net damage.
cn_text: 当本议案被计分或窃取时，造成2点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, do 2 net damage.

en_text:
Full Immersion RecStudio can host up to 2 assets and/or agendas.
The trash cost of Full Immersion RecStudio is increased by 3 for each card hosted on it.
cn_text:
全浸影音工作室能被附载最多两个资产和/或议案。
全浸影音工作室上每有一张所附载的卡牌，其销毁费用+3。
stripped_text: Full Immersion RecStudio can host up to 2 assets and/or agendas. The trash cost of Full Immersion RecStudio is increased by 3 for each card hosted on it.

en_text: Gain 2[credit] or draw 2 cards. Repeat this process for each remote server that has a card in its root and is protected by ice.
cn_text: 获得2[credit]或抽2张卡牌。你每有一台根目录中有卡牌且有防火墙保护的远程服务器，便重复一次该进程。
stripped_text: Gain 2 credits or draw 2 cards. Repeat this process for each remote server that has a card in its root and is protected by ice.

en_text: Whenever you and the Runner reveal secretly spent credits, do 1 meat damage if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.
cn_text: 每当你和潜袭者展示秘密花费的信用点时，如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，造成1点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever you and the Runner reveal secretly spent credits, do 1 meat damage if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.

en_text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, end the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 4[credit].
cn_text:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者拿取1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记，除非其支付4[credit]。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, end the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 4 credits.

en_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2 credits.

en_text: [trash]: Set aside the top 6 cards of your stack faceup. You may install 1 program or virtual resource from among those cards, paying 2[credit] less. Shuffle 3 of the remaining cards into your stack, then remove the rest from the game.
cn_text: [trash]: 将你的存储栈顶端的6张卡牌置于一旁。你可以从其中安装1个程序或虚拟资源，其安装费用减2[credit]。将剩余卡牌中的3张洗入你的存储栈，然后将余下的卡牌移出游戏。
stripped_text: trash: Set aside the top 6 cards of your stack faceup. You may install 1 program or virtual resource from among those cards, paying 2 credits less. Shuffle 3 of the remaining cards into your stack, then remove the rest from the game.

en_text: As an additional cost to access a card in the root of a remote server, the Runner must pay 1[credit].

If you have fewer cards in your grip than your maximum hand size, draw cards until you have cards in your grip equal to your maximum hand size.

作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。
如果你操控器中的卡牌数量少于你的手牌上限，补卡牌直到你操控器中的卡牌数量与你的手牌上限相等。

Play only if the Runner trashed a card while accessing it during their last turn.
Trace[2]. If successful, trash 2 installed non-program cards. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.

如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合销毁过被读取的公司卡牌，才能打出。

stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 virus counter on Hemorrhage. click, 2 hosted virus counters: The Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.

en_text: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine during a run on this server, gain 2[credit] if they are tagged.
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine during a run on this server, gain 2 credits if they are tagged.

en_text:
While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, they encounter it.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] You may pay up to 2[credit] to place that many advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
cn_text:
如果使者从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取使者时，他/她遭遇它。如果潜袭者从档案库读取使者，则忽略本能力。
[subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 公司可以支付最多2[credit]，以放置与其数量相等的推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。

en_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [jinteki] cards in your deck. Draw 3 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.

cn_title: 兵部学会: 通彻明晰
en_text: The first time each turn you reveal a card, gain 1[credit]. [click]: Reveal 1 card from the grip at random or the top card of the stack.
cn_text: 每回合你第一次展示一张卡牌时，获得1[credit]。 [click]: 从操控器随机展示1张卡牌或展示存储栈顶端的卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you reveal a card, gain 1 credit. click: Reveal 1 card from the grip at random or the top card of the stack.

en_text: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. When you play this operation, choose a server. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on the chosen server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, end the run.
cn_text: 只有当前没有正在生效的封锁时，才能打出。直到你的下回合开始前，本事务不会被销毁。 当你打出本事务时，选择一台服务器。 每当潜袭者对所选服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果两者数值不同，终止本次潜袭。

cn_text: 当你将本议案计分时，你可以销毁1张你的已激活卡牌。如果你如此做，销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌，其印刷安装费用须等于或小于你所销毁公司卡牌的印刷激活费用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may trash 1 of your rezzed cards. If you do, trash 1 installed Runner card with a printed install cost equal to or less than the printed rez cost of the Corp card you trashed.

en_text: When you score this agenda, draw up to 3 cards. You may add 1 agenda worth 1 or less agenda points from HQ to your score area.
cn_text: 当你将本议案计分时，抽最多3张卡牌。你可以从总部将1个价值1点或更少议案分数的议案加入你的分数区。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, draw up to 3 cards. You may add 1 agenda worth 1 or less agenda points from HQ to your score area.

en_text: [subroutine] You may choose 1 card in HQ. If you do, the Runner breaches HQ. During this breach, the Runner cannot access cards in the root of HQ, and the first card they access must be the chosen card. When the breach ends, trash this ice.
cn_text: [subroutine] 公司可以选择总部中的一张卡牌。潜袭者读取该卡牌。如果他/她如此做，销毁狐女。
stripped_text: Subroutine You may choose 1 card in HQ. If you do, the Runner breaches HQ. During this breach, the Runner cannot access cards in the root of HQ, and the first card they access must be the chosen card. When the breach ends, trash this ice.

en_text:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may have the Runner gain 2[credit]. If you do, choose 1 installed resource. That resource loses all abilities until your next turn ends.
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以令潜袭者获得2[credit]。如果你如此做，选择1个已安装的资源。该资源失去所有能力，直到你的下回合结束。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may have the Runner gain 2 credits. If you do, choose 1 installed resource. That resource loses all abilities until your next turn ends. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: Run any server. The first time you fully break a barrier during that run, trash that barrier.
cn_text: 进行一次潜袭。本次潜袭中你第一次破解一个屏障上的所有子进程时，销毁该屏障。
stripped_text: Run any server. The first time you fully break a barrier during that run, trash that barrier.

en_text: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on host ice. [click]: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caïssa program. If this program is hosted on ice, its [click] ability cannot be used to host it on the next inward or outward piece of ice.
cn_text: 2[credit]: 破解被附载的防火墙子进程。 [click]: 将马附载到一层未被西洋棋附载的防火墙上。如果马已附载，则仅能再附载到除当前被附载防火墙的前一层或后一层以外的防火墙上。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 subroutine on host ice. click: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caissa program. If this program is hosted on ice, its click ability cannot be used to host it on the next inward or outward piece of ice.

en_text: +3[mu] Use the MU on Knobkierie only for virus programs. The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may place 1 virus counter on an installed virus program. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: +3 mu Use the MU on Knobkierie only for virus programs. The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may place 1 virus counter on an installed virus program. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." subroutines for the remainder of this run. X is equal to the number of cards in the grip.
cn_text: 当潜袭者遭遇狛犬时，本次潜袭的剩余时间内潜袭者的操控器中每有一张卡牌，其获得“[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。”
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "Subroutine Do 1 net damage." subroutines for the remainder of this run. X is equal to the number of cards in the grip.

en_text: [trash]: Break the first subroutine on the encountered piece of ice.
stripped_text: trash: Break the first subroutine on the encountered piece of ice.

en_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, you may choose another rezzed piece of ice. The Runner encounters that ice. (When that encounter ends, if the run has not ended, finish encountering this ice.)
cn_text: 当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果两者数值不同，你可以选择另一层已激活的防火墙。潜袭者遭遇该防火墙。（当该遭遇结束时，如果潜袭没有终止，完成遭遇本防火墙。）
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2 credits. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, you may choose another rezzed piece of ice. The Runner encounters that ice. (When that encounter ends, if the run has not ended, finish encountering this ice.)

en_text:
Play only if you stole an agenda this turn.
Choose a server. The Corp trashes 1 piece of ice protecting that server.
cn_text:
如果你本回合已窃取过一个议案，才能打出。
选择一台服务器。公司销毁一层保护该服务器的防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only if you stole an agenda this turn. Choose a server. The Corp trashes 1 piece of ice protecting that server.

en_text: When your turn begins, you may trace[X], where X is equal to the number of hosted power counters. If successful, do 1 core damage and trash this asset. If unsuccessful, place 1 power counter on this asset.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trace[X], where X is equal to the number of hosted power counters. If successful, do 1 core damage and trash this asset. If unsuccessful, place 1 power counter on this asset.

en_text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Whenever you pass host ice, gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Whenever you pass host ice, gain 2 credits.

en_text: Remote server only. When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a card in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
cn_text: 仅能安装在远程服务器。 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进指示物到本服务器内的1张卡牌上。 每个服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Remote server only. When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a card in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, you may pay 2[credit]. If you do, it gains barrier for the remainder of that encounter. Use this ability only once per turn. Interface → 2[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines. 3[credit]: +6 strength.
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, you may pay 2 credits. If you do, it gains barrier for the remainder of that encounter. Use this ability only once per turn. Interface -> 2 credits: Break any number of barrier subroutines. 3 credits: +6 strength.

en_text: [subroutine] The Runner trashes an installed piece of hardware. Trash Lab Dog.
cn_text: [subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一个已安装的硬件。销毁实验室犬。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner trashes an installed piece of hardware. Trash Lab Dog.

en_text: Trash the top 3 cards of your stack. Shuffle 3 cards from your heap into your stack. Draw 1 card. Remove this event from the game instead of trashing it.
cn_text: 销毁你的存储栈顶端的3张卡牌。将3张卡牌从你的堆阵洗入你的存储栈。抽1张卡牌。将本事件移出游戏，代替销毁之。
stripped_text: Trash the top 3 cards of your stack. Shuffle 3 cards from your heap into your stack. Draw 1 card. Remove this event from the game instead of trashing it.
attribution: Designed by 2017 European Champion Mike Sheehan

en_text: Place 2 power counters on Labyrinthine Servers when you score it. Hosted power counter: Prevent the Runner from jacking out. The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run.
cn_text: 当你用服务器迷阵计分时，放置2枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的能量指示物: 防止潜袭者退出。本次潜袭的剩余时间内潜袭者不能退出。
stripped_text: Place 2 power counters on Labyrinthine Servers when you score it. Hosted power counter: Prevent the Runner from jacking out. The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run.

en_text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Lady Liberty. [click], [click], [click]: Add an agenda from HQ to your score area worth agenda points equal to the exact number of hosted power counters. Limit 1 region per server. Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Lady Liberty. click, click, click: Add an agenda from HQ to your score area worth agenda points equal to the exact number of hosted power counters. Limit 1 region per server. Limit 1 per deck.

en_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. All ice have +1 strength.
cn_text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 所有防火墙的强度+1。
stripped_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. All ice have +1 strength.

cn_title: 帕拉诺阿湖动物收容所
en_text: The first time each turn the Corp installs a card in the root of a server, you may trash the top card of your stack to draw 1 card.
cn_text: 每回合公司第一次在一台服务器的根目录中安装一张卡牌时，你可以销毁你的存储栈顶端的卡牌，以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Corp installs a card in the root of a server, you may trash the top card of your stack to draw 1 card.

en_text: Whenever you take the basic action to draw cards, increase the number of cards you draw by 1.
stripped_text: Whenever you take the basic action to draw cards, increase the number of cards you draw by 1.

en_text: Whenever you rez a card, place 1 power counter on Lakshmi Smartfabrics. X hosted power counters: Reveal an agenda worth X points from HQ. The Runner cannot steal copies of that agenda for the remainder of this turn.
cn_text: 每当你激活一张卡牌时，放置1枚能量指示物到吉祥天女智能面料上。 X枚所附载的能量指示物: 从总部展示一个价值X点议案分数的议案。本回合的剩余时间内潜袭者不能窃取与该议案相同的议案。
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a card, place 1 power counter on Lakshmi Smartfabrics. X hosted power counters: Reveal an agenda worth X points from HQ. The Runner cannot steal copies of that agenda for the remainder of this turn.

en_text:
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1[credit].
Trash Lamprey if the Corp purges virus counters.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1 credit. Trash Lamprey if the Corp purges virus counters.

en_text: When the Runner encounters Lancelot, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Lancelot gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. [subroutine] Trash 1 program.
cn_text: 当潜袭者遭遇兰斯洛特时，你可以从总部展示最多两张圣杯防火墙。本次潜袭的剩余时间内，兰斯洛特按你选择展示防火墙的顺序获得它们的子进程。 [subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Lancelot, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Lancelot gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. Subroutine Trash 1 program.

stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, you may force the Corp to draw 1 card.

cn_text: 每当你遭遇一层杀伤、毁灭者或观察者防火墙时，你可以销毁本程序，以略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of AP, destroyer, or observer ice, you may trash this program to bypass that ice.

cn_text: 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，如果你的操控器中的卡牌数量与公司总部中的卡牌数量相同，你可以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your discard phase ends, if you have the same number of cards in your grip as the Corp has in HQ, you may draw 1 card.

Place 6[credit] from the bank on Launch Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Launch Campaign, trash it.

当升空营销计划被激活时，从银行中放置6[credit]到本卡牌上。当升空营销计划上没有信用点时，销毁本卡牌。
当你的回合开始时，从升空营销计划上拿取2[credit]。
stripped_text: Place 6 credits from the bank on Launch Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Launch Campaign, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from Launch Campaign.

As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].

移除最多2枚锁定标记并补三张卡牌。

stripped_text: click, 1 credit: Expose 1 card. Use this ability only if you have made a successful run on HQ this turn.

小矮妖能被附载最多两个程序。

If the bids differ, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, the Runner moves to the outermost position of this server. They may jack out.

cn_text: 每当你在被锁定状态下侵入总部或研发中心时，额外读取1张卡牌。 威胁3 → 作为通过基础行动销毁本资源的额外费用，公司必须从总部销毁1张卡牌。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）

en_text: Make a run on a remote server. When the run ends, gain [click] and add Marathon to your grip instead of trashing it if the run was successful. You may not make another run on that server for the remainder of this turn.
stripped_text: Make a run on a remote server. When the run ends, gain click and add Marathon to your grip instead of trashing it if the run was successful. You may not make another run on that server for the remainder of this turn.

en_text: [trash]: You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, resolve 1 subroutine on a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
cn_text: [trash]: 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，结算一层已激活的保护本服务器的防火墙上的一个子进程。仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用本能力。
stripped_text: trash: You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, resolve 1 subroutine on a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

en_text: When you rez this asset, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this asset. [interrupt] → When this asset would be trashed, you may shuffle it into R&D instead of adding it to Archives. (It is still considered trashed.)
cn_text: 当你激活本资产时，填装8[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之。 当你的回合开始时，从本资产上拿取2[credit]。 [interrupt] → 当本资产将被销毁时，你可以将其洗入研发中心，代替加入档案库。（它仍然视为被销毁。）
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 8 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from this asset. Interrupt -> When this asset would be trashed, you may shuffle it into R&D instead of adding it to Archives. (It is still considered trashed.)

en_text: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. If you made a successful run this turn, this ability costs 1[credit] less to use. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
cn_text: 对接 → 2[credit]: 破解1条屏障子进程。如果你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭，本能力的费用减1[credit]。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. If you made a successful run this turn, this ability costs 1 credit less to use. 1 credit: +1 strength.

en_text: Whenever you spend an agenda counter, gain 1[credit]. [trash] or any agenda counter: Gain 2[credit].
cn_text: 每当你花费一枚议案指示物时，获得1[credit]。 [trash]或任一议案指示物: 获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you spend an agenda counter, gain 1 credit. trash or any agenda counter: Gain 2 credits.

en_text:
When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from Marked Accounts, if able.
[click]: Place 3[credit] from the bank on Marked Accounts.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, take 1 credit from Marked Accounts, if able. click: Place 3 credits from the bank on Marked Accounts.

en_text: [subroutine] The next piece of ice the Runner encounters gains "[subroutine] End the run." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.
cn_text: [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，潜袭者遭遇的下一层防火墙在其它所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Subroutine The next piece of ice the Runner encounters gains "Subroutine End the run." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
The Runner loses 3[credit] for each tag they have, then you gain 1[credit] for each credit lost this way.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. The Runner loses 3 credits for each tag they have, then you gain 1 credit for each credit lost this way.

en_text:
If the Runner is tagged when you score Market Research, place 1 agenda counter on it.
Market Research is worth 1 additional agenda point while it has an agenda counter on it.

如果当你用市场研究计分时，潜袭者被锁定，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。
当市场研究具有一个议案指示物时，其额外价值1点议案分数。
stripped_text: If the Runner is tagged when you score Market Research, place 1 agenda counter on it. Market Research is worth 1 additional agenda point while it has an agenda counter on it.

en_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] End the run.

[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。

cn_text: +1[mu] 你的手牌上限+3。 当你安装本硬件时，受到1点核心伤害。每当公司将一个议案计分时，破坏1。（公司选择从总部或研发中心顶端销毁1张卡牌。） 每位玩家限制1个控制台。

en_text:
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].

cn_text: +1[mu]。 每回合你第一次安装一个硬件时，抽1张卡牌。 每当一次潜袭开始时，你可以从你的操控器安装1个硬件，其安装费用加1[credit]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。

当潜袭者遭遇矩阵分析者时，你可以支付1[credit]，以放置1枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
