Trace[6]. If successful, give the Runner X tags. X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded their link strength.
cn_text:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合窃取过一个议案，才能打出。
<trace>追踪 6</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者数枚锁定标记，其数量等于你追踪强度超过他/她中转强度的差值。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn. Trace[6]. If successful, give the Runner X tags. X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded their link strength.

en_text: During runs on this server, the Runner must pay 1[credit] as an additional cost to use an icebreaker ability to break subroutines. Limit 1 region per server.
cn_text: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，每次潜袭者使用破解器来破解至少一个子进程时，他/她必须支付1[credit]作为额外的费用。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: During runs on this server, the Runner must pay 1 credit as an additional cost to use an icebreaker ability to break subroutines. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
cn_text: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine.

en_text: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, choose another server. The Runner moves to the outermost position of that server instead of passing this ice. For the remainder of this run, the Runner must add 1 installed Runner card to the bottom of their stack as an additional cost to jack out. The Runner may jack out.
cn_text: 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，选择另一台服务器。潜袭者现在开始对该服务器进行潜袭，代替通过心智游戏。本次潜袭的剩余时间内，作为退出的额外费用，潜袭者必须将一张已安装的卡牌加入他/她的存储栈底端。
stripped_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, choose another server. The Runner moves to the outermost position of that server instead of passing this ice. For the remainder of this run, the Runner must add 1 installed Runner card to the bottom of their stack as an additional cost to jack out. The Runner may jack out.

en_text: +1[mu] Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may place 1 power counter on this hardware. [click], 3 hosted power counters: Breach R&D. You cannot access cards in the root of R&D during this breach. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may place 1 power counter on this hardware. click, 3 hosted power counters: Breach R&D. You cannot access cards in the root of R&D during this breach. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text:
Resolve 1 of the following:
  • Gain 4[credit] and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
  • Do X net damage. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has, up to 3.
cn_text:
结算下列中的1项:
  • 获得4[credit]并抽2张卡牌。将1张卡牌从总部加入到研发中心顶端。
  • 造成X点网域伤害。X等于潜袭者的锁定标记数量（最多为3）。
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following: * Gain 4 credits and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D. * Do X net damage. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has, up to 3.

en_text: [subroutine] You may install a piece of ice from HQ as the outermost piece of ice protecting this server, ignoring all install costs.
cn_text: [subroutine] 你可以从总部安装一层防火墙作为保护本服务器的最外层防火墙，忽略所有的安装费用。
stripped_text: Subroutine You may install a piece of ice from HQ as the outermost piece of ice protecting this server, ignoring all install costs.

en_text:
Play only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
The Corp must pay 5[credit] or take 1 bad publicity. Remove Mining Accident from the game instead of trashing it.
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. The Corp must pay 5 credits or take 1 bad publicity. Remove Mining Accident from the game instead of trashing it.

en_text:
Whenever an encounter with this ice ends, if the Runner broke its printed subroutine, the Runner moves to the outermost position of Archives instead of passing this ice. They may jack out. Derez this ice.
[subroutine] You may draw 1 card. Then, shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.
stripped_text: Whenever an encounter with this ice ends, if the Runner broke its printed subroutine, the Runner moves to the outermost position of Archives instead of passing this ice. They may jack out. Derez this ice. Subroutine You may draw 1 card. Then, shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.

en_text: +2[mu] Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may replace 1 spent recurring credit. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +2[mu] 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以重新放置1个已花费的再生信用点。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may replace 1 spent recurring credit. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: If the first, second, and third actions you take on your turn are each different from one another, when the third action completes, you may gain 1[credit] or take another different action, paying [click] less.
cn_text: 在你的回合内，若你执行的第一、第二和第三个行动皆不相同，当第三个行动结算完毕时，你可以获得1[credit]或执行另外一个不同的行动，减少支付1[click]。
stripped_text: If the first, second, and third actions you take on your turn are each different from one another, when the third action completes, you may gain 1 credit or take another different action, paying click less.

en_text: [click], [click], X[credit]: Remove X tags.
cn_text: [click], [click], X[credit]: 移除X枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: click, click, X credits: Remove X tags.

en_text:
Place 12[credit] from the bank on Miss Bones when she is installed. When there are no credits left on Miss Bones, trash her.
Use these credits to trash installed cards.
stripped_text: Place 12 credits from the bank on Miss Bones when she is installed. When there are no credits left on Miss Bones, trash her. Use these credits to trash installed cards.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Install up to 2 cards from HQ, creating a new remote server each time. Place 2 advancement counters on each of those cards. You cannot score or rez either of those cards this turn.
cn_text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
从总部安装最多2张卡牌，为其各创建一台新的远程服务器。在这些卡牌上各放置2枚推进指示物。你本回合不能将这些卡牌计分或激活。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install up to 2 cards from HQ, creating a new remote server each time. Place 2 advancement counters on each of those cards. You cannot score or rez either of those cards this turn.

en_text: Whenever you encounter a sentry, you may install this program from your heap. 3[credit]: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the sentry you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.
cn_text: 每当你遭遇一个警报时，你可以从你的堆阵安装MKUltra（支付其安装费用）。 3[credit]: 强度+2。如可能，破解最多2个警报子进程。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a sentry, you may install this program from your heap. 3 credits: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the sentry you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.

en_text:
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 2 cards of the stack.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 3 cards of the stack.
[subroutine] Do 3 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 4 cards of the stack.
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 2 cards of the stack. Subroutine Do 2 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 3 cards of the stack. Subroutine Do 3 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 4 cards of the stack.

en_text: Make a run on R&D. If successful, you may make another run on R&D when this run ends. If the second run is successful, gain 4[credit].
stripped_text: Make a run on R&D. If successful, you may make another run on R&D when this run ends. If the second run is successful, gain 4 credits.

en_text: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the install cost by 3.
stripped_text: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the install cost by 3.

en_text: You cannot use this program to break subroutines on more than one ice per run. Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
cn_text: 每次潜袭你不能使用猫鼬来破解多于一层防火墙上的子进程。 1[credit]: 破解最多2个警报子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+2。
stripped_text: You cannot use this program to break subroutines on more than one ice per run. Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 2 credits: +2 strength.

en_text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Host ice gets −2 strength. Each other piece of ice protecting this server gets −1 strength.
cn_text:
仅能安装在一层防火墙上。
被附载的防火墙的强度-2。所有其它保护本服务器的防火墙的强度-1。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Host ice gets -2 strength. Each other piece of ice protecting this server gets -1 strength.

en_text: +3[mu] When you install this hardware, install up to 3 programs from your grip, paying 4[credit] less for each. [interrupt] → Trash 1 program from your grip: Prevent 1 core damage or 1 net damage. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +3[mu] 当你安装巨岩时，从你的操控器安装最多三个程序，每个程序的安装费用减4[credit]。 从你的操控器销毁一个程序: 防止1点脑部伤害或网域伤害。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +3 mu When you install this hardware, install up to 3 programs from your grip, paying 4 credits less for each. Interrupt -> Trash 1 program from your grip: Prevent 1 core damage or 1 net damage. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: Remove this asset from the game: Trash up to 2 cards from HQ. Reveal up to 2 facedown cards in Archives and shuffle them into R&D. For each agenda revealed this way, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
cn_text: 将本资产移出游戏: 从总部销毁最多2张卡牌。展示档案库中最多2张牌面朝下的卡牌，并将其洗入研发中心。每以此法展示1个议案，你可以放置1枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: Remove this asset from the game: Trash up to 2 cards from HQ. Reveal up to 2 facedown cards in Archives and shuffle them into R&D. For each agenda revealed this way, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
attribution: Designed by the Borealis Playtesters

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break any number of barrier subroutines.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash 3 cards from your grip.
Gain 3[credit] and draw 3 cards.
cn_text:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，从你的操控器销毁3张卡牌。
获得3[credit]并抽3张卡牌。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash 3 cards from your grip. Gain 3 credits and draw 3 cards.

en_text:
Mother Goddess gains the subtypes of all other rezzed ice.
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
母神获得其它所有已激活防火墙的子类型。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Mother Goddess gains the subtypes of all other rezzed ice. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of your stack.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，你可以查看你存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of your stack.

en_text: When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is installed, you may pay 2[credit] to do 1 core damage. If the Runner has any [click] remaining, they may lose all their [click] to prevent this damage.
cn_text: 当潜袭者读取已安装的本升级时，你可以花费2[credit]以造成1点核心伤害。如果潜袭者有剩余的[click]，其可以失去其所有[click]，以防止本伤害。
stripped_text: When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is installed, you may pay 2 credits to do 1 core damage. If the Runner has any click remaining, they may lose all their click to prevent this damage.

en_text: [click]: Draw 2 cards. When you do, add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack.
stripped_text: click: Draw 2 cards. When you do, add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack.

en_text: Whenever the Runner takes 1 or more tags, do 1 meat damage.
cn_text: 每当潜袭者拿取1枚或更多的锁定标记时，造成1点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner takes 1 or more tags, do 1 meat damage.

en_text: Whenever the Runner approaches a server, you may install 1 piece of ice from HQ in the innermost position protecting that server, ignoring all costs. The Runner moves to that ice and approaches it. If this is not the first time they have approached a piece of ice this run, they may jack out. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches a server, you may install 1 piece of ice from HQ in the innermost position protecting that server, ignoring all costs. The Runner moves to that ice and approaches it. If this is not the first time they have approached a piece of ice this run, they may jack out. Use this ability only once per turn.

en_text: Use this hardware only by spending credits from stealth cards. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, you may pay 1[credit] to access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may pay 2[credit] to access 1 additional card when you breach R&D.
cn_text: 本硬件仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用。 每当你对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以支付1[credit]。如果你如此做，当你侵入总部时，额外读取1张卡牌。 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以支付2[credit]。如果你如此做，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取1张卡牌。
stripped_text: Use this hardware only by spending credits from stealth cards. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, you may pay 1 credit to access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may pay 2 credits to access 1 additional card when you breach R&D.

en_text:
When you rez Muckraker, take 1 bad publicity.
[subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
cn_text:
当你激活揭发者时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 1</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez Muckraker, take 1 bad publicity. Subroutine Trace[1]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged.

en_text:
When you install Muertos Gang Member, the Corp must derez a card.
When Muertos Gang Member is uninstalled, the Corp may rez a card, ignoring the rez cost.
[trash]: Draw 1 card.
cn_text:
当你安装亡灵帮成员时，公司必须关闭一张卡牌。
当亡灵帮成员被卸载时，公司可以激活一张卡牌，忽略激活费用。
[trash]: 补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install Muertos Gang Member, the Corp must derez a card. When Muertos Gang Member is uninstalled, the Corp may rez a card, ignoring the rez cost. trash: Draw 1 card.

en_text:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to pay for using programs.
cn_text:
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于支付使用程序。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits Use these credits to pay for using programs.

en_text:
This card costs 0 influence if you have 15 or fewer ice in your deck.
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to rez cards.
cn_text:
如果你的牌组中有15张或更少的防火墙，本卡牌影响力为0。
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于激活卡牌。
stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 15 or fewer ice in your deck. 2 recurring credits Use these credits to rez cards.

en_text: Whenever the Runner passes a piece of ice protecting this server, you may swap that ice with another piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.
cn_text: 每当潜袭者通过保护本服务器的一层防火墙时，你可以将该防火墙与保护本服务器的另一层防火墙互换。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner passes a piece of ice protecting this server, you may swap that ice with another piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text: [click]: Search R&D for an alliance card, reveal it, and play or install it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.
cn_text: [click]: 在研发中心搜寻一张联盟卡牌，将其展示，并打出或安装它（支付所有的费用）。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: click: Search R&D for an alliance card, reveal it, and play or install it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.

en_text:
When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on Mumbad Construction Co.
2[credit]: Move 1 advancement token from Mumbad Construction Co. to a faceup card.
cn_text:
当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进标记到孟巴德建设公司上。
2[credit]: 从孟巴德建设公司上转移1枚推进标记到一张面朝上的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on Mumbad Construction Co. 2 credits: Move 1 advancement token from Mumbad Construction Co. to a faceup card.

en_text:
This upgrade costs 0 influence if you have 7 or more assets in your deck.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is installed, they must trash it, if able.
cn_text:
如果你的牌组中有7张或更多的资产，本卡牌影响力为0。
如果潜袭者读取已安装的孟巴德虚拟之旅，如可能，他/她必须销毁它。
stripped_text: This upgrade costs 0 influence if you have 7 or more assets in your deck. When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is installed, they must trash it, if able.

en_text: [interrupt] → The first time each turn you would suffer meat damage, prevent 1 meat damage.
cn_text: 防止每回合的第一点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> The first time each turn you would suffer meat damage, prevent 1 meat damage.

en_text: Whenever you make a successful run, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface → Any virus counter: Break sentry subroutine. Any virus counter: +1 strength.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface -> Any virus counter: Break sentry subroutine. Any virus counter: +1 strength.

en_text: When you install this program, search your stack, heap, or grip for 1 non-daemon program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If that program is a trojan, install it on a piece of ice. Otherwise, install it on this program.
cn_text: 当你安装本程序时，在你的存储栈、堆阵或操控器搜寻1个非后台程序。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）如果该程序是木马，将其安装到一层防火墙上。否则，将其安装到本程序上。
stripped_text: When you install this program, search your stack, heap, or grip for 1 non-daemon program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If that program is a trojan, install it on a piece of ice. Otherwise, install it on this program.

en_text:
This asset costs 0 influence if you have 50 or more cards in your deck.
When your turn begins, you may shuffle 1 card from Archives into R&D.
cn_text:
如果你的牌组中有50张或更多的卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。
当你的回合开始时，你可以将一张卡牌从档案库洗入研发中心。
<errata>勘误自FAQ 3.1</errata>
stripped_text: This asset costs 0 influence if you have 50 or more cards in your deck. When your turn begins, you may shuffle 1 card from Archives into R&D.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Install 1 asset, agenda, or upgrade from HQ in the root of a new server. Place 3 advancement counters on that card. You cannot score or rez that card until your next turn begins.
cn_text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
从总部安装一个资产，议案或升级到一台新的远程服务器内。放置3枚推进标记到该卡牌上。你不能计分或激活该卡牌，直到你的下回合开始。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install 1 asset, agenda, or upgrade from HQ in the root of a new server. Place 3 advancement counters on that card. You cannot score or rez that card until your next turn begins.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, trash a rezzed piece of ice.
Reveal cards from the top of R&D until you reveal a piece of ice. Install and rez that ice in the same position as the ice that was trashed, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.
cn_text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，销毁一层已激活的防火墙。
展示研发中心顶端的卡牌，直到展示了一层防火墙。在被销毁防火墙的相同位置安装并激活该防火墙，忽略所有的费用。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, trash a rezzed piece of ice. Reveal cards from the top of R&D until you reveal a piece of ice. Install and rez that ice in the same position as the ice that was trashed, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.

en_text: Search your stack for 1 icebreaker and reveal it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If you made a successful run this turn, you may install that program. If you do not, add it to your grip.
cn_text: 在你的存储栈搜寻1个破解器程序并展示之。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）如果你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭，你可以安装该程序。如果你未安装该程序，将其加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Search your stack for 1 icebreaker and reveal it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If you made a successful run this turn, you may install that program. If you do not, add it to your grip.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click][click].
Trash any number of your rezzed cards. Give the Runner 1 tag for each card trashed this way.
cn_text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click][click]。
销毁任意数量你已激活的卡牌。你每以此法销毁1张卡牌，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend clickclick. Trash any number of your rezzed cards. Give the Runner 1 tag for each card trashed this way.
attribution: Designed by 2020 Asia-Pacific Champion Eric Keilback

en_text: Root of HQ or R&D only. Whenever the Runner breaches this server, they access 3 additional cards. When the breach ends, gain 2[credit] for each time the Runner accessed a card during that breach. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_text: Root of HQ or R&D only. Whenever the Runner breaches this server, they access 3 additional cards. When the breach ends, gain 2 credits for each time the Runner accessed a card during that breach. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text:
When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
You can spend hosted credits to play events.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must trash 1 card from your grip at random or trash this resource.
cn_text:
当你的回合开始或你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
你可以花费所附载的信用点以打出事件。
当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，你必须从你的操控器中随机销毁1张卡牌或者销毁本资源。

en_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice after an approach during which that ice was rezzed, lose all credits in your credit pool. Gain credits equal to the rez cost of that ice.

stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice after an approach during which that ice was rezzed, lose all credits in your credit pool. Gain credits equal to the rez cost of that ice.

2[recurring-credit]

[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.

en_text:
This card costs 0 influence if you have 3 PAD Campaigns in your deck.
[click]: Place 1 advancement token on a card. You cannot score that card until your next turn begins.

如果你的牌组中有3张掌上营销计划，本卡牌影响力为0。
[click]: 放置1枚推进标记到一张卡牌上。你不能计分该卡牌，直到你的下回合开始。

en_text:
The first time the Corp gains credits through a card ability each turn, you may gain 1[credit].
[click], 3[credit]: Trash PAD Tap. Only the Corp can use this ability.
stripped_text: The first time the Corp gains credits through a card ability each turn, you may gain 1 credit. click, 3 credits: Trash PAD Tap. Only the Corp can use this ability.

en_text: The first time you install a card each turn (including Paige Piper), you may search your stack for any number of copies of that card and add them to your heap. Shuffle your stack.
cn_text: 每回合你第一次安装一张卡牌（包括佩姬·派珀）时，你可以在你的存储栈搜寻任意数量的该卡牌，并将它们加入你的堆阵。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: The first time you install a card each turn (including Paige Piper), you may search your stack for any number of copies of that card and add them to your heap. Shuffle your stack.

en_text: [click]: Choose a rezzed piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate or barrier until the end of the next run this turn.
cn_text: [click]: 选择一层已激活的防火墙。该防火墙获得警报，门禁或屏障，直到本回合的下一次潜袭结束。
stripped_text: click: Choose a rezzed piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate or barrier until the end of the next run this turn.

en_text: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install non-connection cards. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, trash 1 of your installed cards.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时及每当你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。 你可以花费所附载的信用点以安装非人脉卡牌。 当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，销毁1张你已安装的卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1 credit on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install non-connection cards. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, trash 1 of your installed cards.

en_text: When your turn begins, each player draws 1 card.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，每位玩家补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, each player draws 1 card.

cn_title: 帕拉纳食品: 可持续成长
en_text: The first time each turn the Runner draws a card, gain 1[credit].
cn_text: 每回合潜袭者第一次补牌时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner draws a card, gain 1 credit.

en_text:
While this ice is protecting a remote server, it gets +2 strength.
[subroutine] End the run.

只要本防火墙保护远程服务器，其强度便+2。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: While this ice is protecting a remote server, it gets +2 strength. Subroutine End the run.

en_text:
When you install this hardware, suffer 1 meat damage.
The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1[credit]. If they do, gain 1[credit].
cn_text:
当你安装本硬件时，受到1点肢体伤害。
每回合你第一次对总部进行成功的潜袭时，公司失去1[credit]。如果其如此做，你获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, suffer 1 meat damage. The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1 credit. If they do, gain 1 credit.

en_text: Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may have it gain 1 subtype of your choice that is not sentry, code gate, or barrier for the remainder of this run.
cn_text: 每回合一次，当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以使其在本次潜袭的剩余时间内获得除警报，门禁和屏障以外你所选择的一种子类型。
stripped_text: Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may have it gain 1 subtype of your choice that is not sentry, code gate, or barrier for the remainder of this run.

en_text:
Install only in the root of HQ.
1[credit]: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only during a run on HQ.
cn_text:
仅能安装在总部的根目录。
1[credit]: 补一张卡牌。仅能在对总部的潜袭中使用本能力。
stripped_text: Install only in the root of HQ. 1 credit: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only during a run on HQ.

en_text: +1[mu] Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 1[credit]. Then, you may install 1 card from your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +1[mu] 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，获得1[credit]。然后，你可以从你的操控器安装1张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 1 credit. Then, you may install 1 card from your grip. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text:
You are tagged.
Prevent all meat damage.
cn_text:
你视为被锁定。
防止所有的肢体伤害。

en_text: When you score Paper Trail, Trace[6]. If successful, trash all connection and job resources.
stripped_text: When you score Paper Trail, Trace[6]. If successful, trash all connection and job resources.

en_text:
Play only as your first [click].
Remove all tags.

仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
移除所有的锁定标记。

When the Runner fully breaks this ice, trash it.
[subroutine] End the run.

在一次遭遇中，如果纸墙上的所有子进程被破解，销毁纸墙。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When the Runner fully breaks this ice, trash it. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may install this program from your heap. X[credit]: +X strength. Then, if this program can interface with the barrier you are encountering, break up to X subroutines.
cn_text: 每当你遭遇一个屏障时，你可以从你的堆阵安装回形针（支付其安装费用）。 X[credit]: 强度+X。如可能，破解最多X个屏障子进程。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may install this program from your heap. X credits: +X strength. Then, if this program can interface with the barrier you are encountering, break up to X subroutines.

en_text: +1[mu] The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may gain 1[credit] and look at the top card of your stack. If you do, you may add that card to the bottom of your stack. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: +1 mu The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may gain 1 credit and look at the top card of your stack. If you do, you may add that card to the bottom of your stack. Limit 1 console per player.

Install only on a rezzed piece of ice.
When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Host ice gets -1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
When the strength of host ice is 0 or less, trash it.

en_text: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs of assets.

cn_text: 1[credit]: 破解门禁子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+2。 通行证不能对保护远程服务器的防火墙使用。

When your turn begins, you may choose a server.
The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, draw 2 cards.

本回合你第一次对该服务器进行成功的潜袭时，补两张卡牌，代替读取卡牌。

en_text: [click]: Host 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip faceup on this resource. 1[credit]: Install 1 hosted card. The first card you install this way during each of your turns costs 1[credit] less to install for each unique ({unique}) connection resource you have installed.
cn_text: [click]: 从你的操控器牌面朝上附载1个程序或硬件到本资源上。 1[credit]: 安装1张所附载的卡牌。你每有1个已安装的独有（{unique}）人脉资源，每个你的回合你以此法安装的第一张卡牌安装费用减1[credit]。

en_text: [click]: Host this program on the outermost piece of ice protecting a central server. Whenever you make a successful run while this program is hosted on a piece of ice, host it on the next inward piece of ice. If you cannot, trash this program and install 1 other Caïssa program from your grip or heap, ignoring all costs.
cn_text: [click]: 将兵附载到保护一台中央服务器的最外层防火墙上。 当兵附载在一层防火墙上时，每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，如可能，转移兵到当前被附载防火墙的后一层防火墙；否则，以销毁兵代替，并从你的操控器或堆阵安装一个西洋棋程序，忽略所有的费用。 勘误自FAQ 3.0.1

Play only as your first [click] and only if the Corp scored no agendas during their last turn.

获得10[credit]。公司获得5[credit]。本回合你不能发起任何潜袭。

stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Whenever you pass host ice, you may gain click. If this is not the first time you gained click during a run this turn, add this program to your grip.

en_text:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching the attacked server, access 1 card in the root of another server. If that card is an agenda, you cannot steal or trash it during this access.
cn_text: 潜袭任意一台服务器。如果成功，读取另一台服务器根目录中的1张卡牌，代替侵入被攻击的服务器。如果该卡牌是议案，你本次读取中不能窃取或销毁之。
stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching the attacked server, access 1 card in the root of another server. If that card is an agenda, you cannot steal or trash it during this access.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

en_text:
As an additional cost to rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity or remove 1 tag.
[subroutine] You may draw 1 card.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] End the run if there are more cards in HQ than in the grip.
cn_text:
作为激活本防火墙的额外费用，拿取1枚负面声誉标记或移除1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 你可以抽1张卡牌。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 如果总部中的卡牌数量多于操控器，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity or remove 1 tag. Subroutine You may draw 1 card. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine End the run if there are more cards in HQ than in the grip.

en_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Search R&D for 1 operation or agenda and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that card to HQ. Threat 3 → You may play or install 1 card from HQ. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
cn_text: 作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。 在研发中心搜寻1个事务或议案并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）将该卡牌加入总部。 威胁3 → 你可以从总部打出或安装1张卡牌。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Search R&D for 1 operation or agenda and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that card to HQ. Threat 3 -> You may play or install 1 card from HQ. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)

en_text:
When you install Plague, choose a server.
Whenever you make a successful run on the chosen server, you may place 2 virus counters on Plague.
stripped_text: When you install Plague, choose a server. Whenever you make a successful run on the chosen server, you may place 2 virus counters on Plague.

en_text:
Plan B can be advanced.
If the Runner accesses Plan B, you may reveal and score an agenda from HQ with an advancement requirement equal to or less than the number of advancement tokens on Plan B.
cn_text:
备用计划能被推进。
如果潜袭者读取备用计划，你可以从总部将一个推进需求等于或小于备用计划上推进标记数量的议案展示并计分。
stripped_text: Plan B can be advanced. If the Runner accesses Plan B, you may reveal and score an agenda from HQ with an advancement requirement equal to or less than the number of advancement tokens on Plan B.

en_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click]. Search your stack for a run event and play that run event (paying its play cost), ignoring any additional costs. Shuffle your stack.
cn_text: 作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。 在你的存储栈搜寻一个潜袭事件，并打出该潜袭事件（支付其打出费用），忽略任何额外的费用。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Search your stack for a run event and play that run event (paying its play cost), ignoring any additional costs. Shuffle your stack.

en_text: Place 4 power counters on Plascrete Carapace when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Plascrete Carapace, trash it. Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.
cn_text: 当凝塑铠甲被安装时，放置4枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。当凝塑铠甲上没有能量指示物时，销毁本卡牌。 所附载的能量指示物: 防止1点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Place 4 power counters on Plascrete Carapace when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Plascrete Carapace, trash it. Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.

en_text: When you install this hardware, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 subroutines. Use this ability only if you have already broken a subroutine during this encounter.
cn_text: 当你安装本硬件时，填装3枚能量指示物到本硬件上。当其清空时，销毁之。 所附载的能量指示物: 破解最多2条子进程。只有你在本次遭遇期间已破解过子进程时，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 subroutines. Use this ability only if you have already broken a subroutine during this encounter.

en_text: Whenever you draw an agenda, you may reveal and install it.
cn_text: 每当你补到一个议案时，你可以展示并安装它。
stripped_text: Whenever you draw an agenda, you may reveal and install it.

en_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, host this event on an agenda in the Corp's score area as a condition counter with "Host agenda is worth 1 less agenda point. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this counter."
cn_text: 对档案库进行一次潜袭。如果成功，将政治涂鸦加入公司分数区中的一个议案上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“该议案价值的议案分数减1。如果公司清除病毒指示物，销毁政治涂鸦。”，代替读取卡牌。
stripped_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, host this event on an agenda in the Corp's score area as a condition counter with "Host agenda is worth 1 less agenda point. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this counter."

en_text: Install only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. [trash], X[credit]: Trash 1 rezzed card with trash cost equal to X.
cn_text: 如果你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭，才能安装。 [trash], 支付一张已激活卡牌的销毁费用: 销毁该卡牌。
stripped_text: Install only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. trash, X credits: Trash 1 rezzed card with trash cost equal to X.

en_text: +1[mu], +1[link] The first time each turn you pass all of the ice protecting HQ, you may draw 1 card to force the Corp to draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: +1 mu, +1 link The first time each turn you pass all of the ice protecting HQ, you may draw 1 card to force the Corp to draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
cn_text:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，你获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付1[credit]。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1 credit. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 1 credit.

en_text: Play only if you have a seedy card installed. The Corp gets -1 allotted [click] for their next turn.
cn_text: 如果你具有至少一张已安装的低劣卡牌，才能打出。 公司在他/她的下回合用来花费的[click]减1。
stripped_text: Play only if you have a seedy card installed. The Corp gets -1 allotted click for their next turn.

en_text: As an additional cost to jack out during a run on this server, the Runner must trash 1 installed program. Limit 1 region per server.
cn_text: 当对本服务器潜袭时潜袭者不能退出，除非他/她销毁一个已安装的程序。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to jack out during a run on this server, the Runner must trash 1 installed program. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text: When you score this agenda, you may draw 1 card.
cn_text: 当你将本议案计分时，你可以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may draw 1 card.

en_text: When you score Posted Bounty, you may forfeit it to give the Runner 1 tag and take 1 bad publicity.
cn_text: 当你用悬赏通告计分时，你可以废除它，以给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When you score Posted Bounty, you may forfeit it to give the Runner 1 tag and take 1 bad publicity.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Trace[2]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware with an install cost of X or less, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
cn_text:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
<trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，销毁一个硬件，该硬件的安装费用等于或小于你追踪强度超过潜袭者中转强度的差值。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Trace[2]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware with an install cost of X or less, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.

en_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click]. Gain 2[credit]. Gain an additional 1[credit] for each double event in your heap.
cn_text: 作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。 获得2[credit]。你的堆阵中每有一个双重事件，额外获得1[credit] 。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Gain 2 credits. Gain an additional 1 credit for each double event in your heap.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner made a run during their last turn.
Trash any number of cards from the top of R&D. The Runner trashes an installed program or piece of hardware with an install cost equal to or less than the number of cards you trashed this way.
cn_text:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合进行过潜袭，才能打出。
销毁研发中心顶端的X张卡牌。潜袭者销毁一个已安装的并且安装费用等于或小于X的程序或硬件。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a run during their last turn. Trash any number of cards from the top of R&D. The Runner trashes an installed program or piece of hardware with an install cost equal to or less than the number of cards you trashed this way.

en_text: Gain 1[credit] whenever a trace is initiated.
cn_text: 每当一次追踪发起时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit whenever a trace is initiated.

en_text:
Play only as your first [click].
The first time you access an agenda this turn, gain 7[credit].
cn_text:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
本回合你第一次窃取一个议案时，获得7[credit]。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. The first time you access an agenda this turn, gain 7 credits.

en_text: [interrupt] → Whenever you would do 1 or more net damage, you may prevent 1 net damage. If you do, place 1 power counter on this asset and gain 3[credit]. [click][click], [trash]: Do 1 net damage for each hosted power counter.
cn_text: [interrupt] → 每当你将要造成1点或更多网域伤害时，你可以防止1点网域伤害。如果你如此做，放置1枚能量指示物到本资产上并获得3[credit]。 [click][click]，[trash]: 每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Whenever you would do 1 or more net damage, you may prevent 1 net damage. If you do, place 1 power counter on this asset and gain 3 credits. click click, trash: Do 1 net damage for each hosted power counter.

cn_title: 真理咨询: 政治解决方案
en_text: The first time each turn the Runner makes a successful run, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
cn_text: 每回合潜袭者第一次进行成功的潜袭时，你可以放置1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner makes a successful run, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.

en_text: Look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
cn_text: 查看研发中心顶端的五张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列它们。
stripped_text: Look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.

en_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2[credit].
cn_text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 作为窃取一个议案的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付2[credit]。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2 credits.

en_text:
Resolve 1 of the following. If the Runner is tagged, you may resolve both instead.
  • Gain 3[credit].
  • Draw 3 cards.
cn_text:
结算下列中的1项。如果潜袭者被锁定，你可以改为两项都结算。
  • 获得3[credit]。
  • 抽3张卡牌。
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following. If the Runner is tagged, you may resolve both instead. * Gain 3 credits. * Draw 3 cards.

en_text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Shuffle 3 cards from Archives into R&D. Remove Preemptive Action from the game instead of trashing it.
cn_text:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
将三张卡牌从档案库洗入研发中心。将抢先行动移出游戏，代替销毁它。
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Shuffle 3 cards from Archives into R&D. Remove Preemptive Action from the game instead of trashing it.

en_text: 1[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.
cn_text: 1[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至1个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以打出事件。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength. Threat 4 → 2[credit]: +9 strength. Use this ability only once per run. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)
cn_text: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条屏障子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+3。 威胁4 → 2[credit]: 强度+9。本能力每次潜袭仅限使用一次。（本能力在任一玩家有4点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength. Threat 4 -> 2 credits: +9 strength. Use this ability only once per run. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)

en_text: Whenever you breach R&D, if you are allowed to access 2 or more cards in R&D during this breach, you may access 1 additional card.
cn_text: 每当你侵入研发中心时，如果本次侵入中你被允许读取研发中心中的2张或更多卡牌，你可以额外读取1张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you breach R&D, if you are allowed to access 2 or more cards in R&D during this breach, you may access 1 additional card.

en_text: Make a run. Once during this run, when you pass a piece of ice, you may trash a number of your installed cards equal to the strength of that ice. If you do, trash that ice.
cn_text: 进行一次潜袭。本次潜袭中一次，当你通过一层防火墙时，你可以销毁数张你已安装的卡牌，其数量等于该防火墙的强度。如果你如此做，销毁该防火墙。
stripped_text: Make a run. Once during this run, when you pass a piece of ice, you may trash a number of your installed cards equal to the strength of that ice. If you do, trash that ice.

en_text:
3[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during traces.
cn_text:
3[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于追踪。
stripped_text: 3 recurring credits Use these credits during traces.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Install a piece of ice from HQ protecting a remote server (ignoring all costs). Place 3 advancement tokens on that ice.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install a piece of ice from HQ protecting a remote server (ignoring all costs). Place 3 advancement tokens on that ice.

en_text: When you score Priority Requisition, you may rez a piece of ice ignoring all costs.
stripped_text: When you score Priority Requisition, you may rez a piece of ice ignoring all costs.

en_text: If the Runner accesses Prisec while installed, you may pay 2[credit] to give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 meat damage.
cn_text: 如果潜袭者读取已安装的私卫，你可以支付2[credit]，以给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成1点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: If the Runner accesses Prisec while installed, you may pay 2 credits to give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 meat damage.

en_text:
Place 14[credit] from the bank on Private Contracts when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Private Contracts, trash it.
[click]: Take 2[credit] from Private Contracts.
cn_text:
当私人合约被激活时，从银行中放置14[credit]到本卡牌上。当私人合约上没有信用点时，销毁本卡牌。
[click]: 从私人合约上拿取2[credit]。
stripped_text: Place 14 credits from the bank on Private Contracts when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Private Contracts, trash it. click: Take 2 credits from Private Contracts.

en_text: If the Runner is tagged, Private Security Force gains: "[click]: Do 1 meat damage."
stripped_text: If the Runner is tagged, Private Security Force gains: "click: Do 1 meat damage."

en_text:
Play only if you are not tagged.
Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, take 1 tag.
When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 resource from your heap, paying 2[credit] less.
Threat 3 → When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 program from your heap.
cn_text:
只有你未被锁定时，才能打出。
潜袭档案库。如果成功，拿取1枚锁定标记，代替侵入档案库。
当你通过本事件拿取一枚锁定标记时，你可以从你的堆阵安装1个资源，其安装费用减2[credit]。
威胁3 → 当你通过本事件拿取一枚锁定标记时，你可以从你的堆阵安装1个程序。

When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 resource from your heap, paying 2 credits less. Threat 3 -> When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 program from your heap.

en_text: Gain 2[credit] and draw 1 card.
stripped_text: Gain 2 credits and draw 1 card.

en_text:
While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade anywhere except in Archives, gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this upgrade anywhere except in Archives, gain 2 credits.

en_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [haas-bioroid] cards in your deck. Trash a rezzed asset or upgrade. If you do, gain credits equal to its trash cost.
cn_text: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[haas-bioroid]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 销毁一个已激活的资产或升级。如果你如此做，获得与其销毁费用相等的信用点。
stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliancehaas-bioroid cards in your deck. Trash a rezzed asset or upgrade. If you do, gain credits equal to its trash cost.

en_text: [click]: Gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
cn_text: [click]: 获得1[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: click: Gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.

en_text: When you score Profiteering, take up to 3 bad publicity. Gain 5[credit] for each bad publicity taken.
cn_text: 当你用暴利计分时，拿取最多3枚负面声誉标记。每拿取1枚负面声誉标记，获得5[credit]。
stripped_text: When you score Profiteering, take up to 3 bad publicity. Gain 5 credits for each bad publicity taken.

en_text: You can install virus programs onto this program. Limit 1 hosted program. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit. [interrupt] → Whenever virus counters would be purged, prevent 1 virus counter on the hosted program from being removed.
cn_text: 你可以附载一个病毒程序到元祖上。 所附载的程序的内存费用不计算在你的内存上限中。 每当病毒指示物被清除时，除所附载卡牌上的1枚病毒指示物，移除所有病毒指示物。
stripped_text: You can install virus programs onto this program. Limit 1 hosted program. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit. Interrupt -> Whenever virus counters would be purged, prevent 1 virus counter on the hosted program from being removed.

en_text: The first time each turn a run begins, you may look at the top 2 cards of your stack. 1[credit]: Reveal the top card of your stack. If that card is a program or piece of hardware, you may install it. Use this ability only once per turn.
cn_text: 每回合第一次潜袭开始时，你可以查看你的存储栈顶端的2张卡牌。 1[credit]: 展示你的存储栈顶端的卡牌。如果该卡牌是一个程序或硬件，你可以安装之。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run begins, you may look at the top 2 cards of your stack. 1 credit: Reveal the top card of your stack. If that card is a program or piece of hardware, you may install it. Use this ability only once per turn.

en_text: When you score this agenda, the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards for each hosted advancement counter past 4. If the Runner trashes at least 1 card this way, take 1 bad publicity.
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards for each hosted advancement counter past 4. If the Runner trashes at least 1 card this way, take 1 bad publicity.

en_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. Add it to HQ.
cn_text: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物: 在研发中心搜寻1张卡牌并展示之。将其加入总部。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. Add it to HQ.

en_text:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3.
This agenda is worth 1 more agenda point for each hosted agenda counter.
cn_text:
当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过2枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。
每有1枚所附载的议案指示物，本议案的价值增加1点议案分数。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3. This agenda is worth 1 more agenda point for each hosted agenda counter.

en_text:
Project Junebug can be advanced.
If you pay 1[credit] when the Runner accesses Project Junebug, do 2 net damage for each advancement token on Project Junebug.

cn_text: 在研发中心搜寻最多X个不同的管理员（根据名称），将它们展示，并加入总部。将研发中心重洗。

en_text: Persistent → As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must pay 5[credit]. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
stripped_text: Persistent -> As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must pay 5 credits. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)

en_text:
Resolve 2 of the following in any order:
  • Draw 2 cards.
  • Gain 2[credit].
  • Install 1 non-agenda card from HQ.
  • Gain [click].
cn_text:
按任意顺序结算下列中的2项:
  • 抽2张卡牌。
  • 获得2[credit]。
  • 从总部安装1张非议案卡牌。
  • 获得[click]。
stripped_text: Resolve 2 of the following in any order: * Draw 2 cards. * Gain 2 credits. * Install 1 non-agenda card from HQ. * Gain click.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click], [click].
Move all advancement tokens from all installed cards to 1 card that can be advanced.
cn_text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click], [click]。
从所有已安装的卡牌上转移所有的推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click, click. Move all advancement tokens from all installed cards to 1 card that can be advanced.

en_text: [subroutine] All ice has +3 strength for the remainder of this run.
cn_text: [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内所有防火墙的强度+3。
stripped_text: Subroutine All ice has +3 strength for the remainder of this run.

en_text: When you install this resource, load 12[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Run a central server you have not run this turn. If successful, take 3[credit] from this resource.
cn_text: 当你安装本资源时，填装12[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]: 潜袭一台你本回合未潜袭过的中央服务器。如果成功，从本资源上拿取3[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 12 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Run a central server you have not run this turn. If successful, take 3 credits from this resource.

en_text:
When you rez this upgrade, you may pay up to 4[credit] to place that many power counters on it.
As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must pay 2[credit] for each hosted power counter.
Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on a central server, remove 1 hosted power counter.
cn_text:
当你激活本升级时，你可以支付最多4[credit]，以放置等量的能量指示物到本升级上。
作为潜袭本服务器的额外费用，每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，潜袭者必须支付2[credit]。
每当潜袭者对中央服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，移除1枚所附载的能量指示物。
stripped_text: When you rez this upgrade, you may pay up to 4 credits to place that many power counters on it. As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must pay 2 credits for each hosted power counter. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on a central server, remove 1 hosted power counter.

en_text: When you score this agenda, you may add X cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D to draw X cards. The Runner adds X cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack, if able.
cn_text: 当你用再教育计分时，将任意数量的卡牌从总部加入研发中心底端，并补与其数量相等的卡牌。如可能，潜袭者随机将相等数量的卡牌从他/她的操控器加入存储栈底端。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may add X cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D to draw X cards. The Runner adds X cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack, if able.

en_text: +1[mu] +1[link] Whenever you jack out, the Corp reveals 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +1[mu], +1[link] 每当你退出时，公司从总部随机展示一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu +1 link Whenever you jack out, the Corp reveals 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +3 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
cn_text: 1[credit]: 破解门禁子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+3。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +3 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.

en_text: When your turn begins, gain 2[credit].
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 2 credits.

en_text: When you score this agenda, if no Corp cards have been added to Archives this turn, you may reveal 1 facedown agenda in Archives and add it to your score area.
cn_text: 当你将本议案计分时，如果本回合没有公司卡牌被加入档案库，你可以展示档案库中1个牌面朝下的议案，并将其加入你的分数区。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, if no Corp cards have been added to Archives this turn, you may reveal 1 facedown agenda in Archives and add it to your score area.

en_text: When you rez this asset, load 15[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Take 3[credit] from this asset.
cn_text: 当你激活本资产时，填装15[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]: 从本资产上拿取3[credit]。
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 15 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 3 credits from this asset.

en_text: For each bad publicity you have up to 4, this agenda gets -1 advancement requirement.
cn_text: 你每有1枚负面声誉标记，本议案的推进需求-1（最多-4）。
stripped_text: For each bad publicity you have up to 4, this agenda gets -1 advancement requirement.

cn_title: 雷娜·罗娅: 自由战士
en_text: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1[credit] more to rez.
cn_text: 每回合公司激活的第一层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1 credit more to rez.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, add 1 installed program or piece of hardware to your grip.
Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying X[credit] less. X is equal to the printed install cost of the card you added to your grip.
cn_text:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，将1个已安装的程序或硬件加入你的操控器。
从你的操控器安装1个程序或硬件，其安装费用减X[credit]。X等于你加入操控器的卡牌的印刷安装费用。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, add 1 installed program or piece of hardware to your grip. Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying X credits less. X is equal to the printed install cost of the card you added to your grip.

en_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
cn_text: 当你将本议案计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物: 放置1枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.

en_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
cn_text: 你的手牌上限+2。
stripped_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.

en_text: When you score Remote Enforcement, you may search R&D for a piece of ice, install it protecting a remote server (paying its install cost), and rez it, ignoring its rez cost, then shuffle R&D.
stripped_text: When you score Remote Enforcement, you may search R&D for a piece of ice, install it protecting a remote server (paying its install cost), and rez it, ignoring its rez cost, then shuffle R&D.

cn_title: 勒内·“野狼”·阿斯蒙特: 派对野兽
en_text: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
cn_text: 每回合你第一次销毁一张你正在读取的卡牌时，获得1[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Add one of your installed cards to HQ. Install 2 cards from HQ, ignoring all costs.
cn_text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
将一张你已安装的卡牌加入总部。从总部安装两张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Add one of your installed cards to HQ. Install 2 cards from HQ, ignoring all costs.

en_text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware (including Replicator), you may search your stack for another copy of that hardware, reveal it, and add it your grip. Shuffle your stack.
cn_text: 每当你安装一个硬件（包括复制器）时，你可以在你的存储栈搜寻另一个相同的硬件，将其展示，并加入你的操控器。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware (including Replicator), you may search your stack for another copy of that hardware, reveal it, and add it your grip. Shuffle your stack.

en_text:
Play only if you stole an agenda this turn.
Add 1 installed Corp card to HQ. You may run any server.
cn_text:
只有你本回合已窃取过议案时，才能打出。
将1张已安装的公司卡牌加入总部。你可以潜袭任意一台服务器。
stripped_text: Play only if you stole an agenda this turn. Add 1 installed Corp card to HQ. You may run any server.

en_text: When you score Research Grant, you may score another copy of Research Grant that is installed.
cn_text: 当你用科研经费计分时，你可以用另一张已安装的科研经费计分。
stripped_text: When you score Research Grant, you may score another copy of Research Grant that is installed.

en_text:
Install only in the root of HQ.
Your maximum hand size is +2.
cn_text:
仅能安装在总部的根目录。
你的手牌上限+2。
stripped_text: Install only in the root of HQ. Your maximum hand size is +2.

en_text: Swap 2 pieces of unrezzed ice.
stripped_text: Swap 2 pieces of unrezzed ice.

en_text:
Resistor has +1 strength for each tag the Runner has.
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, end the run.
cn_text:
潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，电阻器的强度+1。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Resistor has +1 strength for each tag the Runner has. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, end the run.

en_text:
When you install this hardware, suffer 1 meat damage.
The first time each turn you have no cards in your grip, draw 1 card and place 1 power counter on this hardware.
When this hardware has 3 or more hosted power counters, trash it.
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, suffer 1 meat damage. The first time each turn you have no cards in your grip, draw 1 card and place 1 power counter on this hardware. When this hardware has 3 or more hosted power counters, trash it.

en_text: Install and rez 1 card from Archives (paying all costs). Remove all other copies of that card in Archives from the game.
stripped_text: Install and rez 1 card from Archives (paying all costs). Remove all other copies of that card in Archives from the game.

en_text: Trash one of your installed sysops, executives, or clones. If you do, remove up to 2 bad publicity.
cn_text: 销毁一个你已安装的管理员，主管或克隆体。如果你如此做，移除最多2枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: Trash one of your installed sysops, executives, or clones. If you do, remove up to 2 bad publicity.

en_text: Gain 15[credit].
cn_text: 获得15[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 15 credits.

en_text: [click]: Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
cn_text: [click]: <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: click: Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash 1 installed program or piece of hardware.
cn_text:
只有潜袭者被锁定时，才能打出。
销毁1个已安装的程序或硬件。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Trash 1 installed program or piece of hardware.

en_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.
cn_text: 潜袭档案库。如果成功，你可以从你的堆阵安装1个程序，忽略所有的费用，代替侵入档案库。
stripped_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Trash any number of cards from HQ. Gain 2[credit] for each card trashed.
cn_text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
从总部销毁任意数量的卡牌。每销毁一张卡牌，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Trash any number of cards from HQ. Gain 2 credits for each card trashed.

en_text:
Choose one:
  • Purge virus counters. Trash 1 card from the top of the stack for every 3 virus counters removed.
  • Gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: Choose one: * Purge virus counters. Trash 1 card from the top of the stack for every 3 virus counters removed. * Gain 2 credits.

en_text: You can advance this asset. [click], [trash]: The Runner loses 4[credit] for each hosted advancement counter.
cn_text: 你可以推进本资产。 [click]，[trash]: 每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，潜袭者失去4[credit]。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. click, trash: The Runner loses 4 credits for each hosted advancement counter.

en_text: When you install this program, place 6 power counters on it. Interface → [trash] or hosted power counter: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
cn_text: 当你安装本程序时，放置6枚能量指示物到本程序上。 对接 → [trash]或所附载的能量指示物: 破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+3。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 6 power counters on it. Interface -> trash or hosted power counter: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.

en_text: Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.
cn_text: 将一张卡牌从总部洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.

en_text:
Place 3 power counters on Rex Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Rex Campaign, trash it and either remove 1 bad publicity or gain 5[credit].
When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Rex Campaign.
cn_text:
当雷克斯营销计划被激活时，放置3枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。当雷克斯营销计划上没有能量指示物时，销毁本卡牌，并移除1枚负面声誉标记或获得5[credit]。
当你的回合开始时，从雷克斯营销计划上移除1枚能量指示物。
stripped_text: Place 3 power counters on Rex Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Rex Campaign, trash it and either remove 1 bad publicity or gain 5 credits. When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Rex Campaign.

en_text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit.

cn_title: 芮尔·“姬特”·佩德拉: 超凡入圣
en_text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.
cn_text: 每回合你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，该防火墙在本次潜袭的剩余时间内获得门禁。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.

en_text: Secretly spend up to 2[credit]. The Corp guesses how much you spent. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, choose a piece of ice protecting a server and run that server. The first time during this run you encounter the chosen ice, bypass it.
cn_text: 秘密花费最多2[credit]。公司猜测你花费的数量。展示所花费的信用点。如果公司猜测错误，进行一次潜袭并选择一层保护被攻击服务器的防火墙。当你遭遇该防火墙时，略过它。
stripped_text: Secretly spend up to 2 credits. The Corp guesses how much you spent. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, choose a piece of ice protecting a server and run that server. The first time during this run you encounter the chosen ice, bypass it.

en_text: Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying 3[credit] less. You may charge that card if able. (If it has a power counter on it, add another.)
cn_text: 从你的操控器安装1个程序或硬件，其安装费用减3[credit]。如可能，你可以对该卡牌充能。（如果其上已经有能量指示物，再放置1枚。）
stripped_text: Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying 3 credits less. You may charge that card if able. (If it has a power counter on it, add another.)

en_text:
During runs against this server, you can rez this ice any time you could rez non-ice cards.
Each piece of ice protecting this server gets +1 strength.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 1[credit].
cn_text:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，你可以在任意你可以激活非防火墙卡牌的时机激活本防火墙。
所有保护本服务器的防火墙的强度+1。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去1[credit]。
stripped_text: During runs against this server, you can rez this ice any time you could rez non-ice cards. Each piece of ice protecting this server gets +1 strength. Subroutine The Runner loses 1 credit.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during their last turn.
The Runner may suffer 1 core damage. If they do not, they get -3 allotted [click] for their next turn.
Remove this operation from the game.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during their last turn. The Runner may suffer 1 core damage. If they do not, they get -3 allotted click for their next turn. Remove this operation from the game.

en_text: Run HQ. If successful, when you determine the number of cards in HQ you are allowed to access during this run's breach of HQ, you may add that many cards from your heap to your grip. If you do, you cannot access any cards in HQ during this breach. (You can still access cards in the root of HQ.) When the run ends, remove this event from the game.
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, when you determine the number of cards in HQ you are allowed to access during this run's breach of HQ, you may add that many cards from your heap to your grip. If you do, you cannot access any cards in HQ during this breach. (You can still access cards in the root of HQ.) When the run ends, remove this event from the game.

en_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ or R&D each turn, you may name a number. If you do, reveal the next card that you access this run. If it has a rez cost, play cost, or advancement requirement equal to the named number, either gain 3[credit] or draw 2 cards.
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ or R&D each turn, you may name a number. If you do, reveal the next card that you access this run. If it has a rez cost, play cost, or advancement requirement equal to the named number, either gain 3 credits or draw 2 cards.

en_text:
Place 18[credit] from the bank on Rogue Trading when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Rogue Trading, trash it.
[click], [click]: Take 6[credit] from Rogue Trading and take 1 tag.
stripped_text: Place 18 credits from the bank on Rogue Trading when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Rogue Trading, trash it. click, click: Take 6 credits from Rogue Trading and take 1 tag.

en_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The play cost of each operation and event is increased by 1. The first time the Runner plays an event each turn, gain 1[credit].
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The play cost of each operation and event is increased by 1. The first time the Runner plays an event each turn, gain 1 credit.

en_text:
When you install Rolodex, look at the top 5 cards of your stack and arrange them in any order.
When Rolodex is trashed, trash the top 3 cards of your stack.
cn_text:
当你安装名片夹时，查看你存储栈顶端的五张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列它们。
当名片夹被销毁时，销毁你存储栈顶端的三张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install Rolodex, look at the top 5 cards of your stack and arrange them in any order. When Rolodex is trashed, trash the top 3 cards of your stack.

en_text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including this asset), they lose [click].
cn_text: 每当潜袭者销毁一张公司卡牌（包括罗纳德·伍）时，他/她失去[click]。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including this asset), they lose click.

en_text: You can advance this asset. [click], [trash]: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.
cn_text: 你可以推进本资产。 [click]，[trash]: 造成3点网域伤害。只有所附载的推进指示物有4枚或更多时，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. click, trash: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.

en_text: While this program is hosted on ice, the rez cost of each piece of ice protecting this server is increased by 2. [click]: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caïssa program. If this program is hosted on ice, its [click] ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting the same server or in the same position as its current host ice. (Count positions from the innermost ice.)
cn_text: [click]: 将车附载到一层未被西洋棋附载的防火墙上。如果车已附载，则仅能再附载到保护本服务器的另一层防火墙上，或保护其它服务器相同位置（从最内层位置计算）的防火墙上。 保护本服务器的每层防火墙的激活费用+2。
stripped_text: While this program is hosted on ice, the rez cost of each piece of ice protecting this server is increased by 2. click: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caissa program. If this program is hosted on ice, its click ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting the same server or in the same position as its current host ice. (Count positions from the innermost ice.)

en_text: [click], remove an installed program from the game: Search your stack for a non-virus program, shuffle your stack, then install that program, lowering the install cost by the cost of the program removed from the game.
stripped_text: click, remove an installed program from the game: Search your stack for a non-virus program, shuffle your stack, then install that program, lowering the install cost by the cost of the program removed from the game.

en_text:
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: [click][click][click]: Gain 6[credit]. You may remove 1 bad publicity.
cn_text: [click][click][click]: 获得6[credit]。你可以移除1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: click click click: Gain 6 credits. You may remove 1 bad publicity.

en_text: Install Rover Algorithm on a rezzed piece of ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host ice has +1 strength for each power counter on Rover Algorithm. Whenever the Runner passes host ice, place 1 power counter on Rover Algorithm."
stripped_text: Install Rover Algorithm on a rezzed piece of ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host ice has +1 strength for each power counter on Rover Algorithm. Whenever the Runner passes host ice, place 1 power counter on Rover Algorithm."

en_text: [subroutine] The Runner cannot spend any credits for the remainder of this run.
cn_text: [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，潜袭者不能花费任何信用点。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot spend any credits for the remainder of this run.

en_text: [click], X[credit]: Derez 1 piece of ice with printed rez cost X[credit] that was rezzed this turn. Use this ability only once per turn.

en_text: As an additional cost to make a run on this server, the Runner must spend [click]. Limit 1 region per server.

stripped_text: As an additional cost to make a run on this server, the Runner must spend click. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Each unique (♦) non-region asset and upgrade loses its printed abilities.

en_text: Make a run. When the run ends, trash 1 piece of ice that was rezzed during this run.
stripped_text: Make a run. When the run ends, trash 1 piece of ice that was rezzed during this run.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, suffer 1 core damage.
Gain [click][click][click].

作为打出本事件的额外费用，受到1点核心伤害。
获得[click][click][click]。

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Make a run. During this run, the Corp must pay X[credit] as an additional cost to rez each piece of ice, where X is the rez cost of that ice.
cn_text:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。
进行一次潜袭。在本次潜袭中，公司必须支付X[credit]作为额外的费用，以激活每层防火墙，X等于该防火墙的激活费用。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Make a run. During this run, the Corp must pay X credits as an additional cost to rez each piece of ice, where X is the rez cost of that ice.

en_text: The base trace strength of each trace during a run on this server is increased by 2. Limit 1 region per server.
cn_text: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，每次追踪的基础追踪强度+2。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: The base trace strength of each trace during a run on this server is increased by 2. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text: [trash]: Do 1 core damage. Use this ability only during a run against this server and only if the Runner has no unspent [click].
cn_text: [trash]: 造成1点脑部伤害。仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中，并且潜袭者没有未花费的时点时使用本能力。
stripped_text: trash: Do 1 core damage. Use this ability only during a run against this server and only if the Runner has no unspent click.

en_text: Run a central server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it. Threat 4 → The second time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, you may spend [click] to bypass it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)
cn_text: 潜袭一台中央服务器。本次潜袭中你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，略过该防火墙。 威胁4 → 本次潜袭中你第二次遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以花费[click]，以略过该防火墙。（本能力在任一玩家有4点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Run a central server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it. Threat 4 -> The second time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, you may spend click to bypass it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)

en_text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Whenever host ice is rezzed or derezzed, gain 3[credit].
cn_text: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。每当被附载的防火墙被激活或关闭时，获得3[credit]。

As an additional cost to play this operation, forfeit an agenda.
Remove 1 bad publicity per agenda point that the forfeited agenda was worth. Gain 1[credit] for each bad publicity removed.

en_text: [trash]: Prevent all damage. Trash all installed hardware, all installed non-virtual resources, and all cards in your grip. Lose all credits in your credit pool. Remove all tags.
cn_text: [trash]: 防止所有的伤害。销毁所有已安装的硬件，所有已安装的非虚拟资源和你操控器中的所有卡牌。失去你信用池中所有的信用点。移除所有的锁定标记。

en_text:

[subroutine] You may trash 1 card in HQ. If you do, trash 1 resource. Trash Sadaka.

cn_text: 1[credit]: 破解具有三种或更多子类型的一层防火墙上的子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。 2[credit]: 将瞬生与你操控器中的一个提婆程序互换。

Your maximum hand size is reduced by 2.
When your turn ends, draw 1 card if you do not have cards in your grip equal to or greater than your maximum hand size.

你的手牌上限减2。
当你的回合结束时，如果你操控器中的卡牌数量没有等于或大于你的手牌上限，补一张卡牌。

2[recurring-credit]

en_text: Whenever you take 1 or more tags, if you had no tags, you may install 1 connection resource from your grip, paying 2[credit] less. As an additional cost to trash a connection resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ.
