cn_text: +1[mu], +1[link] 每回合一次，当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以迫使公司“追踪 5 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并终止本次潜袭。如果失败，潜袭者略过当前遭遇的防火墙。” 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu +1 link Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may force the Corp to "Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run. If unsuccessful, the Runner bypasses the currently encountered ice." Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: [click], trash a rezzed piece of ice: Gain 4[credit].
cn_text: [click], 销毁一层已激活的防火墙: 获得4[credit]。
stripped_text: click, trash a rezzed piece of ice: Gain 4 credits.

en_text:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server.
The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, gain 2[credit].
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，你可以选择一台服务器。本回合你第一次对所选择的服务器进行成功的潜袭时，获得2[credit]，代替侵入该服务器。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, gain 2 credits.

en_text: When you score this agenda, give the Runner 1 tag. Play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, do 1 core damage. If the bids match, do 1 net damage.
cn_text: 当你将本议案计分时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果二者数值不同，造成1点核心伤害。如果二者数值相同，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, give the Runner 1 tag. Play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2 credits. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, do 1 core damage. If the bids match, do 1 net damage.

en_text:
Seidr Adaptive Barrier has +1 strength for each piece of ice protecting this server.
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
每有一层保护本服务器的防火墙，西德尔适应型屏障的强度+1。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Seidr Adaptive Barrier has +1 strength for each piece of ice protecting this server. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: The first time each turn the Runner loses or spends [click] during a run, you may add 1 card from Archives to the top of R&D.
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner loses or spends click during a run, you may add 1 card from Archives to the top of R&D.

en_text:
The strength of Self-Adapting Code Wall cannot be lowered.
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
自适应代码墙的强度不能被降低。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: The strength of Self-Adapting Code Wall cannot be lowered. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: Remote server only. [trash]: Trash all cards installed in the root of or protecting this server. Trace[X], where X is equal to the number of cards trashed. If successful, do 3 net damage. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
cn_text:
仅能安装在远程服务器。
[trash]: 销毁本服务器内或保护本服务器的所有卡牌，并<trace>追踪 X</trace> 如果成功，造成3点网域伤害。X等于销毁卡牌的数量。仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用本能力。
stripped_text: Remote server only. trash: Trash all cards installed in the root of or protecting this server. Trace[X], where X is equal to the number of cards trashed. If successful, do 3 net damage. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

en_text: The Runner's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.
cn_text: 潜袭者的手牌上限减1。
stripped_text: The Runner's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Add 2 installed Runner cards to the grip.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Add 2 installed Runner cards to the grip.

en_text: 2[credit], [trash]: Search your stack for 1 program. Install it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.)
cn_text: 2[credit]，[trash]: 在你的存储栈中搜寻1个程序。安装之。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）
stripped_text: 2 credits, trash: Search your stack for 1 program. Install it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.)

en_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, you may rez 1 installed piece of ice, ignoring all costs.
cn_text: 当本议案被计分或窃取时，你可以激活1层已安装的防火墙，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, you may rez 1 installed piece of ice, ignoring all costs.

en_text: [subroutine] For the remainder of this run, each piece of ice encountered except Sensei gains "[subroutine] End the run" after all its other subroutines.
cn_text: [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，除师范外遭遇的每层防火墙，在其它所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Subroutine For the remainder of this run, each piece of ice encountered except Sensei gains "Subroutine End the run" after all its other subroutines.

en_text: When your turn begins, you may draw 3 cards if there is no ice protecting this server. If you do, add 1 card from HQ to the bottom of R&D.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，你可以补三张卡牌。如果你如此做，将一张卡牌从总部加入研发中心底端。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may draw 3 cards if there is no ice protecting this server. If you do, add 1 card from HQ to the bottom of R&D.

en_text: Place 1 agenda counter on Sensor Net Activation when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Rez a bioroid, ignoring all costs. When the turn ends, derez that bioroid.
cn_text: 当你用传感网激活计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的议案指示物: 激活一个生化人，忽略所有的费用。当本回合结束时，关闭该生化人。
stripped_text: Place 1 agenda counter on Sensor Net Activation when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Rez a bioroid, ignoring all costs. When the turn ends, derez that bioroid.

en_text: Whenever the Runner suffers at least 1 core damage, do 1 net damage.
cn_text: 每当潜袭者受到至少1点脑部伤害时，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner suffers at least 1 core damage, do 1 net damage.

en_text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they lose 3[credit] unless they suffer 2 net damage or take 1 tag.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 3[credit].
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
cn_text:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，其失去3[credit]，除非其受到2点网域伤害或拿取1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去3[credit]。
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they lose 3 credits unless they suffer 2 net damage or take 1 tag. Subroutine The Runner loses 3 credits. Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag.

en_text:
Gain 2[credit] when your turn begins.
Trash Server Diagnostics when you install a piece of ice.
cn_text:
当你的回合开始时，获得2[credit]。
当你安装一层防火墙时，销毁服务器诊断学。
stripped_text: Gain 2 credits when your turn begins. Trash Server Diagnostics when you install a piece of ice.

en_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to run for the first time during their turn, the Runner must spend 1[credit].
cn_text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 作为在他/她的回合第一次进行潜袭（即使通过卡牌能力）的额外费用，潜袭者必须花费1[credit]。
stripped_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to run for the first time during their turn, the Runner must spend 1 credit.

en_text: [click]: Trash 2 or more cards from your grip. Run HQ or R&D. Whenever you breach that server during this run, access 1 additional card for every 2 cards you trashed.
stripped_text: click: Trash 2 or more cards from your grip. Run HQ or R&D. Whenever you breach that server during this run, access 1 additional card for every 2 cards you trashed.

en_text:
Shadow can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_text: Shadow can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it. Subroutine The Corp gains 2 credits. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

en_text:
Whenever you draw a Shadow Team, immediately install it.
Whenever you initiate a run, trash a card from your grip, if able. When you make a successful run on a central server, destroy Shadow Team.
stripped_text: Whenever you draw a Shadow Team, immediately install it. Whenever you initiate a run, trash a card from your grip, if able. When you make a successful run on a central server, destroy Shadow Team.

en_text:
[click]: Draw 1 card from the bottom of R&D.
[trash]: Search R&D or Archives for an agenda and reveal it. Shuffle the rest of R&D if you searched it. Add the agenda to the bottom of R&D.
cn_text:
[click]: 从研发中心底端补一张卡牌。
[trash]: 在研发中心或档案库搜寻一个议案并将其展示。如果你搜寻了研发中心，将其余下的卡牌重洗。将该议案加入研发中心底端。
stripped_text: click: Draw 1 card from the bottom of R&D. trash: Search R&D or Archives for an agenda and reveal it. Shuffle the rest of R&D if you searched it. Add the agenda to the bottom of R&D.

en_text: Interface → [trash]: Break any number of destroyer subroutines. 1[credit]: +2 strength.
cn_text: [trash]: 破解任意数量的毁灭者子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+2。
stripped_text: Interface -> trash: Break any number of destroyer subroutines. 1 credit: +2 strength.

en_text:
Shattered Remains can be advanced.
If you pay 1[credit] when the Runner accesses Shattered Remains, trash 1 piece of hardware for each advancement token on Shattered Remains.
cn_text:
破碎残骸能被推进。
当潜袭者读取破碎残骸时，如果你支付1[credit]，破碎残骸上每有1枚推进标记，销毁一个硬件。
stripped_text: Shattered Remains can be advanced. If you pay 1 credit when the Runner accesses Shattered Remains, trash 1 piece of hardware for each advancement token on Shattered Remains.

en_text:
You cannot use Shell Corporation more than once per turn.
[click]: Place 3[credit] on Shell Corporation.
[click]: Take all credits from Shell Corporation.
cn_text:
每回合你不能使用空壳公司多于一次。
[click]: 放置3[credit]到空壳公司上。
[click]: 从空壳公司上拿取所有的信用点。
stripped_text: You cannot use Shell Corporation more than once per turn. click: Place 3 credits on Shell Corporation. click: Take all credits from Shell Corporation.

en_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack.

潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解夏洛克1.0上的任一子进程。

潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解夏洛克2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，将一个已安装的程序加入潜袭者的存储栈底端。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，将一个已安装的程序加入潜袭者的存储栈底端。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。

Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag.

en_text: When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in R&D, you may pay X[credit]. The Runner must either suffer X net damage or add this asset to their score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.
cn_text: 当潜袭者读取四.九时，你可以支付X[credit]。潜袭者必须承受X点网域伤害或将四.九加入他/她的分数区，作为一个价值-1点议案分数的议案。如果潜袭者从研发中心读取四.九，则忽略本效果。
stripped_text: When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in R&D, you may pay X credits. The Runner must either suffer X net damage or add this asset to their score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.

en_text: Threat 4 → This program gets −2 strength. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
cn_text: 威胁4 → 本程序的强度-2。（本能力在任一玩家有4点或更多议案分数时生效。） 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+2。
stripped_text: Threat 4 -> This program gets -2 strength. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength.

en_text:
When you rez Shinobi, take 1 bad publicity.
[subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, do 3 net damage and end the run.
cn_text:
当你激活忍法时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 1</trace> 如果成功，造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，造成2点网域伤害。

en_text: Place 1 advancement token on each of up to 2 different installed cards that can be advanced.
stripped_text: Place 1 advancement token on each of up to 2 different installed cards that can be advanced.

en_text: Install up to 3 cards from HQ (one at a time and paying all install costs).
stripped_text: Install up to 3 cards from HQ (one at a time and paying all install costs).

As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Place up to 2 advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.

作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
放置最多2枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Place up to 2 advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner did not make a successful run during their last turn.
Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner did not make a successful run during their last turn. Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card.

cn_title: 符拉迪西比尔斯克的货物
en_text:
Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
Place a total of 4 advancement counters on installed cards you can advance.
cn_text:
只有潜袭者具有至少2枚锁定标记时，才能打出。
放置合计4枚推进指示物到已安装且可被推进的卡牌上。

en_text:
[subroutine] Look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
[subroutine] You may pay 1[credit]. If you do not, the Runner breaches R&D. They cannot access cards in the root of R&D during that breach.
cn_text:
[subroutine] 查看研发中心顶端的三张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列它们。
[subroutine] 潜袭者读取研发中心顶端的一张卡牌，除非公司支付1[credit]。

While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset, do 1 net damage.

如果电击！从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取电击！时，造成1点网域伤害，即使其未被安装。

潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，激活一层防火墙，忽略所有的费用。

2[recurring-credit]

cn_title: 蝎岛防御体系: 说服力
en_text: [interrupt] → Whenever 1 or more Runner cards would be trashed (from any location), set those cards aside instead of adding them to the heap. You can look at those cards. You may remove 1 of them from the game. Then, add all of those cards that are still set aside to the heap. Ignore this ability if you have already removed a card from the game with it this turn.
cn_text: 每当一张潜袭者卡牌被销毁时（从任何区域），你可以迫使潜袭者将其移出游戏，代替加入堆阵。每回合仅能使用一次本能力。

en_text:
When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage.
The trash cost of each Corp card is lowered by 1.

当你安装颅骨接口时，受到1点脑部伤害。
所有卡牌的销毁费用减1。

en_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on host ice. Use this ability only once per encounter.

stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on host ice. Use this ability only once per encounter.

en_text: [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this agenda from HQ: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.
cn_text: [click]，1[credit]，从总部展示并销毁本议案: 放置2枚推进指示物到1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。

en_text: Whenever you pass a rezzed piece of ice, you may trash this resource. If you do, choose 1 piece of ice protecting a central server in the same position as the passed ice. Move to that ice and approach it. You may jack out.
stripped_text: Whenever you pass a rezzed piece of ice, you may trash this resource. If you do, choose 1 piece of ice protecting a central server in the same position as the passed ice. Move to that ice and approach it. You may jack out.

en_text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they put the top card of the stack on the bottom, then you reveal the top 3 cards of the stack.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 3[credit].
[subroutine] If you revealed 2 or more cards that share a type when this encounter began, gain 3[credit].
[subroutine] If you revealed 3 or more cards that share a type when this encounter began, place 3 advancement tokens on an installed card.
cn_text:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，其将存储栈顶端的卡牌加入存储栈底端，然后你展示存储栈顶端的3张卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去3[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果遭遇开始时所展示的卡牌中有2张或更多卡牌具有相同的类型，获得3[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果遭遇开始时所展示的卡牌中有3张或更多卡牌具有相同的类型，放置3枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。

Subroutine If you revealed 3 or more cards that share a type when this encounter began, place 3 advancement tokens on an installed card.

en_text: [click]: Place 3[credit] on this resource. When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from this resource.

en_text:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4[credit]. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.

在潜袭者从研发中心读取本资产的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者从档案库以外其他区域读取本资产时，你可以支付4[credit]。如果你如此做，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成3点网域伤害。

en_text: Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 connection. The Runner can take 1 tag to prevent this.
cn_text: 追踪 3 如果成功，销毁一个人脉。潜袭者能拿取1枚锁定标记以防止本效果。
stripped_text: Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 connection. The Runner can take 1 tag to prevent this.

en_text: Once per run, you may expose an unrezzed piece of ice when you approach it. You may then jack out.

stripped_text: Once per run, you may expose an unrezzed piece of ice when you approach it. You may then jack out.

en_text: When the Runner encounters Snoop, reveal all cards in the Runner's grip. Hosted power counter: Reveal all cards in the Runner's grip. Trash 1 of those cards. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, place 1 power counter on Snoop.

cn_text: [subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，终止本次潜袭。

Play only as your first [click].

en_text:
The first time each turn you spend credits from an installed card, place 1 power counter on this resource.
Whenever you breach HQ or R&D, you may remove up to 2 hosted power counters to access that many additional cards.
cn_text:
每回合你第一次花费已安装的卡牌上的信用点时，放置1枚能量指示物到本资源上。
每当你侵入总部或研发中心时，你可以移除最多2枚所附载的能量指示物，以额外读取等量的卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you spend credits from an installed card, place 1 power counter on this resource. Whenever you breach HQ or R&D, you may remove up to 2 hosted power counters to access that many additional cards.

en_text: Whenever the Runner passes a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server, you may reveal and trash another copy of that ice from HQ to force the Runner to encounter the piece of ice just passed again.
cn_text: 每当潜袭者通过一层已激活的保护本服务器的防火墙时，你可以从总部展示并销毁另一张与其相同的防火墙，以迫使潜袭者再次遭遇刚通过的防火墙。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner passes a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server, you may reveal and trash another copy of that ice from HQ to force the Runner to encounter the piece of ice just passed again.

en_text: Use this hardware only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn. [trash]: Choose hardware, program, or resource. Set aside cards from the top of your stack faceup until you set aside 2 cards of the chosen type. You may install 1 of those 2 cards, ignoring all costs. Shuffle the rest of the set-aside cards into your stack.
cn_text: 只有你本回合对总部、研发中心与档案库均进行过成功的潜袭时，才能使用本硬件。 [trash]: 选择硬件、程序或资源。将你的存储栈顶端的卡牌置于一旁，重复此操作直到你将2张所选类型的卡牌置于一旁。你可以安装这2张卡牌中的1张，忽略所有的费用。将置于一旁的其余卡牌洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: Use this hardware only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn. trash: Choose hardware, program, or resource. Set aside cards from the top of your stack faceup until you set aside 2 cards of the chosen type. You may install 1 of those 2 cards, ignoring all costs. Shuffle the rest of the set-aside cards into your stack.
attribution: Designed by 2020 World Champion Richard Hall

en_text:
When you install Theophilius Bagbiter, lose all credits in your credit pool.
Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.
cn_text:
当你安装西奥菲勒·贝格拜特时，失去你信用池中所有的信用点。
你的手牌上限等于你信用池中信用点的数量。
stripped_text: When you install Theophilius Bagbiter, lose all credits in your credit pool. Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.

en_text:
When your turn begins and whenever the Runner passes this ice, you may swap this ice with another installed piece of ice.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: When your turn begins and whenever the Runner passes this ice, you may swap this ice with another installed piece of ice. Subroutine End the run.

en_text:
Thomas Haas can be advanced.
[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each advancement token on Thomas Haas.
cn_text:
托马斯·哈斯能被推进。
[trash]: 托马斯·哈斯上每有1枚推进标记，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Thomas Haas can be advanced. trash: Gain 2 credits for each advancement token on Thomas Haas.

en_text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, give them 1 tag.
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, do 1 net damage for each tag the Runner has.
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner loses 1[credit] for each tag they have.
cn_text:
当潜袭者遭遇托特时，给予他/她1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，他/她失去1[credit]。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, give them 1 tag. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, do 1 net damage for each tag the Runner has. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner loses 1 credit for each tag they have.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during their last turn and the Runner has at least 1 installed card.
Choose 1 installed Runner card. The Runner must take 2 tags or add that card to the top of the stack.
Remove this operation from the game.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during their last turn and the Runner has at least 1 installed card. Choose 1 installed Runner card. The Runner must take 2 tags or add that card to the top of the stack. Remove this operation from the game.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Trace[1]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag for each tag they have or, if the Runner has no tags, give them 1 tag.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Trace[1]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag for each tag they have or, if the Runner has no tags, give them 1 tag.

en_text:
Play only as your first [click].
When this turn ends, gain 2[credit] for each successful run you made during it.
cn_text:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
当本回合结束时，本回合中你每进行过一次成功的潜袭，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. When this turn ends, gain 2 credits for each successful run you made during it.

cn_title: 图勒海底城: 水下安全区
en_text: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, do 1 core damage unless they spend [click] and 2[credit].
cn_text: 每当一个议案被窃取时，造成1点核心伤害，除非潜袭者花费[click]与2[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, do 1 core damage unless they spend click and 2 credits.

en_text: The first time you avoid or remove a tag each turn, you may install a card from your grip, lowering its install cost by 1.
stripped_text: The first time you avoid or remove a tag each turn, you may install a card from your grip, lowering its install cost by 1.

cn_title: 雷霆军工厂: 以武止戈
en_text: Whenever you rez a piece of AP or destroyer ice during a run, that ice gets +1 strength and gains “[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.” after its other subroutines for the remainder of that run.
cn_text: 每当你在潜袭中激活一层杀伤或毁灭者防火墙时，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，该防火墙的强度+1并在其它子进程后获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者销毁1张其已安装的卡牌。”
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a piece of AP or destroyer ice during a run, that ice gets +1 strength and gains "Subroutine End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards." after its other subroutines for the remainder of that run.

en_text: The first time each turn a run begins, gain 1[credit].
cn_text: 每回合第一次潜袭开始时，你获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run begins, gain 1 credit.

en_text: Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. When you install this hardware, place 1 power counter on it. When your turn begins, if there are 3 or more hosted power counters, trash this hardware and sabotage 3. (The Corp trashes 3 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.) Otherwise, place 1 power counter on this hardware.
cn_text: 只有你本回合已对一台中央服务器进行过成功的潜袭时，才能安装。当你安装本硬件时，放置1枚能量指示物到本硬件上。 当你的回合开始时，如果所附载的能量指示物有3枚或更多，销毁本硬件并破坏3。（公司选择从总部和/或研发中心顶端销毁3张卡牌。）否则，放置1枚能量指示物到本硬件上。
stripped_text: Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. When you install this hardware, place 1 power counter on it. When your turn begins, if there are 3 or more hosted power counters, trash this hardware and sabotage 3. (The Corp trashes 3 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.) Otherwise, place 1 power counter on this hardware.

en_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives in any position protecting a server, ignoring all costs.
cn_text: 当你将本议案计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物: 从总部或档案库安装1层防火墙到保护一台服务器的任意位置，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives in any position protecting a server, ignoring all costs.
attribution: Designed by 2015 World Champion Dan D'Argenio

en_text: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.
stripped_text: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.

en_title: Titan Transnational: Investing In Your Future
cn_title: 泰坦国际: 投资你的未来
stripped_title: Titan Transnational: Investing In Your Future
en_text: Whenever you score an agenda, you may place 1 agenda counter on it.
cn_text: 每当你用一个议案计分时，你可以放置1枚议案指示物到该卡牌上。
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda, you may place 1 agenda counter on it.

en_text:
When you install Titanium Ribs, suffer 2 meat damage.
You choose the card(s) from your grip to trash whenever you take damage (including the damage taken by installing Titanium Ribs).
cn_text:
当你安装钛金肋骨时，受到2点肢体伤害。
每当你承受伤害（包括安装钛金肋骨时承受的伤害）时，你选择将从你的操控器销毁的卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install Titanium Ribs, suffer 2 meat damage. You choose the card(s) from your grip to trash whenever you take damage (including the damage taken by installing Titanium Ribs).

en_text:
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit].
cn_text:
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Gain 1 credit.

en_text:
You may forfeit an agenda to rez Tithonium instead of paying its rez cost.
Tithonium cannot host cards.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 resource and end the run.
stripped_text: You may forfeit an agenda to rez Tithonium instead of paying its rez cost. Tithonium cannot host cards. Subroutine Trash 1 program. Subroutine Trash 1 program. Subroutine Trash 1 resource and end the run.

en_text: [subroutine] When the Runner encounters the next piece of ice during this run, that ice gains a second copy of each subroutine on it (after the original subroutine) for the remainder of the encounter.
cn_text: [subroutine] 在本次潜袭中，当潜袭者遭遇下一层防火墙时，其遭遇的剩余时间内该防火墙获得与其上每个子进程相同的子进程（分别在原有的子进程后）。
stripped_text: Subroutine When the Runner encounters the next piece of ice during this run, that ice gains a second copy of each subroutine on it (after the original subroutine) for the remainder of the encounter.

en_text:
When you rez TMI, Trace[2]. If unsuccessful, derez TMI.
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
当你激活垃圾信息堆时，<trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果失败，关闭垃圾信息堆。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez TMI, Trace[2]. If unsuccessful, derez TMI. Subroutine End the run.

en_text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they must pay 3[credit], if able. If they do not, end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
cn_text:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，如可能，其必须支付3[credit]。如果其未如此做，终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they must pay 3 credits, if able. If they do not, end the run. Subroutine End the run.

en_text:
When this agenda is scored or stolen, give the Runner 1 tag.
Limit 1 per deck.
cn_text:
当本议案被计分或窃取时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 per deck.

en_text:
Play only if you have fewer than 10[credit].
Gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
stripped_text: Play only if you have fewer than 10 credits. Gain 7 credits and take 1 bad publicity.

en_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 of the top 5 cards in R&D and access it.
cn_text: 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以选择研发中心顶端的五张卡牌中的一张并读取它，代替读取卡牌。本次潜袭你不能读取研发中心的其它任何卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 of the top 5 cards in R&D and access it.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
cn_text: 1[credit]: 破解门禁子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

en_text: [interrupt] → The first time you would do 1 or more net damage during each run against this server, instead you may pay 2[credit] to do 1 core damage.
cn_text: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，你第一次将要造成任意数量的网域伤害时，你可以支付2[credit]，以造成1点脑部伤害代替。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> The first time you would do 1 or more net damage during each run against this server, instead you may pay 2 credits to do 1 core damage.

en_text:
Toshiyuki Sakai can be advanced.
If Toshiyuki Sakai is accessed while installed, you may swap him with an agenda or asset from HQ. The new agenda or asset is installed unrezzed, and keeps all advancement tokens on Toshiyuki Sakai. The Runner can choose not to access the new card.
cn_text:
酒井俊之能被推进。
如果已安装的酒井俊之被读取，你可以将他与总部中的一个议案或资产互换。新的议案或资产被安装为未激活的状态，并且保留酒井俊之上所有的推进标记。潜袭者能选择不读取该新卡牌。
stripped_text: Toshiyuki Sakai can be advanced. If Toshiyuki Sakai is accessed while installed, you may swap him with an agenda or asset from HQ. The new agenda or asset is installed unrezzed, and keeps all advancement tokens on Toshiyuki Sakai. The Runner can choose not to access the new card.

en_text: Tour Guide gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each rezzed asset you have.
cn_text: 你每有一个已激活的资产，导游获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Tour Guide gains "Subroutine End the run." for each rezzed asset you have.

en_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. [click], 2[credit]: Run the chosen server. The first time a subroutine would resolve during that run, prevent it from resolving.
cn_text:
当你的回合开始时，选择一台服务器。
[click], 2[credit]: 对该服务器进行一次潜袭。防止本次潜袭第一个将要结算的子进程被结算。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. click, 2 credits: Run the chosen server. The first time a subroutine would resolve during that run, prevent it from resolving.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash an installed piece of hardware.
Gain credits equal to half the install cost of the trashed hardware (rounded down) and search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
cn_text:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，销毁一个已安装的硬件。
获得等于销毁硬件安装费用一半数量（向下取整）的信用点，并在你的存储栈搜寻一个硬件，将其展示，并加入你的操控器。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash an installed piece of hardware. Gain credits equal to half the install cost of the trashed hardware (rounded down) and search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
Do 2 meat damage.
cn_text:
如果潜袭者具有至少2枚锁定标记，才能打出。
造成2点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags. Do 2 meat damage.

en_text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice protecting this server, Trace[2]. If successful, the Corp gains 1[credit].
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice protecting this server, Trace[2]. If successful, the Corp gains 1 credit.

en_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The advancement requirement of each agenda is increased by 1 for each copy of that agenda in the Corp's score area.
cn_text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每个议案在公司的分数区中每有一个相同的议案，其推进需求+1。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The advancement requirement of each agenda is increased by 1 for each copy of that agenda in the Corp's score area.

en_text: Remote server only. The first time each turn you install a card in the root of this server, gain 2[credit] or draw 1 card. Limit 1 region per server.
cn_text: 仅能安装在远程服务器。 每回合你第一次安装一张卡牌到本服务器的根目录时，获得2[credit]或抽1张卡牌。 每个服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Remote server only. The first time each turn you install a card in the root of this server, gain 2 credits or draw 1 card. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text: Install only on a piece of ice. (If the host ice is uninstalled, this program is trashed.) When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Then, if there are 3 or more hosted virus counters, derez host ice.
cn_text: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。（如果被附载的防火墙被卸载，销毁本程序。） 当你安装本程序及你的回合开始时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。然后，如果所附载的病毒指示物有3枚或更多，关闭被附载的防火墙。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. (If the host ice is uninstalled, this program is trashed.) When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Then, if there are 3 or more hosted virus counters, derez host ice.

en_text: Turn an agenda faceup and install Transparency Initiative on that agenda as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host agenda gains public. Whenever you advance host agenda, gain 1[credit]."
stripped_text: Turn an agenda faceup and install Transparency Initiative on that agenda as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host agenda gains public. Whenever you advance host agenda, gain 1 credit."

en_text: When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: This run cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause the run to become unsuccessful.) Use this ability only once per turn and only during a run.
cn_text: 当你将本议案计分时，放置2枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物: 本次潜袭不能宣告为成功。（本效果不会导致潜袭被视为失败。）本能力每回合仅限使用一次，且仅能在潜袭中使用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: This run cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause the run to become unsuccessful.) Use this ability only once per turn and only during a run.

en_text: Run any server. During that run, the rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 3[credit].
cn_text: 潜袭任意一台服务器。在本次潜袭中，每层防火墙的激活费用加3[credit]。
stripped_text: Run any server. During that run, the rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 3 credits.

en_text:
When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card.
[subroutine] Trace[6]. If successful, the Runner cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run.
cn_text:
当你激活本防火墙时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
[subroutine] 销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪6</trace> -如果成功，潜袭者不能在本次潜袭的剩余时间内窃取或销毁公司卡牌。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity. Subroutine Trash 1 installed Runner card. Subroutine Trace[6]. If successful, the Runner cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run.

en_text: [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this ice from HQ: Place 3 advancement counters on 1 installed piece of ice. You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter. [subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. End the run.
cn_text: [click]，1[credit]，从总部展示并销毁本防火墙: 放置3枚推进指示物到1层已安装的防火墙上。 你可以推进本防火墙。每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，本防火墙的强度+1。 [subroutine] 获得1[credit]。终止本次潜袭。

stripped_text: Interface -> 3 credits: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. This ability costs 1 credit less to use for each installed piece of cybernetic hardware. 2 credits: +2 strength.

en_text:
You cannot use Tri-maf Contact more than once per turn.
[click]: Gain 2[credit].
When Tri-maf Contact is trashed, suffer 3 meat damage.
cn_text:
每回合你不能使用三和党联系人多于一次。
[click]: 获得 2[credit]。
当三和党联系人被销毁时，受到3点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: You cannot use Tri-maf Contact more than once per turn. click: Gain 2 credits. When Tri-maf Contact is trashed, suffer 3 meat damage.

en_text:
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
cn_text:
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。

en_text: The first time each turn a run begins, you may move this ice to the outermost position protecting the attacked server. (The Runner is now approaching this ice.) [subroutine] You may draw 1 card. You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ protecting another server, ignoring all costs. [subroutine] Each piece of ice gets +2 strength for the remainder of this run.
cn_text: 每回合第一次潜袭开始时，你可以将本防火墙转移到保护被攻击的服务器的最外侧位置。（潜袭者现在接驳到本防火墙。） [subroutine] 你可以抽1张卡牌。你可以从总部安装1层防火墙保护另一台服务器，忽略所有的费用。 [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，每层防火墙的强度+2。
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run begins, you may move this ice to the outermost position protecting the attacked server. (The Runner is now approaching this ice.) Subroutine You may draw 1 card. You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ protecting another server, ignoring all costs. Subroutine Each piece of ice gets +2 strength for the remainder of this run.

en_text: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.
cn_text: 选择1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌。从另1张卡牌上转移最多2枚推进指示物到所选择的卡牌上。
stripped_text: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.

en_text:
Place 4[credit] on this event. You can spend hosted credits during runs.
Run R&D. If successful, place 2[credit] on this event and access 1 additional card when you breach R&D.
When that run ends, you may run a remote server.
cn_text:
放置4[credit]到本事件上。你可以在潜袭中花费所附载的信用点。
潜袭研发中心。如果成功，放置2[credit]到本事件上，且当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取1张卡牌。
当本次潜袭结束时，你可以潜袭一台远程服务器。
stripped_text: Place 4 credits on this event. You can spend hosted credits during runs. Run R&D. If successful, place 2 credits on this event and access 1 additional card when you breach R&D. When that run ends, you may run a remote server.

en_text:
When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
You can spend hosted credits to use programs during runs.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must take 1 tag or trash this resource.
cn_text:
当你的回合开始时及你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
你可以花费所附载的信用点以在潜袭中使用程序。
当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，你必须拿取1枚锁定标记或者销毁本资源。
stripped_text: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1 credit on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to use programs during runs. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must take 1 tag or trash this resource.

en_text: When you rez this asset, choose 1 rezzed piece of bioroid ice. Runner card abilities cannot break subroutines on the chosen ice.
cn_text: 当你激活本资产时，选择1层已激活的生化人防火墙。 潜袭者卡牌能力不能破解所选择的防火墙上的子进程。
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, choose 1 rezzed piece of bioroid ice. Runner card abilities cannot break subroutines on the chosen ice.
attribution: Designed by 2019 World Champion Oliver "Pinsel" Siccha

en_text:
If Trojan is accessed from R&D, then Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Trojan, lose 2[credit], trash 1 card from HQ at random, and destroy Trojan. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Trojan from Archives.
stripped_text: If Trojan is accessed from R&D, then Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Trojan, lose 2 credits, trash 1 card from HQ at random, and destroy Trojan. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Trojan from Archives.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner accessed a card during their last turn.
Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 installed program with an install cost of X or less, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner accessed a card during their last turn. Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 installed program with an install cost of X or less, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.

en_text: When the Runner encounters Troll, Trace[2]. If successful, the Runner must lose [click] or end the run.
cn_text: 当潜袭者遭遇巨魔时，<trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者必须失去[click]或终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Troll, Trace[2]. If successful, the Runner must lose click or end the run.

en_text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Trope. [click], remove Trope from the game: Shuffle 1 card from your heap into your stack for each power counter on Trope.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚能量指示物到桥段上。 [click], 将桥段移出游戏: 桥段上每有1枚能量指示物，将一张卡牌从你的堆阵洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Trope. click, remove Trope from the game: Shuffle 1 card from your heap into your stack for each power counter on Trope.

en_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash 1 installed resource. Install and rez 1 card from Archives, ignoring all costs.
cn_text:
只有潜袭者被锁定时，才能打出。
销毁1个已安装的资源。从档案库安装并激活1张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Trash 1 installed resource. Install and rez 1 card from Archives, ignoring all costs.

en_text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
When your turn begins, you may place 1 virus counter on this program.
When there are 5 or more hosted virus counters, trash host ice.
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. When your turn begins, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. When there are 5 or more hosted virus counters, trash host ice.

en_text:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server.
During the first encounter each turn with a piece of ice protecting the chosen server, whenever the Corp would resolve a subroutine, instead they resolve "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.".
cn_text:
当你的回合开始时，你可以选择一台服务器。
每回合第一次遭遇保护所选择服务器的防火墙期间，每当公司将要结算一条子进程时，改为结算“[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。”
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. During the first encounter each turn with a piece of ice protecting the chosen server, whenever the Corp would resolve a subroutine, instead they resolve Subroutine Do 1 net damage..

en_text:
[subroutine] End the run unless the Corp pays 1[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run unless the Corp pays 1 credit. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.

en_text: Remote server only. Persistent → Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen from the root of this server, you may search R&D for 1 piece of ice. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Install and rez that ice, paying a total of 3[credit] less.
cn_text: 仅能安装在远程服务器。 持久 → 每当一个议案从本服务器的根目录被计分或窃取时，你可以在研发中心搜寻1个防火墙。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）安装并激活该防火墙，总费用减3[credit]。
stripped_text: Remote server only. Persistent -> Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen from the root of this server, you may search R&D for 1 piece of ice. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Install and rez that ice, paying a total of 3 credits less.

en_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you donʼt have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 subroutines on a piece of ice protecting your mark. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，发现你的目标。（如果你没有目标，一台随机的中央服务器成为你本回合的目标。） 对接 → 2[credit]: 破解最多2条保护你目标的防火墙上的子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+2。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 subroutines on a piece of ice protecting your mark. 2 credits: +2 strength.

en_text: Turing has +3 strength while protecting a remote server. The Runner cannot use AI programs to break subroutines on Turing. [subroutine] End the run unless the Runner spends [click][click][click].
stripped_text: Turing has +3 strength while protecting a remote server. The Runner cannot use AI programs to break subroutines on Turing. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner spends click click click.

en_text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they lose 1[credit].
[subroutine] Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
cn_text:
当潜袭者遭遇收费高速时，他/她失去1[credit]。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 5</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they lose 1 credit. Subroutine Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

en_text: +1[mu] Whenever you steal an agenda, you may swap that agenda with an agenda in the Corp's score area. Limit 1 console per player.
cn_text: +1[mu] 每当你窃取一个议案时，你可以将该议案与公司分数区中的另一个议案互换。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever you steal an agenda, you may swap that agenda with an agenda in the Corp's score area. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text: Gain 1[credit] whenever you create a server.
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit whenever you create a server.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, the Corp gains 2[credit].
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, the Corp gains 2 credits.

en_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. The Corp gets +1 allotted [click] for their next turn. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 2 core damage. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card. Gain 3[credit]. [subroutine] End the run.
cn_text: 失去[click]: 破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。公司在其下回合获得的[click]数量+1。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 造成2点核心伤害。 [subroutine] 销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。获得3[credit]。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. The Corp gets +1 allotted click for their next turn. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 2 core damage. Subroutine Trash 1 installed Runner card. Gain 3 credits. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: Tyrant can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each advancement token on it.
cn_text: 已激活的暴君才能被推进，并且其上每有1枚推进标记，获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Tyrant can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "Subroutine End the run." for each advancement token on it.

en_text: [interrupt] → When a subroutine would be broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server, you may rez this upgrade. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent 1 subroutine from being broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server.
cn_text: 如果潜袭者将要破解保护本服务器的生化人防火墙上的一个子进程，你可以激活提尔之手。 [trash]: 防止保护本服务器的生化人防火墙上的一个子进程被破解。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> When a subroutine would be broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server, you may rez this upgrade. Interrupt -> trash: Prevent 1 subroutine from being broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server.

en_text: [click], [click]: Search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
cn_text: [click], [click]: 在你的存储栈搜寻一个硬件，将其展示，并加入你的操控器。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: click, click: Search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.

en_text: +1[mu] When your turn begins, draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: +1 mu When your turn begins, draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.

en_text:
You can advance this asset.
When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] for each hosted advancement counter.
cn_text:
你可以推进本资产。
当你的回合开始时，每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When your turn begins, gain 1 credit for each hosted advancement counter.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click][click].
Gain 10[credit] and draw 4 cards. You may install 1 card from HQ.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click click. Gain 10 credits and draw 4 cards. You may install 1 card from HQ.

en_text: This program can only interface with ice hosting a trojan program. Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. If at least 1 subroutine was broken this way, each player may draw 1 card.
cn_text: 本程序只能与被木马程序附载的防火墙对接。 对接 → 2[credit]: 破解最多3条门禁子进程。如果以此法破解了至少1条子进程，双方玩家各可以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: This program can only interface with ice hosting a trojan program. Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. If at least 1 subroutine was broken this way, each player may draw 1 card.

en_text: Play only if the Runner accessed a card during their last turn. Trash 1 installed connection resource and take 1 bad publicity.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner accessed a card during their last turn. Trash 1 installed connection resource and take 1 bad publicity.

en_text: Ice protecting this server cannot be bypassed. Cards in the root of and/or protecting this server cannot be exposed. Limit 1 region per server.
cn_text: 保护本服务器的防火墙不能被略过。 本服务器内或保护本服务器的卡牌不能被揭示。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Ice protecting this server cannot be bypassed. Cards in the root of and/or protecting this server cannot be exposed. Limit 1 region per server.

en_text:
Install Underway Renovation faceup.
Whenever you advance Underway Renovation, trash the top card of the Runner's stack (or top 2 cards instead if there are 4 or more advancement tokens on Underway Renovation).
cn_text:
面朝上安装革新暗底区。
每当你推进革新暗底区时，销毁潜袭者存储栈顶端的一张卡牌（或如果革新暗底区具有4枚或更多的推进标记，则改为顶端的两张卡牌）。
stripped_text: Install Underway Renovation faceup. Whenever you advance Underway Renovation, trash the top card of the Runner's stack (or top 2 cards instead if there are 4 or more advancement tokens on Underway Renovation).

en_text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have at least 2[link].
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit if you have at least 2 link.

en_text: Add an installed program or piece of hardware to your grip.
cn_text: 将一个已安装的程序或硬件加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Add an installed program or piece of hardware to your grip.

en_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +X strength. X is equal to the number of installed icebreakers (including this one).
cn_text: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+X。X等于已安装的破解器数量（包括本程序在内）。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +X strength. X is equal to the number of installed icebreakers (including this one).

en_text: [subroutine] If the Runner is not tagged, they lose 1[credit]. If the Runner is tagged, they lose all credits in their credit pool and you trash this ice.
cn_text: [subroutine] 潜袭者失去1[credit]，除非潜袭者被锁定。如果潜袭者被锁定，他/她失去其信用池中所有的信用点，并且公司销毁通用连接费。
stripped_text: Subroutine If the Runner is not tagged, they lose 1 credit. If the Runner is tagged, they lose all credits in their credit pool and you trash this ice.

en_text: When you score Unorthodox Predictions, choose sentry, code gate or barrier. Subroutines on ice of the chosen type cannot be broken until the beginning of your next turn.
cn_text: 当你用异法占卜计分时，选择警报，门禁或屏障。所选择子类型防火墙上的子进程不能被破解，直到你的下回合开始。
stripped_text: When you score Unorthodox Predictions, choose sentry, code gate or barrier. Subroutines on ice of the chosen type cannot be broken until the beginning of your next turn.

en_text: Use this hardware only if you have made a successful run on HQ this turn. [click][click]: Trash 1 rezzed bioroid, clone, executive, or sysop in the root of a remote server.
cn_text: 如果你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭，才能使用未登记的.35 S&W手枪。 [click], [click]: 销毁一台服务器内一个已激活的生化人，克隆体，主管或管理员，无须支付其销毁费用。
stripped_text: Use this hardware only if you have made a successful run on HQ this turn. click click: Trash 1 rezzed bioroid, clone, executive, or sysop in the root of a remote server.

en_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp cannot install more than 1 piece of ice each turn.
cn_text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每回合公司不能安装多于一层防火墙。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp cannot install more than 1 piece of ice each turn.

en_text:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may have the Runner gain 2[credit]. If you do, during each encounter with this ice for the remainder of that run, the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] You may draw 2 cards.
cn_text:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以令潜袭者获得2[credit]。如果你如此做，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，每次遭遇本防火墙期间，潜袭者不能破解超过1条本防火墙上的印刷子进程。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 你可以抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may have the Runner gain 2 credits. If you do, during each encounter with this ice for the remainder of that run, the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine You may draw 2 cards.

en_text: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner loses 2[credit]. [subroutine] Resolve a subroutine on a piece of rezzed psi ice.
cn_text: [subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，潜袭者失去2[credit]。 [subroutine] 结算一层已激活的灵能防火墙上的一个子进程。
stripped_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Resolve a subroutine on a piece of rezzed psi ice.

en_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may place 1 power counter on Upya. [click], 3 hosted power counters: Gain [click][click]. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may place 1 power counter on Upya. click, 3 hosted power counters: Gain click click. Use this ability only once per turn.

en_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 installed non-virus trojan program to your grip. If you do, place 2[credit] on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install cards.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，你可以将1个已安装的非病毒的木马程序加入你的操控器。如果你如此做，放置2[credit]到本资源上。 你可以花费所附载的信用点以安装卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 installed non-virus trojan program to your grip. If you do, place 2 credits on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install cards.

en_text:
Place 3 power counters on Urban Renewal when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Urban Renewal, trash it and do 4 meat damage.
When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Urban Renewal.
stripped_text: Place 3 power counters on Urban Renewal when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Urban Renewal, trash it and do 4 meat damage. When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Urban Renewal.

en_text:
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner cannot make another run this turn.
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, end the run.
cn_text:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者本回合不能进行另一次潜袭。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner cannot make another run this turn. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, end the run.

en_text:
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, do 2 net damage plus 1 net damage for each hosted advancement counter.
cn_text:
你可以推进本资产。
当潜袭者读取已安装的本资产时，造成2点网域伤害，并且每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，伤害量增加1点。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, do 2 net damage plus 1 net damage for each hosted advancement counter.

en_text: Interface → X[credit]: Break X code gate subroutines. Use this ability only once per run. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Use this ability only if you have 3 or more installed virtual resources. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
cn_text: 对接 → X[credit]: 破解X条门禁子进程。本能力每次潜袭仅限使用一次。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。仅能在你有3个或更多已安装的虚拟资源时使用本能力。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> X credits: Break X code gate subroutines. Use this ability only once per run. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Use this ability only if you have 3 or more installed virtual resources. 1 credit: +1 strength.

en_text:
As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2[credit] for each advancement token on that agenda.
Limit 1 per deck.
cn_text:
作为窃取一个议案的额外费用，被窃取的议案上每有1枚推进标记，潜袭者必须支付2[credit]。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2 credits for each advancement token on that agenda. Limit 1 per deck.

en_text: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, instead of breaching HQ, you may install this resource from your grip, ignoring all costs. [trash]: The Corp discards 2 cards from HQ at random. Limit 1 per deck.
cn_text:
每当你对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以从你的操控器安装乌托邦碎片，忽略所有的费用，代替读取卡牌。
[trash]: 公司从总部随机弃除两张卡牌。
每套牌组限制1张。

en_title: Valencia Estevez: The Angel of Cayambe
cn_title: 瓦伦西娅·埃斯特韦兹: 卡扬贝天使

en_text: The Corp starts the game with 1 bad publicity.
cn_text: 公司游戏开始时具有1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: The Corp starts the game with 1 bad publicity.

en_text:
As an additional cost to rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity or remove 1 tag.

en_text: The install cost of each non-virtual resource is increased by 1.
stripped_text: The install cost of each non-virtual resource is increased by 1.

en_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may search R&D for a piece of ice and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that ice to HQ. [subroutine] Gain 1[credit] for each rezzed piece of harmonic ice.
cn_text: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以在研发中心搜寻1层防火墙并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）将该防火墙加入总部。 [subroutine] 每有1层已激活的和声防火墙，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may search R&D for a piece of ice and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that ice to HQ. Subroutine Gain 1 credit for each rezzed piece of harmonic ice.

en_text:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click].
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 card from their grip.
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner loses click. Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 card from their grip.

en_text: Wendigo can be advanced. While Wendigo has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains barrier and loses code gate. [subroutine] Choose a program. The Runner cannot use the chosen program for the remainder of this run.
cn_text: 温迪戈能被推进。 当温迪戈具有奇数数量的推进标记时，其获得屏障并失去门禁。 [subroutine] 选择一个程序。本次潜袭的剩余时间内潜袭者不能使用所选择的程序。
stripped_text: Wendigo can be advanced. While Wendigo has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains barrier and loses code gate. Subroutine Choose a program. The Runner cannot use the chosen program for the remainder of this run.

en_text: Host this operation on a rezzed piece of bioroid ice as a condition counter with "Host ice gains '[subroutine] Do 1 core damage.' before all its other subroutines."
cn_text: 将湿活改装安装到一层已激活的生化人防火墙上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“被附载的防火墙在其它所有子进程前获得'[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。'”
stripped_text: Host this operation on a rezzed piece of bioroid ice as a condition counter with "Host ice gains 'Subroutine Do 1 core damage.' before all its other subroutines."

en_title: Weyland Consortium: Because We Built It
cn_title: 威兰财团: 因为有我们建造

en_text:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit to advance ice.
cn_text:
1[recurring-credit]
本信用点用于推进防火墙。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to advance ice.

cn_title: 威兰财团: 国家的建造者
en_text: The first time each turn an encounter with an advanced piece of ice ends, do 1 meat damage.
cn_text:
每回合第一次一层具有至少1枚推进标记的防火墙遭遇结束时，造成1点肢体伤害。

en_title: Weyland Consortium: Building a Better World
cn_title: 威兰财团: 创造美好世界
stripped_title: Weyland Consortium: Building a Better World
en_text: Whenever you play a transaction operation, gain 1[credit].
cn_text: 每当你打出一个交易事务时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you play a transaction operation, gain 1 credit.

cn_title: 威兰财团: 建造不朽
en_text: Whenever you advance a card, gain 2[credit] if it had no advancement counters.
cn_text: 每当你推进一张卡牌时，如果其上原来没有推进指示物，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you advance a card, gain 2 credits if it had no advancement counters.

en_text: Trash 1 card from HQ: Add 1 card from Archives to the bottom of R&D. Use this ability only once per turn.
cn_text: 从总部销毁一张卡牌: 将一张卡牌从档案库加入研发中心底端。每回合仅能使用一次本能力。
stripped_text: Trash 1 card from HQ: Add 1 card from Archives to the bottom of R&D. Use this ability only once per turn.

en_text: [subroutine] The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run. Trash Whirlpool.
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run. Trash Whirlpool.

en_text: Whenever you make a successful run, you may trash this resource to choose a card name. The next time this run you access an agenda with the chosen name, steal it, ignoring all costs. (You are no longer accessing it.)
cn_text: 每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以销毁本资源，以选择一个卡牌名称。本次潜袭中你下一次读取具有该名称的议案时，窃取之，忽略所有的费用。(该议案不再视为被读取。)
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run, you may trash this resource to choose a card name. The next time this run you access an agenda with the chosen name, steal it, ignoring all costs. (You are no longer accessing it.)

en_text:
Play only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
Force the Corp to "Trace[3]. If unsuccessful, reveal all cards in HQ. The Runner may choose up to 2 of the revealed cards. Shuffle those cards into R&D."
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. Force the Corp to "Trace[3]. If unsuccessful, reveal all cards in HQ. The Runner may choose up to 2 of the revealed cards. Shuffle those cards into R&D."

en_text:
[subroutine] The Runner loses 3[credit].
[subroutine] If the Runner has 6[credit] or less, end the run.
cn_text:
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去3[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者具有6[credit]或更少，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner loses 3 credits. Subroutine If the Runner has 6 credits or less, end the run.

en_text:
3[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to trash cards.
cn_text:
3[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于销毁卡牌。
stripped_text: 3 recurring credits Use these credits to trash cards.

en_text:
Resolve 1 of the following of the Corpʼs choice:
  • Gain 6[credit].
  • Draw 4 cards.
cn_text:
以公司的选择结算下列中的1项:
  • 获得6[credit]。
  • 抽4张卡牌。
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following of the Corp's choice: * Gain 6 credits. * Draw 4 cards.

en_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, choose 1 installed icebreaker that was used to break at least 1 subroutine during this run. The Runner adds that icebreaker to the bottom of the stack.
cn_text: 每当本服务器进行了成功的潜袭时，你可以销毁鬼火。如果你如此做，选择一个在本次潜袭中被使用来破解至少一个子进程的破解器。潜袭者将该破解器加入他/她的存储栈底端。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, choose 1 installed icebreaker that was used to break at least 1 subroutine during this run. The Runner adds that icebreaker to the bottom of the stack.

en_text:
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware.
While this ice is protecting HQ, it gains “[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, end the run.” after its other subroutines.
cn_text:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪4</trace> -如果成功，销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪3</trace> -如果成功，销毁1个已安装的硬件。
只要本防火墙保护总部，其便在其他所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] <trace>追踪3</trace> -如果成功，终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware. While this ice is protecting HQ, it gains "Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, end the run." after its other subroutines.

en_text: Shuffle your stack. Trash the top card of your stack. Gain X[credit] where X is equal to the install cost of that card.
cn_text: 将你的存储栈重洗。销毁你存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。获得X[credit]，X等于该卡牌的安装费用。
stripped_text: Shuffle your stack. Trash the top card of your stack. Gain X credits where X is equal to the install cost of that card.

en_text: [click]: Draw 1 card from the bottom of your stack.
cn_text: [click]: 从你的存储栈底端补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: click: Draw 1 card from the bottom of your stack.

en_text:
You may install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip.
Run any server. When that run begins, derez 1 piece of ice protecting that server. When that run ends, the Corp may rez the ice derezzed this way, ignoring all costs.
cn_text:
你可以从你的操控器安装1个程序或硬件。
潜袭任意一台服务器。当本次潜袭开始时，关闭1层保护该服务器的防火墙。当本次潜袭结束时，公司可以激活以此法关闭的防火墙，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: You may install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip. Run any server. When that run begins, derez 1 piece of ice protecting that server. When that run ends, the Corp may rez the ice derezzed this way, ignoring all costs.

en_text: As an additional cost to take the basic action to trash 1 installed resource, the Corp must pay 2[credit].
cn_text:
作为花费[click]（不通过卡牌能力）来销毁一个资源的额外费用，公司必须支付2[credit]。
<errata>勘误自FAQ 3.0.1</errata>
stripped_text: As an additional cost to take the basic action to trash 1 installed resource, the Corp must pay 2 credits.

en_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Remove up to 2 bad publicity.

作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
移除最多2枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Remove up to 2 bad publicity.

en_text: When your turn begins, reveal the top card of R&D. The Corp may draw that card.
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，展示研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。公司可以补该卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, reveal the top card of R&D. The Corp may draw that card.

en_text: Woodcutter can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." for each advancement token on it.
cn_text: 已激活的伐木者才能被推进，并且其上每有1枚推进标记，获得“[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。”
stripped_text: Woodcutter can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "Subroutine Do 1 net damage." for each advancement token on it.

en_text: Whenever you rez a card (including this asset), place 1 power counter on this asset. [click], hosted power counter: Gain 3[credit]. [click], 5 hosted power counters: Gain 6[credit]. Add 1 installed resource to the top of the stack.
cn_text: 每当你激活一张卡牌时（包括本资产在内），放置1枚能量指示物到本资产上。 [click]，所附载的能量指示物: 获得3[credit]。 [click]，5枚所附载的能量指示物: 获得6[credit]。将1个已安装的资源加入存储栈顶端。
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a card (including this asset), place 1 power counter on this asset. click, hosted power counter: Gain 3 credits. click, 5 hosted power counters: Gain 6 credits. Add 1 installed resource to the top of the stack.

en_text: The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards to search your stack for 1 card of the same type. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install the card you found, paying 3[credit] less.
cn_text: 每回合你第一次进行成功的潜袭时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌，以从你的存储栈搜寻1张同类型的卡牌。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）安装你搜寻到的卡牌，其安装费用减3[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards to search your stack for 1 card of the same type. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install the card you found, paying 3 credits less.

en_text:
Worlds Plaza can host up to 3 assets.
[click]: Install an asset from HQ on Worlds Plaza and rez it, lowering its rez cost by 2, if able.
cn_text:
众世广场能被附载最多三个资产。
[click]: 从总部安装一个资产到众世广场上并激活它，如可能，其激活费用减2。
stripped_text: Worlds Plaza can host up to 3 assets. click: Install an asset from HQ on Worlds Plaza and rez it, lowering its rez cost by 2, if able.

en_text:
Wormhole can be advanced and its rez cost is lowered by 3 for each advancement token on it.
[subroutine] Resolve a subroutine on another piece of rezzed ice.
cn_text:
虫洞能被推进，并且其上每有1枚推进标记，其激活费用减3。
[subroutine] 结算另一层已激活的防火墙上的一个子进程。
stripped_text: Wormhole can be advanced and its rez cost is lowered by 3 for each advancement token on it. Subroutine Resolve a subroutine on another piece of rezzed ice.

en_text:
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner spends [click][click].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 3[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner suffers 1 core damage.
cn_text:
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者花费[click][click]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付3[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者销毁一个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者承受1点脑部伤害。

en_text: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. [subroutine] End the run.
cn_text: 只要没有已安装的分解模块程序，本防火墙的强度便+7。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. Subroutine End the run.

en_text: When your turn begins, draw 2 cards and lose [click].
cn_text: 当你的回合开始时，补两张卡牌并失去[click]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, draw 2 cards and lose click.

en_text: Interface → 3[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with 0 or less strength. Interface → 1[credit]: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
cn_text:
3[credit]: 破解强度等于或小于0的防火墙上的子进程。
1[credit]: 防火墙的强度减1。
1[credit]: 强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 3 credits: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with 0 or less strength. Interface -> 1 credit: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter. 1 credit: +1 strength.

en_text:
Draft format only.
You must maintain the order of your heap.
Whenever you trash a Corp card, if you have more [anarch] cards installed than any other faction, shuffle the top card of your heap into your stack.
cn_text:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已安装的[anarch]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则每当你销毁一张公司卡牌时，将你堆阵顶端的一张卡牌洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: Draft format only. You must maintain the order of your heap. Whenever you trash a Corp card, if you have more anarch cards installed than any other faction, shuffle the top card of your heap into your stack.

cn_text: 每层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。

[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.

cn_title: 雅科夫·埃里科维奇·阿夫达科夫
en_text: Whenever a player trashes a card (including this upgrade) from the root of this server or protecting it, except during installation, gain 2[credit].
cn_text: 每当一位玩家在非安装过程中销毁本服务器根目录中或保护本服务器的一张卡牌（包括本升级）时，你获得2[credit]。

en_text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, you may gain 1[credit] for each time you accessed a card during that run. Use this ability only once per turn.
cn_text: 每当对总部或研发中心的一次潜袭结束时，你可以获得与你本次潜袭中读取单张卡牌次数相等的[credit]。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。

如果潜袭者将要揭示一张卡牌，你可以激活财阀们的忠诚。
1[credit]或[trash]: 防止一张卡牌被揭示。

Zealous Judge can only be rezzed if the Runner is tagged.

如果潜袭者被锁定，狂热的审判员才能被激活。
[click], 1[credit]: 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。

en_text:
Limit 1 remote server.
As an additional cost to run a remote server, the Runner must pay 6[credit].
When the Runner makes a successful run on HQ, flip this identity.
cn_text: 限制1台远程服务器。 作为潜袭总部的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付1[credit]。 [click]: 将本特性翻面。 翻面: 限制1台远程服务器。 作为潜袭远程服务器的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付6[credit]。 当潜袭者对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，将本特性翻面。
stripped_text: Limit 1 remote server. As an additional cost to run a remote server, the Runner must pay 6 credits. When the Runner makes a successful run on HQ, flip this identity.

cn_title: 白 星子: 未名主演
en_text:
When your turn begins, draw 1 card and lose 1[credit].
When your turn ends, if you did not access any cards this turn, flip this identity.
cn_text:
当你的回合结束时，如果你本回合读取过卡牌，获得2[credit]并将本特性翻面。
翻面:
当你的回合开始时，抽1张卡牌并失去1[credit]。当你的回合结束时，如果你本回合没有读取过卡牌，将本特性翻面。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, draw 1 card and lose 1 credit. When your turn ends, if you did not access any cards this turn, flip this identity.

cn_title: 人间生物科技: 享你所想
en_text: When you flip this identity, do 2 net damage.
cn_text: 在你开始第一个回合前，你可以将本卡牌与任意一张人间生物科技互换。 [click], [click], [click]: 将本特性翻转。 酿坊：当你翻转本特性时，造成2点网域伤害。 温室：当你翻转本特性时，放置4枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。 智库：当你翻转本特性时，将档案库洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: When you flip this identity, do 2 net damage.

cn_title: 人间生物科技: 享你所想
en_text: When you flip this identity, shuffle all cards in Archives into R&D.
cn_text: 在你开始第一个回合前，你可以将本卡牌与任意一张人间生物科技互换。 [click], [click], [click]: 将本特性翻转。 酿坊：当你翻转本特性时，造成2点网域伤害。 温室：当你翻转本特性时，放置4枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。 智库：当你翻转本特性时，将档案库洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: When you flip this identity, shuffle all cards in Archives into R&D.

cn_title: 人间生物科技: 享你所想
en_text: When you flip this identity, place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.
cn_text: 在你开始第一个回合前，你可以将本卡牌与任意一张人间生物科技互换。 [click], [click], [click]: 将本特性翻转。 酿坊：当你翻转本特性时，造成2点网域伤害。 温室：当你翻转本特性时，放置4枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。 智库：当你翻转本特性时，将档案库洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: When you flip this identity, place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.

cn_title: 信网同步: 随事随地
en_text:
[click]: Flip this identity.
You may pay 2[credit] fewer when spending a [click] to trash a resource (not through a card ability).
cn_text:
[click]: 将本特性翻转。
潜袭者花费[click]（不通过卡牌能力）来移除1枚锁定标记时多支付1[credit]。
背面：
[click]: 将本特性翻转。
你花费[click]（不通过卡牌能力）来销毁一个资源时少支付2[credit]。
stripped_text: click: Flip this identity. You may pay 2 credits fewer when spending a click to trash a resource (not through a card ability).
